de nas maN+Dal 'dra cig la/ /dur khrod mgo ma yang du bya/ /zur bzhi maN+Dal bzhi byas la/ /bzhi las de bzhis chag res bstod/ /de nyid ma tang gzugs su bya/ /snying ga man chad dbus su bsnol/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'og tu gzhug /

'khor lo 'bar ba'i thig btab ste/ /dpal chen lnga yi phyag rgya bya/ /khyams gnyis dag gis mdzes pa la/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dgod/ /sgo bzhir rdo rje sgo ba bzhi/ /yan lag sprul pa'i mgo brnyan gnas/ /phyi khyams

rdo rje me rir bya/ /de yi phyi rol phreng chen gtams/ /skam dang ra ri rlon pas bskor/ /de yi phyi rol me bur 'tshub/ /bskal pa'i bu yug bri bar bya/ /rdo rje sgo khyud sgo gang du/ /gu gu thul dang za ra tshags/ /zhing dang sbrul kyi chun po bri/ /

de nas ban+d+ha dpal ldan la/ /rdo rje dpal gyi yi ge dag /bris la kha sbyar sbub ste gzhag /ga'u chung la ral pa can/ /brgyad bris 'byung ba'i gnas su gzhag /las byed brgya dang bcu gnyis la/ /las byed bcu gnyis bris

la 'god/ /thar pa gnas kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /gdol pa 'byung po nga rgyal can/ /chags sdang rnams kyis bslad pa'i rgyu/ /de yi dug gsum gshig pa'i phyir/ /don gyi bsgrub pa chen po bshad/ /ru dra lnga yi tshogs chen te/ /

ting 'dzin ye shes lngas bcom nas/ /rdo rje drod kyis rnam par sbyar/ /mdo yis la stabs gcig tu'o/ /bgegs kyi bgegs te bgegs chen po/ /dug lnga rtog pa nyid las skyes/ /phye dang gsum gyi dur khrod nas/ /gzhi rtsa ngag dang

lus sems so/ /brjid ldan dpal chen dur khrod bdag /bdag rtog rtog 'joms ting 'dzin gyis/ /srid gsum ru dra dur khrod du/ /tshogs bdag chen po de brgyad bya/ /ma rig mun khang sgo phyed nas/ /glang chen smyon pa de bzung nas/ /

gzung 'dzin dam po'i rtod thag bcad/ /dug gsum rnam rtog rtod phur dbyung / /ngan song 'dam nas drangs nas ni/ /nyon mongs dpung rgod de btul nas/ /ye shes thabs kyis rnam sbyangs te/ /nam mkha'i klong du dmyigs med par/ /

bde chen mchod pa'i tshogs chen dag /ro mchog lnga dang mnyam sbyar bas/ /chos kyi longs spyod rgyas par sbyar/ /mnyam nyid bde ba'i snying rje yis/ /dregs pa chen po gzhom pa dang / /'khor ba'i dra ba gcad

pa'i phyir/ /khro tshegs 'bar ba'i sprin 'phros pas/ /gtum thung rngam pa mgyogs pa'i tshogs/ /phyag brnyan char chen phab nas ni/ /'khor ba'i tha ba spangs nas ni/ /bde ba chen po'i zhing bzlog ste/ /byang chub myu gu

bskyed nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lo tog bskyed/ /dur khrod chen po'i bzhin phyogs ni/ /mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bting / /rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bting / /nga ni dur khrod dbang phyug che/ /sangs rgyas sku ste ye shes yin/ /

thugs rje rnon po'i dmag tshogs la/ /ye shes rnon po'i mtshon cha yis/ /log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun bcad do/ /gru bzhi kha bzhir rdo rje yi/ /dbyibs 'dra'i thab ni brtsigs nas kyang / /snying gar 'khor lo'i thab tu bya/ /rigs kyi

yam shing lnga brtsigs te/ /hom lnga 'brel pa'i las chen brtsig /thab chen lnga yi hom khung du/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yam shing la/ /ye shes chen po'i me klong du/ /nyon mongs lnga yi bsregs sbyangs rdzogs/ /
bya bar sbyor ba mtha' dag kun/ /ji ltar 'byor cing 'tsham par 'os zhes gsungs so// //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dregs pa can gnon
pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zad par byed pa'i zhal gyi dkyil 'khor

zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i don 'di ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /'di yang de 'drar kun sbyar nas/ /'khor khang can gyi gzhal yas su/ /khru gang gru bzhi'i tshad de la/ /bzhi ni 'khor khang khyams de dag /phyogs bzhi dag tu brtsam par

bya/ /dri zhim tsan+dan 'de gu gtang / /dri spos tshom bu rin chen phrog /sbyin mchod rgyas par de bsham bya/ /lha yi dge bsnyen rnam pa bzhi/ /phyogs mtshams bsrung ba'i las rnams bsgo/ /khyams kyi nang rim phyogs mtshams su/ /

chag phyed pa yi stegs bu bcu/ /bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar bris la/ /sna tshogs rgyu las byas pa yi/ /'thun pa'i gzugs bcu dbang bskur te/ /khro bo gar gyi nang mtshams gcad/ /de nas ma trang gnon par bya/ /dregs

pa ru dra sdig can 'di/ /nams kyang bsgral ba'i zhing yin te/ /dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH ma hA shrI he ru ka ma trang ru dra ha ha pra be sha phaT/ kha T+wA~M phyag rgyas bsgyel nas ni/ /ma rig mun pa'i sgo phye nas/ /rnam shes a ru byin brlabs te/ /gsang chen

thugs kyi klong du bstim/ /sbubs ni gzhal yas 'bar bar bya/ /stegs bu ma trang gzugs 'dra la/ /'gyel thabs bzhin phyogs ci 'drar bya/ kha dog sngo skya gan rkyal thabs/ /che chung tshad med gnas kyis sbyar/ /
de yi snying gar bang rim gsum/ /dang por dmar po gru bzhi brtsig /gnyis pa mthing nag gru gsum bya/ /gsum pa smug nag zla gam bya/ /yan lag bzhi dang mgo mtshan drug / gsang sgo gnyis te brgyad

dag la/ /stegs bu chag phyed gru bzhi brgyad/ /de yi mtha' rim yongs zad du/ /zla gam gsal ba'i maN+Dal bya/ /de dag me klong 'bar bar bskor/ /ya thog zla gam steng dag tu/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i lha mchog
bzhugs/ /mthing nag gru gsum me dpung bri/ /gru bzhi'i dmar po bang rim la/ /rigs bzhi lha mchog dpal ldan gzhag /yan lag mgo mtshan g.yas g.yon brgyad/ /dbang phyug gnas kyi bdag mo brgyad/ /

bri bya yang na mtshan ma gzhag /tshigs chen brgyad la yul bdag brgyad/ /ji ltar 'os pa de ltar bya'o/ /sgo bzhir gsang ba sgo mar gzhag /mtha' zad yongs kyi zla gam la/ /bud med nyi shu rtsa brgyad gzhag /

ming ngam mtshan ma rten te gzhag /de yi kha la thab tu brtsigs/ /pad ma dpal be'u dbyings 'dra thab/ /mkhas pas yam shing brtsam par bya/ /bya ba'i bya ba thams cad kun/ /gong du sbyor ba de ltar sbyor/ /
zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //

de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des dug gsum thugs su dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i mdo 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dug gsum dbang du bsgyur pa yang / /'di ltar khong du chud par bya/ /dug gsum rang bzhin gang

yin pa/ /sku gsum nyid kyi ngo bo ste/ /gzhan nas btsal ba ci yang med/ /de ltar shes par 'gyur ba dang / /kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar bsgyur/ /thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar la/ /stegs bu 'dom gang ba zhig la/ /

phyi ra dmar po rgyas par bya/ /de nas mthing nag gru gsum brtsig /de nas dmar nag zla gam bya/ /zla gam dbus su dpal chen 'bar/ /dbang phyug gnas brgyad zla gam mtha'/ /bar rim bar la dur khrod 'bar/ /

tha mar dmar po gru bzhi la/ /sgo bzhi sgo srungs bcas par bya/ /de yi mtha' ma me ris bskor/ /khro bcu 'bar ba'i rtags rnams bgod/ /bsgrub dang 'jug dang dbang bskur rnams/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /

des ni thams cad rdzogs pa yin/ /dug gsum thams cad zil gyis gnon/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las dug gsum dbang bsgyur ba zhes bya ba bsgrub pa'i le'u ste

nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des bud med thams cad dbang sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chags pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar 'dod na 'di ltar rig par
bya'o/ /bud med chags pa'i rang bzhin te/ /chags pa khrag gi rgya mtsho yin/ /las kyis 'khor ba'i sems can rnams/ /chags pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bying / /chags las rnam grol 'gog pa ste/ /chags

pa de nyid khrag ces bya/ /khrag gi rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ /bud med khrag gi rgya mtsho rnams/ /'tsho ba bdud rtsi'i rgya mtshor bsgyur/ /de ltar shes par gyur pa dang / /kun rdzob tshul du 'di ltar sbyar/ /las kyi brtsams pa

phun sum tshogs/ /rim pa bzhin du brtsams nas kyang / /maN+Dal 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ /'khor lo bzhi yi thig tu gdab/ /mu khyud phyi rim gru chad bzhi/ /de nas sgo khyams dmar por bya/ /kun gyi phyi rim
lag chu hwa'i/ /me ri 'bar bas gtib thag gcad/ /dbus su shar lta zla gam bri/ /ban+d+ha dpal ldan yab yum dgod/ /'khor lo bzhi la rigs bzhir ldan/ /bar khyams gnyis la gnas yul rnams/ /

zla gam thig ler ldan par bya/ /sgo khyams sgo bzhi zla gam bcas/ /phyi khyams lag chu hwa yi me/ /me yi khro bo thig ler bcas/ /dur khrod rgyan gyis kun brgyan bya/ /ting 'dzin rdzogs dang dngos bsgrub dang / /'jug

pa dbang bskur dngos grub rnams/ /gnas bsrung la sogs rdzogs par bya/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las 'khor lo dbang sgyur gyi sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// //

de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshogs chos thams cad ni bdud rtsi sman gyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos thams cad kyi don rtogs na ni 'tsho ba

chos nyid kyi rtsi yin/ ma rtogs nas ni 'chi ba 'khor ba'i dug yin/ de bas na chos 'di dag thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de ltar shes nas kun rdzob tu 'di ltar bsgrub par bya'o/ /ji bzhin 'byung ldan bde sbyar nas/ /

ma trang khog pa'i snying ga ru/ /'dom gang tshad dang 'thun pa la/ /rtsibs brgyad 'bar ba'i 'khor lor gdab/ /me yi 'od kyis bskor bar bya/ /rdo rje ra bas bskor ba yi/ /mtha' ma sgo khyud 'bar bar bya/ /dbus su rin chen zur

brgyad bya/ /der ni phyag rgya 'bar ba dgod/ /lang ka bsgral ba'i gnas mchog 'dir/ /ral pa can gyi tshogs 'dus te/ /rAk+Sha 'joms pa'i mthu chen kun/ /srid pa gsum ril 'dir sgrol ba'o/ /dus bzhi mchod pa'i dam rdzas kyis/ /

de dag ji ltar rigs par mchod/ /dus bzhi bcud smin snying po yis/ /dngos grub chen po'i rdzas su bya/ /phyogs bzhi dbus kyi rdzas chen rnams/ /rmad du byung ba'i ral pa can/ /'byung ba lnga la dbang sgyur mdzad/ /'byung ba lnga yi cho

'phrul sgrub/ /dbyar chu ston me dgun sa ste/ /dbyid rlung nam mkha' gsang bar sbyar/ /cho 'phrul de la dbang thob nas/ /de dag ral pa can du bsgrub/ /ting 'dzin rnam pa lnga gsal bas/ /'byung lnga las byung sha rigs

lnga/ /khyi sha ba lang rta sha dang / /bya dang ri dgas sna tshogs ni/ /rdzu 'phrul shugs su sgrub pa'i rdzas/ /sgrub pa'i rdzas chen 'byung chen lnga/ /'jig rten kun la dbang sgyur ba'i/ /de ltar rdzas rnams 'byor pa dang / /ting 'dzin

bsgom dang bsgrub pa dang / /thams cad gong dang 'thun sbyar nas/ /'jug dang dngos grub dbang chen rnams/ /ci rigs par ni bde bar sbyar zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi rang byung dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang

sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gzhan yang bdud rtsi chen po ni/ /gong ma bzhin du legs sbyar nas/ /maN Dal tshad dang 'thun pa la/ /pad ma dmar po 'od kyi mkha'/ /

phyi rim zla gam dmar po bzhi/ /rdo rje 'bar bas mdzes par bskor/ /me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni/ /zla gam mtha' zad bri bar bya/ /rin chen ge sar phreng bas ni/ /pad ma'i lce la bskor bar bya/ /sgo bzhi rin chen 'bar bas bya/ /phyag rgya 'bar ba'i lha bkod na/ /

dbus su gser phor sul med la/ /dung chen 'khor ba can gyis sbyar/ /shar du shel phor sul 'greng la/ /rin chen mdzod spu gsal bar sbyar/ /lho ru rin chen sul mangs la/ /rin chen lo 'dab rgyas pas sbyar/ /nub tu rgya phor zla gam la/ /

bzhin mtshams rin chen 'bur gnyis sbyar/ /byang du bse phor rgya gram la/ /gtsug tor rin chen 'bur bzhi rgyas/ /rtsa ba lnga ni phyogs phyogs sbyar/ /sgo lnga'i gtso bo rigs su sbyar/ /dbus nas shar lho nub byang du/ /ka ko la dang du ru ka /

dza ti pha la kha dri zhim/ /lce pog dkar zhes rim par sbyar/ /de bzhin gong gi rim pa bzhin/ /a ru ra dang ga phur dang / /gur kum pad+ma li ga tur/ /de na rA sa yA na rnams/ /thams cad rigs dang kha dog dang / /las dang 'thun par sbyar bar bya/ /

sa bon lnga ni rim par sbyar/ /dpal dang ldan pa'i snod nang du/ /yab yum snying po rim bzhin bya/ /dbus dang pad ma lce la dgod/ /gnas yul la sogs mdzes par gzhag /dur khrod rdzas dang bkra shis rdzas/ /'byor pa'i yo byad

thams cad bsham/ /de nas byin phab dngos grub gsol/ /thams cad rnam par sbyar bar bya/ /dam pa de nyid gsang chen gyi/ /rigs brgya rigs lnga rigs gcig gis/ /thams cad sbyang ba'i mchog tu bya/ /de nas khrol bu

sbyang ba na/ /bsal bsngo bsdu dang dbye ba dang / /khrus bya ba dang bshags pa dang / /yon tan brjod dang byin dbab bya/ /de nas skad cig thang cig gam/ /zhag gcig dag gis sbyar bar bya/ /rtags dag byung na der 'byongs pa'o/ /

phye ma'i mchog tu sbyar ba ni/ /snod kyi sman rnams shes rab mas/ /bsdus te btag pa'i cho ga yang / /yum gyis bzung zhing yab kyis btag /rig 'dzin rtsal can dbab cing drang / /so so las kyi sngags brjod cing / /gtan gtun thabs

dang shes rab ste/ /sman nyid byang chub sems su sbyar/ /rdo rje glu 'di lha mos blang / /kun tu bzang mo'i gzhal yas su/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las/ /'khor ba bdud rtsi sman du sbyar/ /ye shes lnga ru gsal pa las/ /'bras bu sku gsung thugs su rdzogs/ /

'chi med bdud rtsis gcong rnying sbyang / /mtshan ma brtag phyir gcal nas ni/ /rdo rje dpal ldan kha sbyor blugs/ kha dog rigs lnga'i ras kyis bkri/ /rdo rje dbang gi rgya yis gdab/ /rdo rje sngags kyi gzungs kyis

gdags/ /dpal chen sku lngar mnga' gsol te/ /ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya/ /maN+Dal dag tu dgod par bya/ /kun gyis bskor zhing dngos grub dbab/ /rtsi dang sman gyi bdag po dang / /rtags ldan rig 'dzin phra mo dag /

rol mo cha byad mang pos bsten/ /bsgrub pa 'bru mchog gtams pas dgang / /bkra shis gos kyis rgyas par klub/ /gzungs thag gnyer can rigs su dbul/ /ting 'dzin me yis rnam par sbyang / /rtags chen lnga ni gang byung yang / /

myur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ /bdud rtsi sgra las drangs nas ni/ /dpal ldan pad+ma ldan pa ru/ /thams cad bdud rtsir sa ma ya/ /mkha' klong yangs par bde chen rdzogs/ /rang nyid bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ /gzhan nas bsgrub pa ci

yang med/ /'jug pa la sogs thams cad kyang / /tshul bzhin du ni rgyas par bya zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi phye ma'i bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o// //de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /

'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /thams cad de 'drar sbyar nas kyang / /maN+Dal 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa/ /phyag rgya'i lha rnams rdzogs byas nas/ /sman sbyang btags btsags gcal nas kyang / /sbrang chang 'o mas

gong bur bya/ /bse phor mtshan ldan nang du gzhag /legs par kha sbyar ras kyis dkri/ /gong ma bzhin du kun sbyar nas/ /dngos grub mchog rnams bdag gis bya zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi ri lu'i cho ga rnam par

bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /skyo ma'i cho ga 'di lta ste/ /thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas/ /mtshan ma gsal po 'byung ba dang / /

phye ma chu tshags nang nas dbyung / /phye ma'i mchog tu gyur pa dang / /phye ma'i rgyal mo de dag ni/ /bse phor kha sbyar nang du blugs/ /rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur nas/ /bzlas brjod 'phro 'du rgyun mi chad/ /sbrang chang rgya chang bu ram chang / /

rgun chang 'o ma la sogs pa/ /bcud kyi khu ba thams cad sbyar/ /rin chen ga'u mtshan ldan du/ /blugs te kha sbyar rgyas btab nas/ /'phro 'du bzlas brjod gong ma bzhin/ /byas te mtshan ma byung ba dang / /dngos grub chen po

blang bar bya/ /phye ma'i bsgrub rdzas de dag ni/ /cha lnga dag tu bgos nas kyang / /rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams las/ /ci ran tsam gyis cha gcig dang / /sbyar chang cha lngar bgos pa nas/ /rnal 'byor so so'i cha rnams las/ /sbyar te dngos grub rten du bya/ /zla ba gcig tu

zos pas ni/ /ba spu rangs shing gnyer ma rangs/ /zla ba gnyis su zos byas na/ /gzi mdangs thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur/ /zla ba gsum gyi phan yon gyis/ /nad kyi bskal pa dag las thar/ /zla bzhi phan chad gang zag gi/ zas dang ma 'dres brtson bsgrubs na/ /

gzhan gyi nad rnams 'joms par nus/ /drug dang bdun dang brgyad rnams la/ /bdud rtsi bcud kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /dgu dang bcu la zag pa zad/ /bcu gcig rig 'dzin nam mkhar 'phur zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi skyo ma'i

bsgrub pa rnam par bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje rig 'dzin rtsal lnga'i zas/ /'de gu'i cho ga chen po ni/ /'di ltar khong du chud par bya/ /sbrang rtsi bu

ram rgun 'brum rnams/ /lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang / kha dog mtshan ldan dmar po'i ba/ /lo yis 'tsho bar gzung zhing bsrel/ /sman gyi rgyal mo rab mnye bas/ /rgyun du gsos pa'i 'o ma de/ /rig 'dzin zas kyi mchog tu 'gyur/ /

bdud rtsi rgyal mo rab mnye ba/ /phye ma'i mchog tu byas nas kyang / /lo yi 'tsho ba'i sbyar byas te/ /sus mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs su/ /bsgrub rdzas de dag bkram nas kyang / /bdud rtsi bsgrub pa de bzhin bya/ /dus la bab pa'i tshod rnams la/ /

bsgrub rdzas de dag thams cad kyang / /ba yi 'o mas 'di gur bya/ /cha res bskyed cing bza' bar bya/ /zos pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro zhes gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi 'de gu'i bsgrub pa rnam par

bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /'di yang gong ma ltar byas te/ /de dang mi mthun bsgrub rdzas rnams/ /bdud rtsir 'gyur ba'i sman rnams kun/ /thams cad

thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /til chen la sogs zhun gyi mchog /thams cad bsdus shing sbyar byas nas/ /gnas kyang gong ma bzhin btsal te/ /bdud rtsi bkram nas bsgrub par bya/ /'phro 'du bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcad/ /grub pa'i rdzas su

gyur pa dang / /sman rnams phye mar btag par bya/ /de dag phye mar gyur pa dang / /zhun chen dag dang sbyar bar bya/ /sbyor ba'i cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /dngos grub mchog ni blang bar bya/ /gzhan nam gzhan gyi sde pa dang / /lo yis bshugs

te 'phrad mi bya/ /'tsho ba bdud rtsi zhun gyis sbyar/ /bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtags chen ni/ /ba spu langs dang gzi mdangs 'bar/ kham gyi zas bral bde bar 'tsho/ /shes rab gsal zhing thogs pa med/ /zag pa zad nas nam mkhar 'gro zhes

gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi zhun chen gyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o/ /de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rlon pa'i rdzas la sman bsgrub na/ /thams cad gong ma bzhin sbyar nas/ /

maN+Dal thig le lnga pa la/ /bkra shis dpal ldan lnga gzhag nas/ /gtso bo lnga dang 'bras bu lnga/ /rlon par bkod nas yi ges sbyang / /ting 'dzin bzlas pa'i me sbar bas/ /dang po ro 'byung skams pa dang / /de nas btag btsag

gong ma bzhin/ /sbyar nas rigs kyis bsnyen pas sbyang / /des ni mtshan ma byung ba dang / /de bzhin gong ltar ci bder spyad ces gsungs so/ /bdud rtsi rlon sbyor gyi sgrub pa bshad pa'o// //rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i

mdo las/ bdud rtsi sman gyi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje chen po des bsgrub pa thams cad kyi snying po gsang chen thugs kyi bsgrub pa zhes bya ba 'di bshad do/ /'dus pa chen

po'i rnal 'byor pa thams cad ni dbyings su shes par bya ste/ 'khor ba'i chos thams cad ni dbyings su 'dus la/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad ni ye shes su 'dus so/ /de gnyis su med pa ni chos nyid byang chub

sems kyi bde ba chen por 'dus par shes par gyis shig /de bas na chos thams cad ni thugs ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'dus te gnyis su med do/ /de ltar na kun rdzob tu 'di ltar rig par bya ste gnyis su med pa'i don la 'jug par

bya'o/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /dam pa'i don gyi chos rnams kun/ /thams cad rang gi sems la rdzogs/ /kun rdzob chos rnams gang yin pa/ /lus dang ngag la rdzogs par bshad/ /des na chos 'di thams cad kyang / /

rtsa ba rang la rdzogs pa ste/ /'di dag bsgrub pa'i thabs mchog kyang / /rnam par rtog pa'i rdul bsal nas/ /bsgrub pa'i rgyal po yab yum gnyis/ /don la mkhas par byas nas ni/ /so so'i thugs la thig le dag /

zla gam dkar dmar gdab par bya/ /de yi rdzas mchog chen po yang / /thabs kyi ga pur chen po dang / /shes rab gsang ba'i tsan+dan gnyis/ /dkar dmar zla gam chen por bya/ /yab kyi thugs kar dkar po la/ /thig le kha ni mar lta

ba'o/ /yum gyi thugs kar dmar po la/ /thig le kha ni yar lta ba'o/ /yab kyi thig le'i dbus su ni/ /dpal be'u dbus su nyi ma bri/ /dbus su oM gsal nang du hU~M/ /yum gyi thig le'i dbus su ni/ /pad+ma dbus su zla ba bri/ /dbus su a

gsal nang du hU~M/ /de ltar gsal bar gyur pa na/ /kun tu bzang po yab yum du/ /gnyis su med par bsgyur bar bya/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa dang / /rang las byung ba'i bdud rtsi yis/ /gsang ba gnyis kyi mchod pa bya/ /rang las byung ba'i dngos

grub dag /rang nyid sa ni bstim par bya/ /'di ltar sgrub pa gtsor byed na/ /bdud rtsi'i yo byad thams cad dang / /bcud kyi mchog tu gyur pa rnams/ /lo yi 'tsho bar sbyar nas kyang / /bsnyen sgrub yan lag

rnam bzhi las/ /bsnyen pa dag gi dus su ni/ /gang zag mi yi zas la brten/ /de yang lo yi skad cig gam/ /gnyis dang gsum gyi bar du sbyar/ /lo yi skad cig bar du ni/ /bdud rtsi yod byad rnams la brten/ /de nas

lo yi skad cig ni/ /gcig gam gnyis kyi bar dag tu/ /rang las byung ba'i rdzas rnam lngas/ /'phags pa mchod cing rang gis bza'/ /des ni drod la gnas par 'gyur/ /drod thob gyur pa phan chad ni/ /lo yi skad cig

thang cig gis/ /ting 'dzin zas kyi ro rnyed nas/ kham gyi zas dang bral bar 'gyur/ /drod chen rnam gsum rdzogs nas ni/ /rtags chen dag ni thob par 'gyur/ /rtags kyi cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni/ /rin chen phung po 'dod pa na/ /

sa rdo la sogs byas na 'grub/ /chu dang mkha' la 'gro 'dod na/ /brtsams pas mi 'bying thogs med 'gro/ /me yi phung po 'jil 'dod na/ /sdigs pa'i mdzub mo phyar nas kyang / /bden pa'i bsgo ba byas pas 'grub/ /

de la sogs pa thams cad nus/ /rtags thob phan chad sangs rgyas yin zhes gsungs so/ /gsang chen thugs kyi bsgrub pa bshad pa'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i rgyud las bka' gsang 'khor lo'i

bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das sems dpa'i rdo rje de rdo rje me glong 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas 'dus pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis chos thams cad me'i rang bzhin

du snang bar mthong ngo / /de nas 'khor rnams kyis shin tu bstod pa/ /e ma'o sems dpa' che ba che/ /ting 'dzin chen po snang ba che/ /cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs che/ /thabs mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kun me klong bzhin du snang / /

me nyid ye shes gsal ba'i glong / /'bar 'phro gsal bar gyur pas ni/ /mun gsal dngos po thams cad bsregs/ /bde chen dbyings su kun rdzogs par/ /dpa' bo khyod kyis mdzad pa legs/ /thugs rje chen po a la la/ /don grub chen po

a la la/ /sgeg pa chen po a la la/ /'jigs byed chen po a la la/ /dgyes pa chen po a la la/ /dregs pa chen po a la la/ /dpa' bo khyod kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /bdag cag rnams la bshad pa shod/ /me yi rang bzhin chen po dag /

bdag cag rnams la bshad par gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ sems dpa'i rdo rjes dgyes te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /rdo rje me yi rang bzhin dag /bshad kyi khyed rnams gus par nyon/ /rdo rje me

yi las mchog 'dis/ /rnal 'byor thabs su bde sbyar bas/ /rgyal ba kun mnyes kun bsreg skongs/ /don grub las kyi mchog tu bshad/ /skye med rnam dag hom khung du/ /chos can skye ba'i yam shing la/ /spros med byang chub ye shes

mes/ /mtshan ma'i bag chags bsregs sbyangs thim/ /rnam dag b+ha ga'i hom khung du/ /chags pa'i yam shing spungs pa la/ /bde chen byang chub me sbar te/ /'khor ba'i dngos po bsregs sbyangs thim/ /dpal chen zhal gyi hom khung du/ /

nyon mongs lnga yi yam shing la/ /ye shes lnga yi me sbar te/ /gzung 'dzin rdzas rnams bsregs sbyangs thim/ /snang srid nam mkha'i hom khung du/ /'byung ba bzhi yi yam shing la/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi me sbar te/ /snang srid dngos po bsregs

sbyangs thim/ /las bzhi so so'i khyad par gyis/ /phyogs dang kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas/ /ji ltar yin pa de ltar sbyar/ /shar lho nub byang dkar ser dmar/ /mthing ga nag po thal mdog sbyar/ /zlum po pad+ma le'u rtse zhi/ /'khor lo gru bzhi zur

brgyad rgyas/ /zla gam gru chad gzhu dbyibs dbang / /gru gsum b+ha ga kha mngon sbyor/ /sum brtsegs mdangs dang ri mor mdzes/ /las kyi yam shing rdzas kyis rgyas/ /ye shes rdo rje'i las rgyud ldan/ /bla ma gsum gyis thabs mchog sbyar/ /

dag pa'i mtha' 'dzin nyes mchog 'dzin/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i glu bro gar/ /mchod pa gsang ba dus tshigs sbyor/ /rdo rje lam gyi smon lam sbyor/ /gsang ba las kyi rgyud ldan pas/ /bshar gdab zhi ba'i lha rgyud dang / /rgyas dang dbang bshar

rgyud bshar bas/ /lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /de bzhin rgyud dang 'byor par bya/ /rigs kyi lha rgyud lnga rnams ni/ /so so'i rigs su bshar btab ste/ /glong yangs 'khyil pa'i hom khung du/ /dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yis/ /sbyang dang thob

phyir bsreg byar 'os/ /bsreg rdzas skye ba'i chos yin te/ /skye bar snang ba'i chos thams cad/ /'dir ni dngos po bzhin snang ste/ /chos can rkyen dang 'byung gnas dang / /rang bzhin nyid las cho 'phrul ni/ /skye ba nyid du 'dod pa yin/ /'di ni skye ba'i

chos can te/ /rang 'byung sreg rdzas rang zhir thim/ /nyon mongs lnga yi dam rdzas dag /ye shes lnga yi glong du dbul/ /phung po lnga yi dam rdzas rnams/ /thabs mchog yab lnga'i sku la bstim/ /'byung lngas bsdus pa'i bsreg rdzas rnams/ /shes rab

yum lnga'i glong du bstabs/ /rnam shes brgyad kyi bsreg rdzas rnams/ /ye shes gnas kyi ma brgyad do/ /yul gyi g.yeng ba rnam pa brgyad/ /dmigs med dbyings kyi bye brag brgyad/ /skye bzhi las kyi bsreg rdzas rnams/ /rnam thar sgo bzhi'i glong du thim/ /

thabs mchog la sogs rgya mtsho'i tshogs/ /so so'i yon tan thams cad dag /rdo rje glu yis brjod nas kyang / /de dag mnyes pa'i mchod pa brtsam/ /mchod pa thams cad rdzogs pa dang / /sgrib byang ma byang don chen rnams/ /grub dang ma grub don rnams ni/ /

me la mkhas pas brtag par bya/ /me sgra gnyis dang kha dog gnyis/ /'bar tshul gnyis dang dbyibs rnam drug /de dag yongs su shes par bya/ /gal te mtshan ma mi sdug na/ /bkra mi shis pa'i rtags yin pas/ /bsreg sbyang chen po rgyas par bya/ /

de nas 'dod pa'i rtags byung na/ /me la 'dod pa'i dngos grub rnams/ /rnam gsum gang ltar grub pa blang / /ro yi rdzas rnams bsreg sbyangs nas/ /ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang / /shin tu dri zhim sna tshogs kyis/ /ro la byug cing bkru bar bya/ /

bdud rtsi zhun chen khu ba yis/ /ras la byugs pas ro bkris te/ /ro yi gnas rnams gang yin par/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba kun bkod nas/ /phyag rgya'i mtshan mas gdab par bya/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gang dag ni/ /gzhung yin ba yi

phyag rgya rnams/ /du 'byung ba dang mnyam pa yi/ /sdong bu'i grangs kyang de ltar bya/ /sdong bu re la lha rnams kyis/ /ma nor rtsa ba'i snying po dag /ras chen dag la bris te gdags/ /ro yi sbyor ba rdzogs pa dang / /ro yi phyi shun thams cad la/ /

'khor ba'i bag chags kun bkod de/ /ras sam shing shun shog shog la/ /'khor ba'i sa bon thams cad dgod/ /nyon mongs lnga dang dug gsum bcas/ /skye ba'i lam lnga rgyud drug rnams/ /ming ngam gzugs su byas nas ni/ /gnas

gnas dag tu dgod par bya/ /khams dang skye mched phung po lnga/ /gzung 'dzin ming du bcas pa rnams/ /brda yi tshul du bris nas ni/ /ro rnams khyad par dgod par bya/ /de nas ro yi phung po de/ /rten nam glegs sam stegs bu yi/ /steng du mkhas

pas gzhag par bya/ /thab kyi cho ga brtsam pa ni/ /maN+Dal 'khor khyud tsam zhig la/ /dkyil 'khor gang dang gang yin pa'i/ /phyag rgya bzhugs pa'i pho brang dag /thig gis yul gcad so sor bya/ /de yi steng du shing brtsig pa/ /dbyibs ni

gru bzhi gtams pa la/ /zur bzhi ka pa bzhis brtan bya/ /sum brtseg yang thog bar khang bcas/ /mtha' ma shing gis brdzang bar bya/ /bar khang dag gi glegs ma la/ /ro yi bzhin phyogs shar du bstan/ /ro yi steng gi khang pa

la/ /ras sam shog shog la bris pa'i/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar dgod/ /ro khang glo skar bzhi phye la/ /thugs rje gzungs thag bzhis btags nas/ /phyogs bzhi bla ma bzhi la dbul/ /shing gi cho ga rdzogs pa dang / /

shing gi phyi mtha' stegs bu la/ /phyag rgya'i lha rnams rim par dgod/ /stegs bu rdzogs par gyur pa dang / /rdo rje las kyi skos gdab pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po bla ma la/ /'khor ba bsreg pa'i mnga' gsol te/ /ting 'dzin ye shes rtse gcig pas/ /

me yi 'du 'phro rgyun du bya/ /rdo rje las kyi karma la/ /las rnams rdzogs pa'i mnga' gsol te/ /las kyi phreng ba rdzogs par bya/ /rdo rje chen po'i bla ma zhig /ro yi nyes pa'i mtha' bzung nas/ /las kyi bsags pa bgrang

zhing bshags/ /rdo rje skabs sbyor bla ma yis/ /bdud rtsi skabs kyi mchod pa sbreng / /rdo rje bro gar glu tshig gis/ /skabs kyi glu gar mchod pa dag /rol mos drangs te dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje gnas kyi smon lam ni/ /skabs dang las kyi mjug

tu gdab/ /rdo rje las kyi ltang 'dzin pas/ /rtsa brgyad las kyis grangs bzung ste/ /dkar byung bla ma'i phyag tu dbul/ /ro yi las ngan ltang 'dzin pas/ /grangs med grangs su bzung nas ni/ /mtshan ma nag po'i byang bu dag /ye shes me yi glong bu

bsreg /me yis sbyor ba'i cho ga bya/ /me yi lha ni gang yin pa/ /me yi sangs rgyas snang mtha' yas/ /me yi lha mo gos dkar ma/ /rgyal ba kun gyi 'od mchog ste/ /'byung ba me la dbang sgyur zhing / /thams cad kun gyi drod bdag yin/ /srid gsum

sreg par zhal gyis 'ches/ /'khor ba'i sreg pa'i 'phrin las la/ /thugs dam dbang gis yong mi 'da'/ /me yi cho ga thams cad ni/ /yum chen dkar mo nyid la bsgo/ /de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas/ /ro yi sgrib pa byang ma byang / /me yi dngos

grub thob mi thob/ /me la mkhas pas gong bzhin brtag /mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na/ /bsreg sbyang cho ga rgya cher bya/ /gal te mgu na dngos grub thob/ /ro yi thal ba chen po la/ /btags nas thal ba'i bdud rtsir bsgrub/ /des ni bsod nams

chen po ni/ /dpag tu med pa thob par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje me'i cho ga bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa des dkyil 'khor

thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'di gsungs so/ /sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka badzra tsaN+Da/ sarba duSh+TAn sa~M shrI he ru kAM ta ka ha na pa tsa hU~M hU~M/ sa sa sa sa sa ma ya sa nu ne/ sa norba ra/ badzra gar+b+ha/ rat+na gar+b+ha/

pad+ma gar+b+ha/ karma gar+b+ha/ mai tri gar+b+ha/ kA ru Na gar+b+ha/ lo ka gar+b+ha/ bi du ma gar+b+ha/ yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sa/ bi shwa/ te shwa/ ke shwa/ pa shwa/ bi shwa/ trak+sh+wa/ hri shwa/ ka shwa/ bak+sh+wa/ ru ti/ rak+ti/ khA hi/ sa ha/ sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/

sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ sa sa sa sa sa sa sa/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ rba rba rba rba rba rba rba/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/ thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/ thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/

thA thA thA thA thA thA thA/ ga ga ga ga ga ga ga /ga ga ga ga ga ga ga /ga ga ga ga ga ga ga /ga ga ga ga ga ga ga /ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ta ta ta ta ta ta ta/ ma ma ma ma ma ma ma/ ma ma ma ma ma ma ma/ ma ma ma ma ma ma ma/ ma ma ma ma

ma ma ma/ hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/ hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/ hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/ hA hA hA hA hA hA hA/ shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/ shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/ shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/ shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI shrI/ he he he he he he he/ he he he he he he he/ he he he he he he he/ he he he he he he he/ ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/

ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/ ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/ ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/ ka ka ka ka ka ka ka /ka ka ka ka ka ka ka /ka ka ka ka ka ka ka /ka ka ka ka ka ka ka /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/ shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa

shwa shwa/ shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/ shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa shwa/ ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ri ri ri ri ri ri ri/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M

mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M/ mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M/ mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M mu~M/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ gau rI/ tsau rI/ pra mo hA/ be+et+tA lI/ g+hasma ri/ puk+ka sI/ sma shA nI/ tsaN+Da lI/ ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha/ sid+ha/ byA g+h-I/ sr-i gla/ shwa na/ kr-i D+ha/ kAng+ga/

kha ga /a+'u lu/ mu mu mu mu mu mu mu mu/ kha kha kha kha kha kha kha kha/ he he he he he he he he/ ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ Ar+ya te tsa teng dzaH pA sha~M hU~M/ lo ka ba~M/ b+hasmi ya ti hoH ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/

dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra / kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro kro/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ maN maN maN maN maN/ Da Da Da Da Da/ la la la la la/ e gar+b+ha/ ya~M karma/ ra rak+ta/ ba~M snig+d+ha/ ra~M dz+wa la/ ke~M ru

d+hiH b+h+ru~M dz+nyA na/ ba~M ban+d+ha/ ha ka pA la/ dz+nyA na parba ra~M/ bud+d+ha kA ya/ ma hA wa ka /badzra tsit+ta/ dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH e h+ye hi/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo dzaH dzaH badzra sa ma ya mu dra hU~M AH badzra shrI he ru ka /tiSh+Tha sa ma ya lhan/ ma hA shrI he ru ka ha

ha ham/ sa ma ya hoH phaT/ badzra A ra li phaT/ a ti pu hoH pra ti bu hoH i da~M puSh+pa d+hu pa/ ba li/ ti dza hoH kha ra~M kha hi/ ma hA rak+ta/ ru d+hi sni g+d+ha/ pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ tsit+ta/ bA su ta/ go ro tsa na/ DA ki nA/ yo gi ni/ ma hA

tsit+ta/ kha ra~M khA hi/ kha kha le/ sha ta pa khA hi/ a la la ho/ sa ma ya hoH i dan de nA ra kAn/ u tsi ra sa ma ya phaT/ badzra sa ma ya a be sha AH AH zhes gsungs pas las kyi 'bar ba'i cho ga zhes thams cad shin tu 'bar

zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje gsang sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des sgyur ba phyag rgya'i le'u 'di rgya cher gsungs so/ /

rnal 'byor mchog gi lag gnyis la/ /nyi zla 'bar ba'i ling+gar ni/ /a dang pad+ma gnyis gsal te/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyar/ /mnyam pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa la/ /me'i steng du a nyid gzhag /bya ba thams cad bral

ba'i rgya/ /a dang ma yi 'bru bcu rnams/ /'phro 'du bya zhing kun tu bsgyur/ /g.yas su 'khyil zhing g.yon du 'khyud/ /'di ni cho 'phrul 'byung ba'i rgya/ /a dang ma yi 'bru rnams bcu/ /so sor bcangs te myu gur bya/ /shin tu bstod de

kun tu bsgyur/ /'di ni snying por gyur pa'i rgyu/ /ma yis sbyin pa gtong tshul la/ /a yis thams cad skyob byed pa/ /'di ni tshad med chen po'o/ /kun la snyoms pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /ma nyid khrag 'phrog pa yi snod/ /a nyid so phreng mche bar sbyar/ /

'di ni thams cad rol pa yi/ /'jigs tshul ston pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /a dang ma gnyis gting sbyar te/ /so phreng mche ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /shin tu kha glal ba yi tshul/ /'di ni 'jigs byed chen po'i rgya/ /ma yis bzung ste 'then

nas ni/ /a yis gdengs shing 'joms byed pa/ /'joms byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ /ma dang a yis mgo 'jug nas/ /bzung ba'i tshul du byas nas ni/ kha yis 'drad cing 'then byed pa/ /za byed chen po'i phyag rgya yin/ /

a dang ma yi shes rab las/ /g.yas g.yon tshul gyis bsgyur byas te/ /so so ji ltar yin thabs sbyar/ /gnas dang yul gyi gtan tshigs su/ /bsgyur ba gar gyi phyag rgyar bshad/ /dpa' bo gdan la bzhengs nas ni/ /phyogs

mtshams kun tu bltas byas nas/ /shin tu 'gying zhing brjid par byed/ /a dang ma yi 'bru rnams ni/ /so sor brdabs nas dkur brten bya/ /bgying ba'i tshul gyis spyad byas nas/ /stag gi stabs kyis kun tu bskor/ /de nas rmun

bya stabs kyis ni/ /gong ma bzhin du bskor bar bya/ /de bzhin rus sbal gzigs dang stag /spyang gi seng ge dom stabs dang / /phag chen dred kyi stabs kyis ni/ /thams cad thams cad bskor bar bya/ /de bzhin 'dab chags thams

cad kyis/ /'jo tshul stabs rnams rdzogs byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/ /zhes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las sgyur ba phyag rgya'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// //

de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /hU~M 'byung ba chen po nam mkha' ni/ /'byung ba chen po lnga yi mdzod/ /nam mkha' las ni 'dod pa 'byung / /'dod pa'i mchod pa 'byung gyur cig /zla rgyas la sogs

snying po mchog /ma~M sa la sogs rnam lnga'i rdzas/ /me tog la sogs tsan dan phreng / /sna tshogs mchod pa 'byung gyur cig /mi mo rnams kyi reg bya mchog /'khril 'khyud sgyur ba'i gzungs chen ma/ /dbang po sbyor ba'i dgyes mchod de/ /

bde ba'i mchod pas tshim gyur cig /rdo rje rol pas tshogs mchog 'di/ /mchod sprin kun du rgyas gyur cig /dug gsum brtsegs pa'i ri bo 'di/ /sku gsung thugs kyi glong du bstabs/ /dug lnga rol pa'i tshogs

mchog 'di/ /ye shes lnga yi nang du thim/ /gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i mtshan ma 'di/ /dbyings dang ye shes glong du thim/ /'khor ba mtshan ma'i chos can 'di/ /chos nyid dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /phung po tshogs kyi yan lag 'di/ rnam grol

phung po lnga ru thim/ /'byung chen rgyu yi mtshan ma 'di/ /mkha' klong 'bar ba lnga ru thim/ /rol pa chen po mchod sbyin la/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs rnams rol/ /bla med stan 'gan mchod pa 'di/ /sngon chad rgyal bas bgrod pa'i lam/ /

dug gsum gting nas gsod pa'i thabs/ /sngon gyi thugs dam bzhin du bshes/ /'chi med bdud rtsi g.yung drung chu/ /ro yi khams rnams slong bar byed/ /dug gi phung po 'joms byed pa/ /rtsi mchog sman gyi mchod par bzhes/ /

zhes mchod pa'i tshogs rnams ling long phyad par byung bas rgyal ba rgya mtsho tshogs longs spyod des mnyes par gyur to/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las mchod pa dam pa gsang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// //

de nas sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje glu'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /'dir ni rdo rje rnal 'byor rnams/ /bsnyen par snang ba'i dbang thob nas/ /bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad spro/ /yi ge glu yi rgyan yin te/ /glu yi yi ge bcu

drug las/ /yi ge yan lag bsgyur bsdebs nas/ /glu yi bye brag bsam mi khyab/ /dang por glu yi don byung ba/ /oM gyis glu rnams rab tu 'dren/ /o yang a yi cho 'phrul te/ /a ni chos kyi yi ge yin/ /a las

byung rgyal ba'i thugs/ /rgyal ba chos kyi dbyings las byung / /a las a~M byung gsung gi mchog /gsung las glu yi yan lag 'byung / /dbyangs kyi yan lag drug bcur grags/ /glu yi yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /

sngon gyi rgyal ba glu yis grub/ /rig 'dzin rdo rje glu yis 'dren/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug glu yis 'grub/ /bstan pa rgya mtsho glu yis spel/ /srid pa'i bu mo glu yis sten/ /bdud dang srin po glu yis 'dul/ /dngos grub rgya mtsho glu yis

'bebs/ /chos nyid dbyings kyi glong dkyil nas/ /dpal be'u nyi ma dgu shar bas/ /rnam thar sgo bzhi rab gsal yang / /ma rig mun nag 'thibs pa yis/ /bsgribs par rig pa'i sgo mo bye/ /'khor ba'i mun gnag glong rum na/ /

byang chub sems kyi zla shar bas/ /mun bsal rnam thar sgo bzhir snang / /rin chen 'bar ba'i nyi ma rnams/ /dpal chen thugs las 'od shar bas/ /bag chags sprin mthongs bye ba ru/ /rnal 'byor thugs kar zer bab pas/ /mun

bsal rig pa'i sgo phye ste/ /rnal 'byor don la 'jug par bya/ /rig pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /ru lu'i 'od zer sgo phye bas/ /spros pas cho 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung / /srid pa gsum gyi bye brag byed/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho gting

nas skems/ /nyon mongs rgyu drug gnas nas sgrol/ /dug gsum rtsa ba rtsad nas gcod/ /bdud dang srin po gdug pa 'dul/ /byin brlabs dngos grub char ltar 'bebs/ /ji ltar dbang po'i sgo phye nas/ /'dzum mdangs gsal bar

'byung ba ltar/ /dpal be'u thugs kyi sgo phye bas/ /ru lu'i 'od zer yig 'bru shar/ /mthing nag ser nag dmar nag ljang / /smug nag 'bar ba'i yig 'bru rnams/ /yi ge rigs kyi phreng bar drang / /rgyangs kyis bskul dang dkar gyis

dbab/ /bsten kos nye bar gyur pa la/ /'jim gos mngon sum gsal bar bya/ /'bir kwas gnyis su med pa la/ /'dren kos yi ge'i phreng ba drang / /de nyid la ni glu drug ste/ /sha ta ba dang gar ta ba/ /cang ka de'u dang bang ka de'u/ /breng nge

ba dang dung nge ba/ /glu yi yan lag sum brgyas ni/ /rgyal ba mnyes pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /glu yi rgyal po 'di drug gis/ /don drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /sha ta ba yi glu blangs pas/ /gdug byed thams cad spa yang skong / /gar ta

ba'i glu blangs pas/ /gnod byed thams cad rdul du rlog /cang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas/ /'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor me ltar mchod/ /pang ka de'u yi glu blangs pas/ /drag po gtum po lhan ner 'gyur/ /breng nge ba yi glu blangs

pas/ /sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad 'gyed/ /dung nge ba yi glu blangs pas/ /srid pa'i bu mo dbang du sdud/ /yi ge 'bru dgu yi rang bzhin la/ /phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rdzogs/ /de bzhin 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/ /khyams dang sgo khyud gsal

ba'o/ /srid pa mthong yod snang grags kyang / /thams cad sngags kyi tshig tu rdzogs/ /yi ge rgyal ba kun dang 'brel/ /'khor lo'i sa la nye ba'o/ /yi ges dmigs pa thams cad 'grub/ /chags med lhun grub don po che/ /rnam bzhi las kyi khyad par

yang / /bya ba med par don du 'gyur/ /yi ge gsang ba'i 'phro 'du yis/ /rgyal ba dpa' bo thams cad mnyes/ /de kun yi ges rnam sprul yang / /rang bzhin dngos med chos kyi dbyings/ /yig 'bru 'bar ba'i cho 'phrul las/ /dam pa'i ngo mtshar sna

tshogs 'byung / /de bzhin sgrib pa'i bud shing bsreg /gti mug mun sel ye shes 'bar/ /rig pa'i nyi ma gsal bar 'bebs/ /bdag nyid dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs/ /tsit+ta dpal be'u zur brgyad 'bar/ /rin chen yi ge 'bru brgyad gsal/ /

dpal chen rin chen 'bar ba'i thugs/ /dpal be'u smug po zur brgyad las/ /gser gyi nyi ma dgu shar ba/ /'od zer ru lu yig 'bru brgyad/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i rlung sgrom du/ /shin tu 'bar 'phro 'khrug byas te/ /spros pas rnal 'byor dbang phyug

gi/ na sa g.yas su drang bar bya/ /go ro tsa na'i gzhal yas su/ /sen zlum tsam gyi rgya khyon la/ /gser gyi nyi ma ga'u dgu/ /shar ba'i dkyil na yig 'bru dgu/ /gsal ba'i 'od kyi gzhal yas khang / /dngos po'i bag chags

kun bsregs te/ /sems ni gser chu zhun ma bzhin/ /ltem la 'tshor zhing 'ong 'bar ba/ /rtsal las gyur ba'i zla dkyil 'khor/ /nyi ma steng na dpal be'u 'bar/ /de la ru lu 'phro zhing 'du/ /dpal be'u tsit+ta'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /

yig 'bru 'bar ba'i ga'ur gsal/ /pad+ma 'bar ba'i ga'u 'di/ /yi ge phreng ba 'khyil ba'i gnas/ /dper na me tog 'bar ba las/ /bcud len bung bas bcud blangs te/ /rtsi yi bur bu sog pa ltar/ /dpal be'u thugs kyi dkyil

'khor nas/ /rin chen 'od kyi me tog 'bar/ /ru lu'i yig 'bru bcud kyis rgyas/ /rnal 'byor sems las byas pa yi/ /bcud 'byin bung ba mang po 'phro/ /phar ldings yi ge'i bcud phyung nas/ /tshur ldings sems kyi ga 'ur bstim/ /

dang po shel gyi kha dog la/ /shin du gsal zhing 'tsher 'bar ba/ /gnas dgu dag tu zla ba yi/ /thig le dkyil kyi dpal be'u la/ /'bru bkod gsal bar gyur pa dang / /shel gyi bung ba mang po dag /khyung chen ldings ba'i bong tshod tsam/ /

phar ldings bcud phyung tshur gsibs pas/ /yig 'bru ye shes me 'bar bas/ /bag chags bud shing phung po bsregs/ /phar spros thugs rjes sa la bskul/ /ji ltar nyi gzer tsha tsha ltar/ /rgyun mi 'chad par rtse gcig 'bar/ /bar du

byi ru'i kha dog la/ /gong ma bzhin du bkod gsal la/ /byi ru bung ba mang po dang / /gong ma bzhin du 'phur ldings pas/ /bcud phyung bstim zhing slar la 'phro/ /ji ltar me mgal 'khor tshul du/ /dpal be'u smug po'i klong du bstim/ /

kun gyi tha mar bsdu ba ni/ /bkod pa'i gong ma thams cad kun/ /'thing nag 'bar ba bsgyur nas ni/ /khyung chen gzan la 'jums tshod tsam/ /hU~M sgra 'byin cing phan tshun ldings/ /ru lu bcud 'byin dngos grub rlob/ /dran pa'i dkyil

nas dza phyung ste/ /lcags kyu 'bar ba ga 'ur btsas/ /dpal be'u 'i dkyil na spungs pa yis/ /ru lu rin chen phung po dag /bsdus shing drangs te gnas su bstim/ /'bab pa'i shugs sam byin brlabs ni/ /mtsho la ser chen 'dril ltar ro/ /

'di ltar yi ger sbyar ba'i tshe/ /rnal 'byor nyag gcig ma yin gyi/ /lha mchog dbyings nas bzhugs pa yang / /chos nyid dang du mi dmigs kyang / /rnal 'byor mchog gis bskul ba'i tshe/ /thugs rje chags pa'i mdangs phyung nas/ /srog rtsol dran rig gsung gsung ltar/ /

'gur chu yan lag 'gul 'gul ltar/ /rdo rje yi ger 'bru 'bar ltar/ /gug skyed klad kor tsheg par phyin/ /ra ri khal khol sgrib med par/ /ye shes don la mkhyen rig rgyas/ /de lta mod kyang 'dul dbang gis/ /rgyal ba skul ba'i

sa la gzhes/ /rnal 'byor gso ba'i cho ga byed/ /lha dang gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ /bzlas brjod grangs dang bsnyen pa dang / /sbyor bas don la nye bar 'gyur/ /'di ltar stor ba'i dus dag na/ /byin brlabs phebs sam nye ba yi/ /rtags

sam drod dam mtshan ma ni/ /rnal 'byor nyid dang bsgrub rdzas dang / /yod mthong sgra thos kun la 'byung / /lus kyi drod dang rmi lam dang / /sems kyi rtags su gsal ba dang / /dbugs dag la yang nges par 'byung / /shing bal lta bur yang ba dang / /

mi bde'i gnod pa bral ba yin/ /rig la ting 'dzin gsal ba dag /rmi lam du yang myos par 'gyur/ /dang zhing dga' la mgu ba skye/ /gdung ba'i byang chub sems skyes shing / /ngo mtshar skyes pa de nyid do/ /'gyur ba'i dbugs la dbang

thob ste/ /dgag dang dbyung ba ji lta ba'o/ /rdzas ni 'bar dang 'phar ba dang / /dri dang 'od 'byung ro mchog skye/ /mi zad mang du 'phel ba dang / /mngar 'jam dang zhing ro mchog rnyed/ /lto la mi gnod mgrin la min/ /zos na bzhin 'gyur lus

rtas 'gyur/ /sil snyan yid 'ong sgra snyan gzugs/ /dri zhim 'byung ba de lta'o/ /rdo rje pra rnams bzang ba na/ /rtags dang mtshan ma phebs pa ste/ /smyur te dngos grub blang bar bya'o/ /bde dang ga'u'i phyag rgya dang / /rdo rje bum pa'i

'phro 'du yis/ /dngos grub yum gyi mkha' la dbab/ /yab yum sbyor ba'i lhag sems dag /ma phebs pa yi bar du dag /shes rab gsal ba'i lha mo bzhis/ /ha sta me long ban+d+ha dang / /zhing chen phreng ba la sogs dang / /

kha dogs lnga yi dar g.yab kyis/ /g.yab cing rig 'dzin mang po 'bod/ /rol mo cha byad mang po dag /rdo rje gar dang bsnyen pa'i glu/ /srid pa'i ma mo kun rten cing / /byin brlabs chen po dbab par bya/ /phebs ma dag tu dngos grub bstim/ /

'di ni rdo rje glu 'khor lo/ /ye shes rgyan gyi las yin no/ /zhes sems dpa'i rdo rjes gsungs so/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje glu'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu pa'o// //

de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rje des rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'dir/ /gang dag 'jug par byed pa yi/ /rnal 'byor rigs kyi bu rnams kun/ /

snod du gyur pa kun bsdus nas/ /byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed de/ /tshig 'di brjod de gnas par bya/ /e ma bde mchog dga' 'tshal 'dir/ /bdag cag kun tu 'jug par 'tshal/ /dga' ba byang chub sems bskyed nas/ /

gsang ba'i don 'di spyad par bgyi/ /de skad gsol te zhus pa dang / /gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis/ /rgyud sbyang rgyud drug las sgo gcad/ /rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor kun/ /dkyil 'khor chen po gsal bton te/ /phyag rgya dbang dang

bcas pa yi/ /'khor ba'i rgyud rnams sbyang bar bya/ /'jug pa de yi gnas lnga ru/ /rgyud drug sa bon bskyed nas kyang / /hU~M lnga dag gis gnan par bya/ /bcug pa de yi spyi bor ni/ /pa yi ye shes la bskrun pa/ /pad ma kha bzhi lte ba la/ /

mi dang lha yi sa bon dgod/ /shar lho nub dang byang dag tu/ /lha min dud 'gro yi dgas dang / /dmyal ba rnams kyi sa bon gdab/ /hU~M gi lam sgo bcad par bya/ /lag gnyis mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan/ /sor mo gsum sbyar dpral

bar bsnol/ /lha dang lha min gnas dag tu/ /mi btang bzlog pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag gnyis bsnol nas mchan khung bsdam/ /mi yi khams nas bzlog pa'i rgya/ /khu tshur bcangs te 'bru bsgreng nas/ /g.yon gyi steng du
mnan pa 'di/ /byol song gnas nas bzlog pa'i rgya/ /thal mo mnyam sbyar gung rtse sprad/ /gung mo rgyab tu srin lag bsnol/ /mgul nas mdzub mos 'khyud pa ni/ /yi dgas khams las bzlog pa'i rgya/ /

g.yon thog g.yas kyi rgyab sbyar te/ /srin lag gung mdzub gcig nas gcig /'khyud pa dmyal ba'i sgo gcod brgya/ /lag gi phyag rgya bcas nas ni/ /ngag gi rdo rje rgya brjod pa/ /kye ma ru tra kro d+ha kyi hU~M/ hri sa ma

pa tsa hU~M/ hri sa ba dza hU~M/ 'di ltar gsal bar gyur pa dang / /sgrib pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i phyag rgya ste/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor mchog gi lha/ /'gro drug 'dren pa'i dpal mdzad pa/ /rdo rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byams mgon khyod la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de skad gsol ba btab pa dang / /rnal 'byor chen po'i zhabs nyid la/ /'jug pa de yi spyi bos gtug /sangs rgyas bde mchog thams cad kyi/ /rdo rje gsang mchog gsung las

byung / /srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pa/ /dbang bskur gnang ba chen po sbyin/ /A ti ho sta hri da kha~M/ /de nas snod du gyur pa dang / /gsang ba'i mig ni dbye bar bya/ /me tog phog pa'i lha yang sbyin/ /de nas dam tshig

chen po bsgrags/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /dam tshig 'di las gang 'das pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad bslus pa yin/ /khrag 'thung kha 'bar ma yi tshogs/ /khros nas snying khrag thog pas 'thung / /

badzra sa ma ya i dan the na ra gan/ ba ra hri da ya na ma ba sti nAn/ sa ma ya rak+Sha sid+d+hi bid+ya badzra a mr-i to da kha~M/ rdo rje tha tshig chu blud nas/ /rdo rje gal chen mna' dor ro/ /rdo rje dam tshig sdoms pa rnams/ /thams cad
thams cad dbog par bya/ /slob pa'i gnyer yang dbog par bya/ /kye rig 'dzin rdo rje bu mchog khyed/ /rnal 'byor rgyal ba'i sras kyi yin/ /gzhan yang gsang ba ma smra shig /gal te smras na dmyal bar
'tshig /khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo/ /rgyal ba'i sras po gdung rgyud 'dzin/ /gsang ba mchog gi ming sbyin gyi/ /zhing khams kun du bde bar spyod/ /des ni sangs rgyas zhing du skye/ /zhes gsungs so/ /
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje rnal 'byor 'jug ba'i le'u zhes bya ste sum bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //

de nas yang sems dpa'i rdo rjes yongs su rdzogs pa dbang gi le'u 'di gsungs so/ /'dus pa chen po'i rnal 'byor pa/ /srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas pas/ /bla ma'i sa la gnas pa ni/ /gsang mchog sum bcu rtsa

drug yin/ /phyi yi dbang dang nang gi dbang / /bsgrub pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang / /bcu dang bcu gcig bcu gsum dang / /rnam pa gnyis kyis rdzogs par 'gyur/ /de la dang po sbyin pa'i dbang 'di yin te/ oM hU~M sa hrIHha/

kun gyis 'da' bar dka' ba yi/ /tshig btsan yul la dbang sgyur ba/ /rgyal po bka' rtags phyag rgya'i dbang / /sku lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ /rigs rnams so so'i rgyud 'dzin cing / /rtags kyi mtshan ma chen po ni/ /

sbyor ba chen po'i phyag mtshan te/ /dam tshig phyag rgya rdzogs par 'gyur/ /shes rab gzungs kyi gsang mchog ni/ /don dang ldan par gyur pa yi/ /mtha' gnyis dag tu mi gtong ba'i/ /gzungs ma'i rgyal mo chen mo yin/ /

gnyis med yongs su rdzogs pa na/ /thams cad bde ba chen po'i ngang / /byang chub sems dang don du 'brel/ /shes rab chen po rdzogs pa'i dbang / /bkra shis chen po bum ba ni/ /bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i pho brang ste/ /

dkyil 'khor rdzogs par gyur pa yi/ /dbang chen de la sbyin par bya/ /gsang ba'i bstan pa rgyas nas ni/ /yun ring gnas par 'gyur ba yis/ /bkra shis rdzas kyi dbang mchog kyang / /gnang ba chen po sbyin par bya/ /

don rnams grub par 'gyur ba yi/ /'dod dgur re skong rin po che/ /rgyal srid rin chen sna bdun gyis/ /rgyal po mchog tu dbang bskur ro/ /rin chen pad ma seng ge'i khri/ /bla mar gyur pa'i gdan mchog de/ /khyad par

chen por gyur pa'i dbang / /khri chen dag la gzhag par bya/ /cod pan me tog phreng la sogs/ /dbang mchog brjid pa'i rgyan gyis klubs/ /dbu rgyan do shal se mo do/ /dpung rgyan rkang gdub lag gdub rnams/ /

dbang thob rgyal pos de la sbyin/ /dbang thob mdzes pas brjid pa'i rgyal po de/ /dbang phyug yin pas de la kun phyag 'tshal/ /rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal po'o zhes par ni/ /kun gyis sgra chen bod cing bsgrags par bya/ /gser gyi 'khor lo

rtsibs khyud ldan pa zhig /rgyal po de yi lag tu bskur nas ni/ /'jig rten kun la kha lo sgyur ba yi/ /dbang mchog rgyal po 'di yang sbyin par bya/ /phyi 'khor skyong ba'i rgyal por gyur phan chad/ /bla med mchog gi rtags dang

ldan 'gyur bas/ /gsang sgo phye nas nang du gzhug par bya/ /shin du gsang ba'i rdzas dang ldan gyur nas/ /gsang sgo gang las 'dod pa'i don rnams zhu/ /gnang chen po'i rtags su byin gyis brlab/ /gsang ba'i don la nyan cing slob

pa'i dbang / /dbang thob skal can de la sbyin par bya/ /bdud rtsi chu 'dis rna ba'i gsang sgo dbye/ /sarba ta thA ga ta sta ma ti ho/ /glegs bam zab mo la sogs thams cad rnams/ /rigs kyi bu mchog de la sbyin par bya/ /des na

'gro ba'i don byed nus pas na/ /las rnams rgya mtsho thams cad sgrub pa'i rtags/ /rdo rje rgya gram la sogs rnam bzhi'i rdzas/ /bu mchog de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya/ /gzhan gyi re 'dod skong ba'i bu mchog de/ /rgyal po

rgyal rigs rgyud du byung ba bzhin/ /rgyal tshab chos kyi rgyud du byung bas na/ /tan+t+ra la sogs dam pa'i mdzod gsum sbyin/ /des ni slob ma'i tshogs kun skyong nus phyir/ /bstan pa sgrogs pa'i sa la gnas bya'i phyir/ /rdo rje rgyal po dpal gyi dbang mchog 'di/ /theg chen dgu

yi rtags dang chas te sbyin/ /de ni bla med rgyal por 'gyur bas na/ /sa rnams non pa'i rtags mchog gdan khri'i dbang / /lha chen la sogs zhing chen nyi zlar bcas/ /khyu mchog seng ge ma he gzigs dang stag /gtum pa'i

dum gyis spar te sbyin par bya/ /rgyal po yin pa'i rtags ni rnam pa bdun/ /skye la dbang sgyur rgyal po mnyes pa'i gzungs/ /pha rol dpung 'joms srid thub 'dzin pa dang / /bdag gzhan don sgrub rdzu 'phrul rkang par ldan/ /dgos 'dod yid

bzhin skong ba'i rin po che/ /rgyal po de la thabs kyis sbyin par bya/ /de ni rgyal pa'i mchog sras yin pas na/ /phyag rgya chen po'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/ /ras sam 'bur ram lugs su blugs pa yi/ /phyag rgya'i gzugs brnyan de yi

spyi bor gzhag /ye shes chen po'i don dang de ldan pas/ /ye shes lnga yi rtags mchog phyag rgya yis/ /gnas lngar gtugs te thugs kyi dbang mchog sbyin/ /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra

swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA kr-i t+yA nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi/ /rnal 'byor bde mchog de yin

pas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gsang mchog 'di/ /rdo rje can la sbyin par bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ta kI ya badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ dbang mchog oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+ha ba

At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga Na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta p+'u dza badzra swa b+hA At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ dbang mchog thob pa'i bu mchog de/ /don rnams grub par bkra shis phyir/ /bdud 'dul bkra shis

rdzas mchog rnams/ /rtags kyis brgyan te sbyin par bya/ /don rnams grub pa'i bu mchog de/ /rdo rje dbang mchog thob pa na/ /zhing khams kun tu grags pa yi/ /rtsal gyi thig le rdo rje sbyin/ /nang du 'jug pa'i dbang thob

nas/ /de dag kun la spyod sgrub pa'i/ /dbang mchog dam pa sbyin par bya/ /skye med chos kyi dbyings nyid la/ /sems kyi dbang bskur thob pa yi/ /shes rab chen po rig pa'i dbang / /sems lon don gyi gtan tshigs

sbyin/ /bya ba'i mtshan ma kun bral zhing / /btsal med gnas pa'i byang chub sems/ /snying rje chen po'i bde mchog gis/ khams gsum kun la dbang sgyur sbyin/ /srid gsum 'gro ba'i don rnams kun/ /thams cad rdzogs

par nus pa yi/ /rtags kyi dbang mchog dam pa ni/ /thong gshol 'bar ba sbyin par byed/ /dug gsum gting nas sprug pa yi/ /rtags chen ga 'u rnam pa gsum/ /dmar chen dag gis bkang nas kyang / /dbang chen thob

de'i lag tu sbyin/ /srid gsum sgrol bar bya ba yi/ /dbang mchog chen po sbyin pa'i phyir/ /ka tar la sogs mtshon cha rnams/ /dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin/ /'khor ba'i chos la cir spyad kyang / /skyon gyis gos par

mi 'gyur ba'i/ /rtags kyi phyag rgya chen po ni/ /rnam dag rdzas kyi pad+ma sbyin/ /las rnams rdzogs par gyur pa yi/ /dbang mchog thob pa'i rtags chen ni/ /sti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dag /dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin/ /

yum dang gnyis med 'khril ba yi/ /chos nyid don dang gnyis med rtags/ /sbrul nag 'khril ba'i chun po 'di/ /dbang thob de yi lag tu sbyin/ /gsang ba sbyor ba'i shes rab ma/ /dri med rnam dag lha mo zhig /

mtshan ldan shin du brgyan byas la/ /dbang thob de la sbyin par bya/ /dbang thob rgyal po chen po de/ /kun gyi bdag po yin pas na/ /rol mo dri dang zhal zas dang / /'dod yon lnga la sogs pa dang / /nye ba'i

longs spyod rgyan rnams kun/ /thams cad thams cad sbyin par bya/ /sgrub pa'i rgyal po de la ni/ /sgrub pa'i las la dbang thob phyir/ /rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad bsgrub pa dang / /
rdo rje tshe dang sman la sogs/ /sgrub pa ma lus sgrubs shig ces/ /bsgrub rdzas thams cad sbyin par bya/ /rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dbang thob de gnyis gcig pa'i phyir/ /

rig 'dzin rdo rje rtsal gyi dbang / /rdo rje ming ni sbyin par bya/ /bsgrub pa'i dbang dang rdzas mchog dang / gsang ba'i bdag po yin pas na/ /gsang ba'i dbang mchog sbyin par bya/ /dga' ba byang chub sems chen po/ /
kun du tshim par byed pa yi/ /dkar dmar lhag pa'i byang chub sems/ /dbang thob de yi lce la gzhag /btsal med byang chub sems chen po/ /shes rab chen po'i rtsal gyis ni/ /chos sku sgyu mar
dbang bsgyur nas/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i dbang yin pas/ /rdzas dang tshig dang gang zag dang / /kun rdzob dbang de ma thob kyang / /chos la sems kyi dbang thob na/ /rgyal ba'i
rig 'dzin thams cad dang / /srid gsum dbang can thams cad kun/ /de la dbang thob bskur bar 'gyur/ /dbang gi tshad ni 'di lta ste/ /dad ldan srid zhur ldan pa la/ /gsang ba nyan pa'i
dbang chen bskur/ /rnam bzhi las kyi don tshang na/ /las rnams byed pa'i dbang thob bo/ /lta ba'i dmigs bus chos mthong na/ /rgyal theb 'chad pa'i dbang thob bo/ /rkyen thub
tshad ma gsum ldan na/ /bla ma rdo rje slob dpon dbang / /dam pa mdzod gsum thams cad la/ /phyogs med par ni 'chad shes nas/ /rab 'byam rgyal po'i dbang 'thob bo/ /dad med
blo zhan rdzob pa che/ /tshul 'chos mkhan la ras gcod byed/ /de ni dbang gis 'tshig par bshad/ /gsang med brjed ngas dbang mi 'chags/ /dad med g.yel rmugs dbang mi 'gos/ /
snod med bcud bral kun stongs pa/ /des ni dbang thob ma yin no/ /snod ldan bcud rdzogs dbang thob na/ /dbang mchog thob pa'i rgyu zhes bshad/ /ces gsungs so// //
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las rdo rje dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po dang /

sems dpa'i rdo rje dam pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo dang bcas pa chos thams cad kyi me long yin par rig nas/ 'dus pa phal mo che'i 'khor rnams kyis shin du ngam zhing ngo mtshar skyes nas/ bstod pa shin tu dga' ba chen po'i
glu 'di blangs so/ /e ma hoH nyes bcom legs ldan mtshan zhi mtha' las 'das/ /dpag med byams snyoms don gyis bdag gzhan dpal/ /don dam gsang sbas nam mkha'i dkyil du 'khyil/ /rdo rje che mchog

dbang phyug kun gyi bdag /'dzin pa mi rtog sha rus khrag la rol/ /thugs kyi gdung thag 'khor ba'i mtha' la rje/ /yul med ma skyes mtshan ma'i g.yul las rgyal/ /bde mchog rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

shes rab chen po nam mkha'i nyi mar gsal/ /byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dbyings su 'char/ /dpa' brtul myur ba'i shugs kyis 'gro drug sgrol/ /rtog 'joms ye shes rdo rje cho 'phrul 'phro/ /dam pa'i don gsungs

gnyis med ston pa'i sku/ /smra ba'i seng ge khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rin chen gter ldan 'dod dgur kun skong zhing / /lung dang rigs pa gtan tshigs kun gyi mdzod/ /brda can yang dag len pa'i me long gsal/ /

rdo rje kun 'dus 'jigs byed rgyal ba'i rgyud/ /chos kyi me long 'di la bdag cag 'dud/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo las ngo mtshar bstod pa'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// //
rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje bkod pa kun 'dus rig pa'i mdo rdzogs so// // bkra shis so/ dge'o/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya gar+b+ha ta twa bi ni sh+tsa ya/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bshad pa'i dus na/

de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid/ ma lus mi lus

lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang /

rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma

lus pa thams cad dang so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil ba/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur

pa/ spags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs

dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyi phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par klubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi

rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa/ kun du yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang / dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thog pa med pa namakha'

lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhal thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du

ldan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun du snang ba dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye

shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang /

de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / leb rgan dang / ljang gu'i

mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang / sra ba'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun du

mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po'i rdo rje thos pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang /

byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / mnam par bya ba dang / myong bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang /

byang chub chen po rdo rje mnom byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / 'byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa chen po reg pa dang / 'joms pa chen po reg byed dang / 'joms pa chen po reg

bya dang / 'joms pa chen po reg shes dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /e e e ma'o/ /

de bzhin nyid dbyings nyid dbang sgyur/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang / /rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzin/ /gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam par dag gsal ba ni sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yon tan yid

bzhin rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun du bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rje btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to/ /zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus

pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o rdo rje phung po yan lag ni/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags/ /skye mched khams

rnams mang po kun/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid/ /sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI/ /me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste/ /nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/ /srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing / /thams
cad ma lus chos so cog /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin/ /sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so/ /zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /kye ma phyogs bcu'i stong khams
ye nas dben/ /srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing / /snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas/ /phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /thams cad mchog gi snying po bas/ /gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal/ /
nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so/ /zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /de nas gnyis su med pa'i

bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /skye ba med las thams cad skye/ /skyes pa
nyid na 'ang skye ba med/ /e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag /'gag pa nyid na 'ang 'gag pa med/ /e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /gnas pa med las thams cad gnas/ /gnas pa nyid na 'ang gnas pa med/ /e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /dmigs
pa med las thams cad dmigs/ /dmigs pa nyid na 'ang dmigs pa med/ /e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong / /'gro 'ong nyid na 'ang
'gro 'ong med/ /ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang mnyes pas khyab par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs

dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma 'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos/ /sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang / /ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang / /gzhan du min la shin du gsang / /zhes brjod pas/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na 'ang / 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi

khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma bde gshegs snying po las/ /rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul/ /sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang / /
gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa/ /bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin/ /sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de/ /bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin/ /rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis/ /
nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa dor/ /bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos/ /bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad/ /ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //
de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs shes bya ba'i rigs pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'thon to/ /

'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re re thub pa bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i
don mdzad de/ /bltams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' thub mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang /

mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad du gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyi

kun tu gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun tu don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang / kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du
thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grangs med pa phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to/ /

thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang / mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg

pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad kyang gzung
ba dang / 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / 'dzin pa 'khrul pa las 'dogs pa dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos/ gos
par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar thug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos/ /ma rig rtog pa'i

gzung 'dzin gyis/ /phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor/ /mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med/ /yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su/ /bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de/ /rnam dag
dbyings nyid tshul gcig go/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni/ /log par rtog pa tsam nyid las/ /phra zhing zab pa 'ang yod ma yin/ /log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de/ /gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /

log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyu nyid kyang / /gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma/ /rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul/ /nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir/ /bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun/ /rnam dag bla med theg pa'i
mchog /theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la/ /theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/ /yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na/ /rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub/ /sangs rgyas mya ngan yong
mi 'da'/ /chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te/ /ma rig sman mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir/ /byung nas mya ngan 'da' bar ston/ /'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang / /dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang / /sku dang
gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud/ /phyogs bcu rnams su rab grags pa/ /gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te/ /rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di/ /sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi/ /'byung gnas gtan la nges
par 'bebs/ /chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam/ /ston pas don dang 'thun phyogs su/ /ming dang tshig tu btags nas bstan/ /ston min tshig la dngos po med/ /ces ched du brjod do/ /de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a ho/ /srid rtsa nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros/ /rgyud drug skye 'gag lus

dang longs spyod dang / /gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa/ /log rtog nyid las gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med/ /stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs/ /dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang

sgyur/ /ngo mtshar sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las zhing khams las/ /gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin/ /zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas/ thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar/ chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku dang /

gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las/ /shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas/ /bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par bstan/ /de las ming tshogs gsal

'bar kun/ /spro zhing bsdu ba 'ang de bzhin no/ /'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi/ /brtan byung ye shes rgyu yin no/ /a A/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Ta D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/
k+ShaH i I/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ /'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos nas/ chos thams cad ming gi

mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to/ /hoH de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma 'ang dmigs su yod ma yin/ /thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun/ /

yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas/ /a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i/ /ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis/ /sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus/ /mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges/ /e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi/ /'phrul

chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming / /tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas/ /sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston/ /dngos med yi ge'i rang bzhin sems/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang / /dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs
kyis/ /rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi/ /ye shes sems dpa' sku gsung thugs/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid/ /yi ge mgo nas k+ShaH la rdzogs/ /sems kyi

rang bzhin yi ge ste/ /yi ge'i dngos po yod ma yin/ /dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che/ /sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi/ /ngo mtshar 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa/ /dbyings

la dbyings kyis bris pa ste/ /yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod/ /mgo ni ma nor lam yin te/ /tig ni shes rab ming du smra/ /shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod/ /a ni skye med de bzhin nyid/ /A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid/ /

Tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid/ /Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid/ /Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid/ /D+ha ni sgyu 'phrul snang bdag nyid/ /Na ni kun du sgyu 'phrul nyid/ /tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid/ /ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid/ /

da ni dra bas lhan ni nyid/ /d+ha ni dra bas 'khril ba nyid/ /na ni dra bas kun du 'gyur/ /ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyis mchog /g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs

kyi mchog /nga ni thugs kyang 'jigs byed pa'o/ /tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog /tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog /dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog /dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog /nya ni sku 'ang 'jig byed pa'o/ /pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog /
pha ni snyan gyi gsung gi mchog /ba ni shangs kyi gsung gi mchog /b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gyi mchog /ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed/ /ya ni skye ba rnam par dag /wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin/ /ra ni 'jig

pa dag pa ste/ /la ni stong pa dag pa'o/ /sha ni rtag pa med pa ste/ Sha ni chad pa 'ang yod ma yin/ /sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa/ /ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid/ /k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs/ /i ni rdul snyed

lha rnams su/ /I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin/ /u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su/ /U ni rdul snyed byol song rnams/ /e ni rdul snyed yi dgas su/ /ai ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams/ /oM ni thams cad 'jig par byed/ /au ni thams cad zhig pa yin/ /yi ge

'khor lo tshogs chen 'di/ /sku gsung thugs kyi phreng bas bsdus/ /zhes brjod do/ /a ho/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku

dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / a hoH thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo/ /'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis/ /

'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam/ /'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin/ /hoH rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur

to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bkor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phro ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /rtsa ba med pa'i

sems nyid ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te/ /yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas/ /phyogs

bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang / /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing / /longs spyod 'byung pa ngan song sbyong / /cir yang gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub/ /

nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing / /'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang / /chur 'gyur 'bab pa 'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten khams 'di 'dor ba dang / /thams cad stongs shing ltung bar 'gyur/ /dgug dang btang dang bcing dang grol/ /

gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i/ /ming tshig gzugs sogs yid bzhin gyis/ /mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du/ /'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul/ /

ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal/ /dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams/ /ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan/ /'grub 'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag /dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ /

zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/ /'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste/ /dngos po med las dngos po sprin/ /sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur/ /dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par/ /rtog pa'i dbang sgyu ting 'dzin yin/ /

gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa/ /de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes/ /de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa/ /'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /pho mo ma yin ma ning min/ /mtshan

med ma yin rigs rgyud min/ kha dog ma yin dbyings ma yin/ /gnas su ma yin gang yang min/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas/ /tha dad med la

tha dad pa'i/ /nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol/ /'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog /gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems/ /mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas

rab bstan na/ /dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste

lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi myu khyud bcas/ /gru chad

bzhis brgyan bar khyams ldan/ /kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin spung bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/ /seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung / /nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la/ /

nyi zla pad ma rin po che/ /gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul/ /'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang / /g.yas na mthong thos snom pa dang / /myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chad la ni mthong byed dang / /

thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas/ /bar khyams la ni thub drug dang / /mdun dang rgyab na byed pa dang / /bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan/ /sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni/ /
btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /pad ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/ /uta pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/ /mthing ga dkar po ser le
brgan/ /ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can/ /gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste/ /

mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub/ /sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni/ /de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang / /'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ /

'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston/ /stong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/ /tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i/ /de tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la/ /so so 'dra bar snang ba ni/ /de bzhin nyid

kyis ma bcos kyang / /las 'phro'i dbang gis so sor snang / /dper na me long chu zla bzhin/ /de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la/ /sdig sbong gzugs su rnam par bstan/ /dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs/ /rang rgyal

rnams la bse ru'i gzugs/ /gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin/ /'og min bla med gnas mchog tu/ /sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la/ /de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste/ /

sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston/ /me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du/ /dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel/ /'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na/ /byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med/ /me long bzhin du sku la snang / /
