de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byang / /bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob/ /chos sku dpag med brjod du med/ /longs spyod zad med rin chen gter/ /sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad

rdzogs/ /spyod yul kun du maN+Da la/ /tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol/ /thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog /de la sogs te bsam yas mchog / skye shi med pa g.yung drung sku/ /nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du

gnas/ /zad mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa rig pa'i sku/ /thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs/ /zhes brjod pas/ 'jig

rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed gcig gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor

de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a ho/ /dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs

brjod mi lang / /mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings/ /ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med/ /ho/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil

'khor sbros pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /b+h+ru~M bi swa bi shud+d+he/ hU~M badzra

d+h+rika /oM dzi na dzika /swA~M rad+na d+h+ri ka /A~M A ro lika /ha~M pradz+nyA d+h+rika /mU~M d+hA twI shwa rI/ lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/ mA~M mo ha ra ti/ pA~M rA ga ra ti/ tA~M badzra ra ti/ k+ShI~M hi rA dza ya/ trA~M A gar+b+ha ya/ hrI~M ha hU~M/ pad+ma ba da ma/ dzI~M ku ru pA Ni hriH hU~M lA s+ye

sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ trA~M mA l+ye sa ma ya ho: hrI~M gI ti rA gau\u0f85ha~M/ A~M nr-i t+ya rA ga yA mye/ mai d+hA ra Ne swA hA/ th+l+hI~M ni s+sa ra~M b+ha ya swA hA/ hU~M sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mu~M shrI a~M rA gA ya swA hA/ dzeH d+hu pa pra bi sa/ hU~M puSh+pa a bi sa/ ba~M dI pa su khA nI/

hoH gan+d+ha tsit+ta~M/ hU~M ya mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hU~M pad+mAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hU~M pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hU~M bi g+ha nAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/

oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kar+m+ma d+ha ra~M ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dz+wa la nI hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsit+ta oM a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man+ta AH oM mu ne hri~M swA hA/ oM mu ne hU~M swA hA/ oM mu ne sru~M swA hA/

oM mu ne gra~M swA hA/ oM mu ne k+Sha~M swA hA/ oM mu ne ya swAhA/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoH sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH oM A~MH hU~M swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ pa pa pa pa pa/ dza dza dza dza dza/ pa pa pa pa pa/ sa sa sa

sa sa/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ya ya ya ya ya/ pa pa pa pa pa/ oM A~MH hU~M swA hA/ /ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen

por bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM badzra sa ma ya hoH dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH zhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par grags so/ /rab tu grags

so/ /kun du grags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do/ /de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen

po'i ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma

ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+Tha na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ga badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga

ta ma hA tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur/ /gsal bar gyur/ 'bar bar gyur to/ /

e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung / /sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung / /gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab/ /

sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags/ /thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya'i mchog /rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ /bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba 'ang / /thams cad pad ma'i ngang gyur na/ /grol thar lam

dang 'khor ba'i sgra/ /ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog yin/ /theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang / /log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad/ /byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus/ /bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags/ /

grags nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs/ /gsung ba nyid na brjod du med/ /brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra/ /kun la grags shing so sor mjal/ /dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs bzhin/ /gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go /

'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin/ /theg pa mtho dman thams cad kyang / /de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te/ /gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos/ /ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang / /de bzhin nyid las gsungs pa med/ /

yi ge med dang rig ba'i gsung / /ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang / /thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis/ /'gro don sna tshogs so sor gsal/ /gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog /de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don
rnams/ /de bzhin ngang las ma yos kyang / /dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdus pa dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /

gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi/ /snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka' 'o/ /mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du sbrad pa las/ /sbyar pas phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /oM dang mU~M gnyis rtse sbyar te/ /

'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtse sprad pa/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril

ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ mu~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi spas nas thugs kar

dkan/ /oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /lA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru

lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /swA bsgreng rtse mor rin chen 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /
'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /mA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /A~MH bsgreng

rtse mor pad ma 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /pyA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /

btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /hA bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs

kar bkan/ /tA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar/ /pad ma dkar po rdo rje

'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen snye/ /gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang / /pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid de/ /me tog phreng dang spos mchog dang / /mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i/ /las la 'khril zhing

chos la brtan/ /dbung rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul/ /gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril/ /sgo bzhi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /nr-i mgo gdengs dang rdo rje gnon/ /thod sbrul chen pos gnod

pa dang / /rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon/ /lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta ho/ /sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang / /'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin/ /thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug

yin no/ /segs par dang ni pi wang dang / /go cha po ti rin chen sgrom/ /me dang chu ni rab tu bstan/ /yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings/ /kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'phro/ /yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i

dkyil/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid dam/ /yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan 'byor na/ /ma bskyod ma bsgul thams cad kun/ /

phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas/ /yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gsum 'phror 'gyur/ /de ltar ldan pa'i gtso mchog gis/ /rgyal ba rgyal mchog de bzhin du/ /bcu

gnyis drug gi 'od 'phror 'bar/ /de la sogs te bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su/ /'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston/ /theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang / /phyin ci log rnams thams cad dang / /zhi khro tshogs

chen thams cad la/ /so sor 'thun par kun du ston/ /dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba/ /lus las ma bkod sna tshogs ston/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni/ /'di zhes gcig ces brjod tu med/ /gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro/ /

bskyod dang spro ba 'ang de bzhin nyid/ /mdor na bsgul bskyod thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas/ /gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa min/ /de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges

pa las/ yan lag dkyil 'khor du byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas

ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste/ /sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya/ /'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga/ /snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang / /bdud rtsi

lnga ni rab bsnyams la/ /rig pas thig ni gdab par bya/ /lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi/ /rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas/ /gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi/ /bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya/ /sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la/ /tsa na'i 'bru tsam

pad ma'i gdan/ /yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge la/ /phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri/ /bcos bu ras ni sna tshogs dang / /rgyan phreng bro ba'i btung bas bskor/ /glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi/ /sprin dpung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod/ /yum dang 'jom

sems ma yis/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod/ /dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan par/ /zhal du gyur pa'i ma bos la/ /bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /las bzhi'i mchod pa rab tu sbyin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/ /

shin du phra la sbyangs pa yis/ /bsam yas dag la 'ang de bzhin bya/ /rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o/ /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing / /mnyen 'jam

reg na bde ba yi/ /sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi/ /mdzes pas bris shing spras pa dang / /kun 'byung rin chen phung por 'bar/ /dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil/ /rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / /rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal/ /

glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/ /bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/ /do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang / /rang la mdzes par brgyan pa yi/ /lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyis/ /bro gar la sogs

bsam yas kyis/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul/ /skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis/ /rim gyis yang na cig car du/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /

mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs la/ /stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du/ /dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod/ /mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog /bdag nyid chen
po mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum 'gro ba thams cad la/ /dga' ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi/ /
sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang / khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du 'gyur/ /lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad/ /gang na 'ang mi gnas mi dmigs pa/ /mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' la ni
nam mkha' sgom/ /kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang
yid 'thad dbul/ /dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ /nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/ /nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtog

nas/ /phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang / /rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung / /yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas/ /phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dzub gang tshad du bya/ /

mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya/ /yang na sa gzhi rab mnyams la/ /dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya/ /yang na lus gang tshad du ste/ /yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad/ /phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang / /gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong

grogs/ /thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya/ /yang na khru ni bcu drug dang / /nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lnga bya/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs

kyang dgod/ /yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad tsam/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/ /ma mthong rmongs pa bstan phyir mtshon/ kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga 'am/ /lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /

'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye/ /ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog /yi ge 'am brda 'am snying po 'am/ /phyag rgya 'am sku gsung thugs ldan par/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che/ /'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam/ /sa la

sogs la phyag rgya byas/ /rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i ye shes gyis sbyangs na/ /smos ci dgos te de nyid yin/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas/ /dkyil 'khor

thams cad spyan drang ngo / /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas/ /phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur ba'i dam tshig mchog /

dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ /rin po che dang 'byung ba kun/ /de dag rdzas yod ma yin te/ /rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad po che/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /thabs la

brten pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu yi ngang du byung / /shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid/ /thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir/ /ye shes la ni ye shes rol/ /ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang / /

byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te/ /bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis/ /sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog /cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing / /yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/ /sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas/ /ma nyams 'jug

la rab brtson pas/ /zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /

ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas pa/ /rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang / /'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /

dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ /mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang / /rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba/ /'thun pa'i shes rab snang ba'o/ /gcig dang du mar bral ba yi/ /mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyis kyang

mi gzigs te/ /rang byung ye shes gnas med snang / /log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing / /ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na/ /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang / /bde ba chen po'i dkyil

'khor na/ /stangs dbyal gnyis sam yang na lnga/ /byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na/ /'dod pa'i yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur/ /skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de/ /gnyer na nye bar 'byung ba yin/ /ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges/ /
dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur/ /zhes ched du brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las/ /bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun/ /rdo rje'i lam nas pad

mor bskyil/ /rtsa nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bsgyur/ /nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /trA~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /gsang ba gsang

chen gsang mchog las/ /gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya/ /gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa las/ /gzhan du smra bar bya ba yin/ /gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs

mchog las/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/ /oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung / /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /lag pa'i

'khor lo gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /hU~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis/ /las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig /pho nya

mang po'i 'du 'phro kun/ /khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin/ /smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /hri yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM chos kyi bdud rtsi

bla med kyis/ /dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la/ /'thun pa'i gsang bsgrags gzhan du min/ /bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /hU~M oM swA A~MH

hA rnams las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod/ /slob dpon mnyes par

ma byas shing / /dbang rnams thob par ma byas par/ /nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur/ /dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang / go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang / /gdugs dang bum pa bza'

btung dang / /snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na/ /dus 'di phyin cad rgyal ba'i sras/ /ngan song thams cad med pa dang / /tshe ring bde skyid phun sum tshogs/ /mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /zhes brjod do/ /gsang

ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du

brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul/ /byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par/ /rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che/ /yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun/ /rnam smin oM

du shes par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/ /rnam smin m+'u~M du shes par bya/ /yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na khro mo'i

dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig /bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung gis/ /hU~M du shes pas rab spyad na/ /ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dbye 'am yang na
mi dbye bar/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po/ /sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po/ /yum gyi pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la/ /

dgyes mnyam tshogs kyi sbyin pas bstim/ /bsgrub pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor de/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blang / /mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs/ /yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /zhing 'gyur mchog

dang mchog phran rnams/ /nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas bzhag /nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom/ /hU~M du gyur pas rnam par dag /dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar/ /skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/ /

gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba sgom/ /ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs/ /ye shes skye med de bzhin nyid/ /sgyu mar snang ba mi g.yor tshul/ /sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang / /rdul cha tsam yang gos pa med/ /snod bcud rgyu rnams

dag rtogs shing / /mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i zhing / /byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas/ /yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan/ /cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis/ /rnal

'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/ /lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis/ /tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la/ /khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/ /'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom/ /de bzhin rigs

dang rdo rje'i rigs/ /pad ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs/ /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/ /thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog /khro bo'i tshogs dang

ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gcig dang lha rnams bsgom/ /khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang / /pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs/ /ci bgyi la sogs tshogs rnams kyis/ /dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed/ /rnal 'byor

sngags 'chang dngos grub ni/ /mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ngang gnas shing / /spyod pa ci la 'ang thogs med pa/ /thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'o/ /rdo rje rigs su thams cad dkyil/ /'od 'phro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom/ /

chags med tshul du bstim par bya/ /gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che/ /yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de/ /thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /

rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar 'grub/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ /rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas/ /sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni/ /thabs dang shes rab thams cad

kyis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro/ /gnyis su med par bstim par bya/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub/ /rnal 'byor thabs

dang shes rab kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom/ /sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom/ /so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal/ /gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang / /ma nyams

blo ni rab ldan pas/ /dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya/ /le lo sgyid snyom med pa yis/ /the tshom med par bsgrub byas na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thob/ /bsgrub pa'i zhag dang

tshes grangs ni/ /rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bshad/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil

'khor gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkong pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis/ /'dzum lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /

rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub/ /bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub/ /A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis/ /thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /

shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs/ /'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/ /nus mthu can du gang gyur pa/ /rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags/ /mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi/ /skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyang / /khyad par

sa la gnas 'gyur yin/ /pha rol phyin pa kun du rdzogs/ thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog /shes rab mchog gi mchog 'gyur pa/ /sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum/ /rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs/ /mkha'

dkyil dag pa'i dbyings nyi zla/ /ye shes rgyal po stangs dbyal bsgom/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas kun/ /ma lus par ni bsgom par 'gyur/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi

'gyur/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig /dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang / /skyon nyid dag ste nyes
pa med/ /ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin

du gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs/ / phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang / /

rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni/ /yi ge sgra rtags ming tshogs las/ /brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te/ /khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /

dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te/ /

byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs/ / dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams/ /kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis/ /thugs kyi ye shes lngas bltas shing / /snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba/ /bde ba'i

ye shes rol mo yis/ /ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul/ /zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba'i/ /rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi

dngos/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i/ /dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil

'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las/ /thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung / /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mchog /sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis/ /

bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thos bsam bsgom la mnyam sbyor gyis/ /rang 'byung kun ngom lhun gyis grub/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog /

gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ /phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /shin tu sbyangs

la rab gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /'das dang da ltar byung ba yi/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /brnyes nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs/ /

'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun/ /'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi/ /'bras bu lam du 'gyur pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /'di las gsang ba'i nges don med/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas

mi brnyes so/ /kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog /thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i/ /shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung / /snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan/ /lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin/ /gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /

rmongs la phyar bas gal te byin/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin du gsang
ba/ man ngag gi le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil 'khor la dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so/ /oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa

yi/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che/ /bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs/ /snang stong thig le kun tu rdzogs hoH/ /oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che/ /rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan/ /rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po

thig le che hoH/ /oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che/ /yon tan 'phrin las kun du rdzogs/ /ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang / /'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che hoH/ /oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /mtha' yas

kun nas sna tshogs 'phro/ /mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim/ /sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po hoH/ /oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis/ /

skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub hoH/ /oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che/ /sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab/ /sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che hoH/ /zhes ched du bsgrags so/ /gsang

ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang / brtags pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag /gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas srid pa'i

sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so/ /de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang / 'di bas shin tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa'i

sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyan pa/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang / shin du grang ba la sogs pa brgyad du 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su nyams su myong ngo / /

de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dgas ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang / yod med par yang gyur cing

shin tu ring cing skams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang / dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa/ bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so/ /de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas

yi dgas srin po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la mgo brgya pa dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgya la mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs pa dang /

gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / 'khor rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sgra skad sna tshogs pa sgrogs pa dang / gzugs dang / nga ro dang / dri dang / kha rlangs kyis

thams cad skye bung zhes byed pa dang / rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun tu khams 'khrug par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed

pa'i mthus klu'i rigs dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ris dang / tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so/ /de sngon brten pa'i stobs kyis thams cad mkhyen

pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa chen po'i rdo rje bkod pa/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas 'jig rten drug gis/ phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid chen po

bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba chen po rnam par spros pa'i/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings las khro mo dbang phyug ma chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad ma rgyas par mdzad nas ni gnyis su med par dgyes pa'i 'khril bas thim nas

byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hU~M hU~M phaT/ ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa khyab par gyur to/ /

khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur pas/ 'jig rten drug gis phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du g.yos so/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur
'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo/ /shig shig /rab tu shig shig /kun du rab tu shig shig go/ gtor gtor/ rab tu gtor gtor/ kun du rab tu gtor

gtor ro/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang / gzi brjid che ba dang / mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po nyid

'jigs byed chen po shin tu rngam pa skyi bung zhes byed pa 'bar ba chen po'i khrag 'thung / sku smug gnag cir yang 'gyur pa/ dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir

gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil na keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng / 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang / dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa khyo shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs

so/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor sprin phung gi tshogs thams cad de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lho phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni dpal

khrag 'thung chen po pad mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun du las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so/ /de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang / rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'bar ba'i klong na dbu

gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / gshin rje la sogs pa khyo shug gis gdan byas pa la bzhugs so/ /btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so sor sku la 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /

rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstim te bsdus nas/ gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan te/ de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum po'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan nas mgrin gcig tu gdug

pa'i nga ros glang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer cing shin du gdug pa'i sems kyis khros nas rngam mo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas

thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin du khros nas rngam pa'i skad kyis/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ha ha ha khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po'i tshogs chen po de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nang khrol kun drangs

yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs nas rus pa kun 'chos so/ /de nas hU~M hU~M hU~M b+h+yo e A ra li dzaHdzaH zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam gyi nang du

chud par bsdus so/ /de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang /

gzhon nu ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be chon mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos pa dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang /

gsod byed ma dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad ma dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa/ bran dang /

yang bran dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog dang / 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed bsdus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed chen por snang bar byas nas/

de dag kun dgyes par rol pa'i dkyil 'khor sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM A~MHhU~M badzra pra be sha a la la hoH zhes brjod pas 'byung mo'i rgyal mo rnams shin

du chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi'i srin mo dang / dmar mo dang /

dga' ba mo dang / gsod byed ma dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo nag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rje'i sku la tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang

dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu ma rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be chon mo dang / za ba mo dang / srin mo rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad ma'i sku la khrag gis myos ma dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo rnams 'khril lo/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun du las kyi sku la me

mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed ma dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo rnams 'khril lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis hU~M zhes brjod pas pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin tu

bcum par gyur to/ /de nas dgyes he ha zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin dag las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs dang / sbos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshogs

dang / rme sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma tshogs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du bcas nas 'thon to/ /'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis rang rang gi lag

cha dang bcas nas 'khod do/ /de nas shin tu dgyes he he he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / bzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs

dang / kAng ka'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / dur bya'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 'ug pa'i gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas thon par gyur to/ /'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyi rol

shar gyi phyogs nas 'khor bar rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do/ /de nas shin tu dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus pa khyab par byas nas phaT ces brjod pas/ rdo rje srid 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdong ma'i tshogs dang

rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to/ /'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin du rngam pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so/ /

de nas dgyes pa'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas/ ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin par bkye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal

khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po bdud rtsi chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /oM badzra ma hA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+ha a~M a~M a~M zhes brjod pas/

dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi snams nas bton nas/ mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtsho chen por chud pa las/ snam nas khro bo uts+tshu sma kro d+ha phyung nas 'dam khu kun 'thungs pas dran pa slar

rnyed de/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad brgya/ zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo / /de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i

srid pa gsum gyi bdag po dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul lo/ /de nas de dag shin tu 'dar zhing rab tu bred cing zhus pa'i nga ros smras pa'i tshig /

'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ /mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing / /snying yang 'gas shing gtugs 'gyur cing / /rul myags tshig nas brlag pa dang / /dmyal bar lhung nas

'bod par shog /ces 'bangs su mchi bar mnas bor nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang / ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/ dkyil 'khor
chen por bzhes su gsol/ /dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol/ /bdag cag so so'i 'khor bcas kyis/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar/ /

g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i/ /sems kyis blangs te spyi bo yi/ /gtsug tu bzhag te bkur bar bya/ /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/ /gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir/ /smras pa

bzhin du ma bgyis na/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus snying / /bkas gtubs dum bur rul bar 'chi/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas de dag gi chung ma'i tshogs dang / sring mo dang ma dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad dkyil 'khor du

yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor bcas thams cad kun/ /dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi/ /dpa' bo chen po bdag cag rnams/ /las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/ /

zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje byin nas ming gis dbang bskur nas dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sprin rnam par

spros pa'i le'u ste/ bcwa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo'i

tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gis/ sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da/ sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma hA

shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru

ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI sarba duSh+TA~M hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dz+wa li nI hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA sur+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI bi da ma hU~M phaT/ oM hrI sha ha sa man+ta pad+ma oM

ma hA sA ra swa ta ma hA pad+ma/ ma hA kro d+hI shwa rI kha hAM hU~M phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha karma ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI bi shwa hU~M phaT/ oM badzra gI rI ye kau rI ha/ badzra tsau rI ha/ badzra pra mo hA ha/ badzra bait+ta lI ha/ badzra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badzra puk+ka sI ha/ badzra g+hasma

rI ha/ badzra sma shA nI ha/ badzra sid+ha mu khI he/ badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI hi/ badzra sr-i gA la mu khI he/ badzra shwa na mu khI he/ badzra grid+d+ha mu khI he/ badzra kang+ka/ mu khI he/ badzra kA ka mu khI he/ badzra ul+lu ka mu khA he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza

te ra dzaH badzra a mu kA hU~M/ badzra lo kA ba~M/ badzra b+hasmi sa ma la ba to hoH b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ oM ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M/ e h+ye hi a na ya/ dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma

ya hU~M/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/ /'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ a li

u li tA li ta pA li da~M Sh+TaM/ gau na rau tri kha~M ra~M/ yo gi nI khA hi hoH hU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten khams phyogs bcu thams cad kun tshig /rab tu tshig /kun tu rab tu tshig go/ 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar ro/ /

thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang / rab tu gang / kun du rab tu gang bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gis dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa/ /gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis
kyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang pos 'khrug /khyu mchog ma he gzigs dang stag /gtum pa dom gyi sbar ba yis/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung / /smug nag

sngo nag ser nag dang / /dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ /ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon/ /rngam pa'i sgra skad 'jigs par sgrogs/ /sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlas brjid/ /stong gi

'jig rten khor yug bcas/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs/ /rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang 'khril/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes

shing / /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/ /rang gi stan dang lag cha dang / /ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas/ /zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du

gsal bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen po 'di ched du brjod do/ /de la mchod

sbyin dam pa 'di/ /thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje/ /gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya/ /'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes

par bya/ /mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la dbul/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir
gshegs pa yi/ /bde gshegs yon tan rmad po che/ /gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te/ /lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya chen por rdzogs gyur cing / /gsal

ba yid gnyis med pa na/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchog sbyin dam pa bstan pa'i le'u

ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig chen po 'di ched du brjod do/ /bla med theg pa rab nges na/ /nyon mongs 'dod lnga kun spyad kyang / /byas la

mi sogs tshogs 'gyur te/ /tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs/ /bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis tshul khrims dang / /ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/ /ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /yod med dbu ma 'ang mi

dmigs shing / /sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul/ /srog med srog gcod gcad du med/ /srog kyang skyes bu'i log rtog tsam/ /bden pa gnyis kar dbye med pas/ /'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min/ /gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir/ /blangs

med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu la/ /ming dang tshig tu brtags pa brdzun/ /brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa/ /brdzun zhes btags tsam yod ma yin/ /ma chags pa la chags pa dang / /chags pa nyid na chags pa med/ /de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste/ /

shin tu chags pa chen po yin/ /bla med mi spang bla ma bkur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/ /gsang ba'i don nyid smra mi bya/ /'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te/ /bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog /

gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo / /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/ /dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro/ /yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste/ /ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad/ /bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga/ /

rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur/ /mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni/ /yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yin/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas/ /'das nas sangs rgyas

ma yin no/ /rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson dang / /skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed/ /nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang / /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur/ /yid du

mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/ /'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dud/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung / /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/ /gcig la

'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ /gcig la 'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbye/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa/ /rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed

spro/ /gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /sgrub byed dam pa ma lus 'grub/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa de/ /'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur/ /

dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis/ /sras dang sbun dgongs byin gyis rlob/ /bder gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs/ /'jigs med kun du bzang por sbyor/ /ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs/ /ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/ /ma lus

rnam dag lhun gyis grub/ /nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang / /de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog /ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// //gsang ba'i snying po de kho na

nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste/ bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/ /khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas

pa bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje phur pas gdab/ /rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul/ /e yi tshog kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lug gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo/ /myos nas gal te 'tshig par

'gyur/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba'i gzi chen lhun chen la/ /chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas pa byas/ /

rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab/ /chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /'gug 'gyur rdo rje 'ang phyi bzhin 'brang / /ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ma yi

tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba'i 'du 'phro gzi byin la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya/ /yon tan yid

bzhin gter tu brtag /nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab/ /rdo rje gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur/ /mi yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas/ /gzi byin 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen 'phro/ /yid bzhin nam mkha'

gang bar 'gyur/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /gtum po rngam po lhan ner 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /gtum rngam 'khrug

pa'i ngo bor brtag /lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab/ /'bar ba lhane'i tshogs su dbul/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdam/ /'bar ba lhan ne'i byin gyis khyab/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par

byed/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin/ /rang gi dam tshig rang bsgrags na/ /gang 'dod las ni byed par bsgo/ /sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka /shin du gdug cing gtum bag can/ /thams cad ma

lus 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /dbang dang byin brlabs rmad po che/ /lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas/ /'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas/ /so so'i las rnams bskos pa de/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa/ /ma thog

myur du mngon par phyung / /dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na/ /ji ltar rang gi mnas bor ba'i/ /sdom byas de las 'da' ma byed/ /sdom byas de las 'das gyur na/ /mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun/ /yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur/ /

de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis/ /ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos/ /las de sngon du ma byas na/ /rang gis khas blangs mnas bor bzhin/ /rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/ /rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i/ /las rnams

yongs su bya ba dang / /'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs/ /'phra men ma yang dngos grub thob/ /bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo 'di yin no/ /khrag 'thung chen po la sogs

pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen po yis/ /thams cad thams cad ci 'dod par/ /thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/ /mdzod lha chen po la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni/ /thams cad kun la za bar byed/ /

rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed/ /'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed/ /sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni/ /lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed/ /rmugs par 'dod na rmugs

par byed/ /seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun la za bar byed/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /bzhad gdong chen po la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad

kun la 'byin par byed/ /kun la rab tu nyams par byed/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo yis/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /sbad cing gtang bar bya ba ste/ /thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/ /ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal/ /gdong gcig ma dang

me reg drug /dang ba'i dga' bas chags pa dang / /khros pas ka li rab tu bya/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis spyod bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i 'phrin las

byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin du rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so/ /hU~M gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /

'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /mche ba zangs yag za byed che hoH hU~M rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ /gtum chem ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad/ /a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che/ /dpyugs pa'i

'thor rlung g.yeng ba che hoH hU~M khro bo shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms/ /sna tshogs ye shes thig le che hoH hU~M khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po/ /khros pa'i dkyil 'khor

char chen 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho/ /hU~M bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/ /

'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho/ /rdo rje brag ste sra pa po/ /rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po/ /rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/ /rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che hoH zhes ched du glu 'di blangs so// //gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo

la bstod pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid/ /gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi/ /rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin/ /sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang / /gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/ /ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byam kun/ /don du mi

'gyur yong ma gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /phyag rgya gsang chen nges pa 'di/ /rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa/ /de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /gsang ba 'di las gzhan

mi mnga'/ /sgro dang skur ba zhi ba yi/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na/ /nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung / /de ni nges par lung bstan te/ /sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin/ /sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas/ /zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ /'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi

spyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog go/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra sa twa mA yA dza la gu h+ya sarba A dar sha nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ oM rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hU~M myi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

oM snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag /kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas/ /dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas/ /rgyal ba kun la bstod bskor nas/ /spyan

sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol/ /e ma 'o sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung / /rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste/ /cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud/ /dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba/ /'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang / /dam tshig

bsgrub dang grub pa dang / /sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga'i rgyud/ /ma lus gtan la 'bebs pa 'di/ /rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar lags/ /sgyu 'phrul gang gis bstan pa de/ /dra ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan/ /lung ni gang phyir brjod

pa nyid/ /gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad/ /gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu/ /snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir/ /de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod/ /nges pa zhes pa ci yi phyir/ /mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs/ /mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o/ /

thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi/ /ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir/ /gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu/ /dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu/ /mi bskyod pa ni ji ltar bya/ /rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod/ /rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir/ /snang ba mtha' yas

gang gi phyir/ /don yod grub pa ji lta bu/ /spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang / /gos dkar mo dang mA ma kI/ /sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir/ /sa yi snying po ci yi phyir/ /nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang / /phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod/ /

sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci/ /byams dang sgrib sel kun bzang dang / /'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir/ /dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang / /mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod/ /rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang / /rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba

ci/ /lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang / /dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod/ /yid dang chos bzang gnyis kyi phyir/ /gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs/ /gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi

las/ /ston pa bstan pa gnas dang 'khor/ /dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod/ /grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las/ /ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar/ /bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu/ /skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol/ /'di ni gleng

gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o// //thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur/ /gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing / /thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /

sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim/ /gang dang 'brel ba bshad du gsol/ /'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes shing / /phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje/ /

gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs/ /blta bya gang la ci yi phyir/ /gang gis rtogs par ji ltar 'gyur/ /rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci/ /rtogs pa'i sgo ni de ru gsungs/ /gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci/ /'di ni lta

ba'i dri ba'o/ /thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir/ /thun mong thun mong gang ci'i phyir/ /shes rab tshogs dang thugs rje dang / /rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa dang / /'brel dang rig 'dzin spyod pa ci/ /gang gis gang la ji ltar spyad/ /de yi 'bras

bu gang phyir 'gyur/ /gang du de dang mi ldan pa'i/ /sbyar ba'i skyon nyid bdag la gsungs/ /'di ni spyod pa'i khyad par gyi dri ba'o/ /thun mong spyi dang khyad par gyi/ /rang bzhin nyid dang lhun grub kyi/ /dkyil 'khor zhes pa gang ci'i phyir/ /de nyid

phyi nang gsang ba dang / /'dul thabs gnyis su ji ltar 'gyur/ /ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rim gsum gang / /lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba/ /gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang / /phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor

ji lta bu/ /gang phyir gzugs brnyan zhes brjod cing / /gang gi gzugs brnyan gang la snang / /phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar 'gyur/ /lhag pa zhes pa gang phyir te/ /gzugs brnyan zhes pa ji lta bu/ /gnyis dang gsum dang drug bstan cing / /

don dam kun rdzob byang chub sems/ /phyi nang gsang ba ji ltar sbyor/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis ci zhig /gang gis gang du gang tshogs nas/ /ji ltar spyad pas ci zhig 'grub/ /'di dag bstan pa'i dgongs pa ci/ /gnas skabs

gang dang 'brel bar 'gyur/ /yan lag rtsa ba gang dang 'brel/ /dkyil dang 'khor du ji ltar brtag /gsungs shig skyes bu mchog chen po/ /gang dang nges pa ma rnyed pa/ /kun gyi spyod par ma gyur pa/ /legs par gsungs shig

rgyal mchog che/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi dri ba dris pa'o/ /gang gis gang la gang dag tu/ /ji ltar dbang bskur phun sum tshogs/ /bdag gis ji ltar shes par bgyi/ /gang dang gang du ji ltar 'brel/ /skyon dang yon tan ji lta bu/ /

'bras bu rim pa bshad du gsol/ /'di ni 'jug pa'i cho ga du/ /las kyi rim pa ji lta bu/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas/ /bdag gi the tshom bsal du

gsol/ /'di ni dbang gi don mtha' dag la dri ba dris pa'o/ /gang la gang gis brten pa yi/ /dam tshig ces pa ci yi phyir/ /rtsa ba dam tshig du zhig bstan/ /gang phyir rtsa bar brjod par bya/ /yan lag du zhig bstan pa gsungs/ /

'di dag lam dang bsnyen bsgrub dang / /gang zag gang don ji ltar 'brel/ /bsrungs dang 'das pa'i skyon yon ci/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i ji ltar gsungs/ /lta dang spyod dang sgrub pa dang / /shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig tu/ /grub dang mi spong bsrung

ci zhig /rgyal mchog skyes bus bshad du gsol/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /mchod dang mchog gyur ma yin pa'i/ /bsgrub pa'i khyad par ji lta bu/ /gang gis gang du ji ltar bsgrub/ /dgug dang bcing dang gso dang bsad/ /

dbye dang bskrad dang pham rgyal ci/ /gter dang mig rnon rkang mgyogs dang / /rig 'dzin go 'phang ji ltar sgrub/ /rgyal ba mchog gis bshad du gsol/ /'di sgrub pa'i dri ba dris pa'o/ /phrin las rim pa gang ci zhig /gang gis

gang du brtsam par bya/ /thab dang rdzas dang phur bu ci/ /ting 'dzin 'dug stangs hom khung ci/ /gdul bya rim pa gang ci zhig /khyad par rim pa ji ltar bshad/ /'bras bu yon tan ji ltar 'gyur/ /gsungs shig gsungs shig rgyal

mchog gtso/ /the tshom legs par chod par mdzod/ /'di ni 'phrin las kyi dri ba dris pa'o/ /rmad byung skyes bu gang zhig gis/ /dang po lam tshul ji lta bu/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i lam ci phyir/ /stong pa'i rnal 'byor snying rje che/ /phyag

rgya cig dang spros bcas ci/ /rnam smin dbang sgyur phyag rgya dang / /lhun gyis grub pa'i mtshan nyid ci/ /mthar phyin rnam pa du zhig gsungs/ /phyi nang gsang ba mthar phyin pa'i/ /'bras bu bdag gzhan don nyid ci/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga'i don ci ltar/ /

gang dag rtog pa'i rgyal po ste/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla na med/ /kun las 'bras bu thugs chud pa/ /cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i rgyud/ /skal ngan rnams kyis ma rtogs pa'i/ /gsang ba gsang chen mdo sde dang / /'dul ba chos kyi phung po dag /nam mkha' mtha' thug

bshad pa kun/ /gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros pas/ /ji snyed bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i lam/ /ma lus kun gyi snying po 'di/ /theg pa dman dang ma sbyangs dang / /rigs chad dbang dang man ngag bral/ /ji ltar bltas kyang mi snang ba/ /skyes bu mchog gi spyod yul

bas/ /rdul snyed sbyangs pa'i gang zag la/ /gsang phyir gsang ba'i thabs dag gis/ /dngos grub mtha' yas grub phyir bstan/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa'i/ /rten dang brten par bcas pa'i chos/ /ji ltar grags dang grags gyur

pa'i/ /thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig kyang / /rkyen stobs nus pa so sor snang / /khyad par rim par gang gnas pa/ /rang bzhin gdul bya bder gshegs dang / /'khrul pa'i dbang gis so sor snang / /ma bcos ngang la tha dad med/ /

rang snang las kyis tha dad pa'i/ /bye brag rnam par bstan pa kun/ /de bzhin nyid la dgod bya'i phyir/ /rgyal mchog bde chen yongs gang bas/ /dri ba'i don 'di lung bstan cing / /thabs dang shes rab 'brel gyur pa'i/ /gsang ba'i

don la dgod du gsol/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dri ba rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba bshad pa rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// // de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang / /skyes bu mtshan dpe rab ldan cing / /

dpag med rgyal bas rab bskor zhing / /rang 'byung dag pa'i gzhal yas na/ /thabs dang shes rab 'khril sbyor zhing / /kun kyang de dang 'thun pa ste/ /'dzum zhing steg pas sos 'debs shing / /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bka' stsal pa/ /

dpag med rgyal bas gsungs pa dang / /gsung dang gsung 'gyur thugs kyi rgyud/ /thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i mchog /nyon cig da ni sems dpa' bshad/ /

chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i/ /rang rig byang chub sems nyid de/ /tha dad med pa'i rang bzhin nyid/ /rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis/ /thugs su

chud cing mngon rtogs pa/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar bshad/ /rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu'i don/ /nus pa'i rim pa stsal snang ba/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa'i don/ /sgyu 'phrul zhes ni bzhir bshad do/ /tha dad min las tha

dad pa'i/ /ngo bo thabs dang bdag nyid dang / /byin brlabs shugs kyis 'brel pa ni/ /dra ba'i don zhes bshad pa yin/ /ma brjod grags pa'i bstan pa nyid/ /sgro skur med dang zhal nas gsungs/ /dri ma med pa'i lung nyid de/ /las dang ye shes

spyi nyid dang / /rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung nyid de/ /bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni/ /thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas/ /gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang / /so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud/ /'di ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston/ /don kun

'di la yongs rdzogs pas/ /lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin/ /gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /sku dang gsung thugs bdag nyid de/ /rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo dang / /thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid/ /gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do/ /ngang gis

dman dang ma sbyangs dang / /dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang / /rang brtags bsgribs pas sa'i khyad par/ /de dang de yi dbang gis na/ /ro myong bral phyir gsang bar bshad/ /rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi/ /chos rnams thig le chen po'i don/ /

'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa/ /ma lus ro gcig dbyer med pa/ /ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang / /bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams/ /'dir 'dus thabs 'dis mtshon pa dang / /rtsa bar gyur pa kho na yin/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis

med pa'i/ /byang chub sems nyid bde ba che/ /rang byung ye shes thog mtha' med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de/ /rgyal ba'i byin brlabs rab snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams/ /'di las ston pas snying po ste/ /snying po dang ni 'od bzhin

no/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas/ /snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin/ /gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems/ /mtha' dbus yongs su ma chad pa/ /dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur pa/ /yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu

yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig /bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs/ /'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do/ /gang phyir dngos gnyis tha dad par/ /log par brtags pa'i snang ba rnams/ /mun la

snang dang gser 'gyur ltar/ /ro gcig thabs kyis de kho na/ /de phyir de kho na zhes brjod/ /dngos po sna tshogs dbyer med pa'i/ /tha dad don min don gcig min/ /de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni/ /gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang / /nges pas nges

pa gsum du bstan/ /gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa/ /'gro ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa/ /ro gcig theg par nges gnas pa/ /nges pa'i theg pa bla na med/ /rang bzhin ma bcos rang byung las/ /bya byed ngang gis bral ba yi/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i

dkyil 'khor 'phrul/ /rang snang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o/ /rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa las/ /rgyu rkyen las kyis so sor 'khrul/ /de nyid byang chub sems nyid de/ /mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas/ /de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud/ /

nam mkha' dang ris phye ba ltar/ /rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba yi/ /lam gnyis 'brel par mngon bsgoms pas/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /bde chen thig le mngon snang ba/ /'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid de/ /sgyu 'phrul

dra ba'i lam du brjod/ /rang bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yis/ /dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis/ /rim pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas/ /khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin/ /thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems/ /chos kun rang gi

ngo bo nyid/ /zab mo bstan pa spyi yi lung / /thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i/ /rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud/ /bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas/ /shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan/ /dad dang brtson 'grus dam tshig dang / /cho gas dag par

sbyangs pa yis/ /dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di/ /ngo bo nyid dang byin brlabs dang / /mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste/ /rdo rje theg pa bde ba che/ /rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang / /phyin ci log dang mi mos dang / /dbang dang

dam tshig med pa la/ /gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs/ /thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis/ /snod dang bral ba'i slob ma la/ /gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na/ /bdag dang gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing / /

sreg dang sgribs par yun ring gnas/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las mtshan gyi don gyi bshad pa dang po'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ /thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don/ /thun mong ma yin 'khor

dag la/ /phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang / /dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi/ /rdo rje pad ma 'brel ba yis/ /byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur nas/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /nyon mongs lta dang shes bya rnams/ /

skad cig yud la bsal byas te/ /thun mong khyad par gsang ba yi/ /lam gnyis nges par ston pas na/ /ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba/ /'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang / /mtshon pa byin

gyis brlabs phyir ro/ /thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis/ /kun bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid/ /gtsang ma rig dag spangs pa yi/ /'og min gnas mchog chen po der/ /yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas/ /skal med skye

bo gdul ba'i phyir/ /sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas/ /gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa/ /'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa/ /'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /phyogs bcur

rgya yongs ma chad pa'i/ /yon tan khyad par spags pa na/ /gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la/ /bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan/ /rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang / /til 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs/ /chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid/ /thog ma

tha ma dbus med pa'i/ /rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni/ /rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir/ /'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bsten pa'i gnas/ /de dag nye bar mtshon pa yi/ /yid dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i/ /sgoms

dang bris dang byas la sogs/ /de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang / /rgyal ba sngags dang byin brlabs kyis/ /der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /bsod nams ye shes khyad par can/ /bsags pa sna

tshogs las byung ba'i/ /rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni/ /gtsang ma ris dag spangs pa yi/ /'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na/ /rigs bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku/ /gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs

te/ /gdod nas theg mchog mdzod nyid phyir/ /sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la/ /skad cig gcig gis spang bar mdzad/ /chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa/ /dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum/ /khyab par spags dang tshad med dang / /ye shes

bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan/ /chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir/ /mu khyud zlum por kun nas bskor/ /sku gsung thugs dang byin brlabs dang / /thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir/ /yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyings su bstan/ /rang 'byung

ye shes mtha' bral bas/ /phyogs bcur 'gro 'ong mi gnas pa'i/ /tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir/ /gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan/ /gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir/ /ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de/ /'gro ba re 'dod

skong ba'i phyir/ /rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / /sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i/ /chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te/ /bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir/ /phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med/ /thun mong la brten thabs kyi 'bras/ /

ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid/ /gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas/ /blo 'bur bzhi ni lhag par mdzes/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman kun/ /stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug /de phyir ye shes

sgo bzhir shar/ /thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis/ /'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas/ /rta babs rgyu 'bras bcu drug bstan/ /zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas/ /'dod yon ye shes lnga rol ste/ /bdag mchod

kun mnyes las byung bas/ /'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis/ /ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang / /che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas/ /nyi zla pad ma rin po che/ /las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis/ /

byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che/ /smon lam dbang gis de dag tu/ /thos pa rgya mtsho bsag phyir gnas/ /de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang / /ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus/ /dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas/ /thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan/ /

de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba yis/ /bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa/ /'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag /lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad/ /dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir/ /'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan/ /gsang ba'i

rdo rje 'chang bsdus nas/ /'dul ba'i 'khor lo bstan par mdzad/ /'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/ /sku gsum sku gsung thugs nges pa'i/ /de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis/ /gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs gyur pa'i/ /thar pa

gsum dang ye shes dang / /pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa/ /zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /bye brag brgyad bcu kun 'dus pa'i/ /rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan/ /gang phyir rdo rje thugs chud pas/ /las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang / /srid pa'i

ri bos mi bskyod pas/ /de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis/ /ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba/ /mos dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis/ /sna bar snang phyir snang mdzad mchog /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni/ /tshogs rnams 'dus

pa'i ngo bo ste/ /yon tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas/ /rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa yin/ /dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo/ /dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis/ /don rtags gsung dang yi ge'i sgo/ /mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog /dpag med thugs rje

mdzad pa yi/ /'gro 'ong med pa'i thugs rje yis/ /'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas/ /don grub ces ni rnam par bstan/ /rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang / /tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing / /de las thabs des mngon byas pas/ /

der dbang sgyur te nyid snang ba/ /rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin/ /steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i/ /sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim/ /gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i/ /bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang ni 'du byed dang / /rnam

shes zag med bde ba'i ros/ /dbang sgyur ye shes rgyal por bshad/ /gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris/ /phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog /dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang / /sngo dang ljang dang rims ldan pa'o/ /rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyed cing / /

spyod dang de las 'byung ba'i yum/ /thams cad de las skyed pa lnga/ /tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang / /dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang bzhin/ /sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod/ /nam mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba/ /steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa/ /

yul dang shes rab dbyer med cing / /thugs rjes shes rab 'brel pa yis/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog /zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis/ /skyed dang sdud dang gnas pa'i phyir/ /mtha' dbus

bral ba'i de bzhin nyid/ /nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod pa'o/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i/ /las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang / /shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa/ /rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na/ /gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin/ /

gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin dang / /ye shes thugs rje bar med chus/ /gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas/ /chu ni mA ma kI ru bshad/ /gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang / /ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung ngag gis/ /bgrod pa med pa'i zhing khams

su/ /sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du bshad/ /snying po rang byung ye shes nyid/ /kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la/ /sa yi snying por brjod pa yin/ /rang byung snying po byang chub sems/ /nam mkha'

lta bur bsam brjod med/ /mtha' dbus sgro skur gang 'das pa/ /de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid/ /gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas/ /'gro ba chu bo rgal gyi bar/ /skyo ba med par gzigs pas na/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang pad ma'i gtso/ /

rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis/ /mtha' yi bdag rtogs mtshan ma dag /'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste/ /thun mong nyid dang khyad par gyis/ /gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa bzhi/ /thun mong yul dang khyad par ni/ /thabs dang shes rab

'brel pa las/ /mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis/ /lha mo bzhir ni mngon snang ba/ /byang chub sems dang bde ba dang / /thabs kyi bde bas rab sgegs pas/ /lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad/ /grol dang ma grol 'khor ba yi/ /

phyi nang sgra yi bye brag kun/ /brag cha lta bur brjod mdzad pas/ /bar chad med pas phreng ba ma/ /tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa/ /dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid/ /dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas/ /de nyid rdo rje gI ti ma/ /ro yis khyab cing gar

sgyur ltar/ /bde ba chen po bzhi yi gar/ /khyab dang mdzes dang tshim pa dang / /mi gnas bkrol bas gar mkhan ma/ /rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang / /yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i gar/ /lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no/ /ma rtogs

'gro ba mtha' yas la/ /rang bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis/ /yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni/ /'di ni byams pa zhes bya'o/ /rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis/ /las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim/ /sel ba 'di ni sgrib

sel lo/ /thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na/ /gang phyir spong len mi gnas bas/ /phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa/ /dbye ba med pas kun du bzang / /bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin pa kun/ /zag pa med pa'i shes rab kyis/ /

lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na/ /zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sku/ /dbang po yi ge thig ler bcas/ /gnas dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis/ /mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin/ /dus bzhi rim pa gnyis brgyad de/ /de nyid

dgrol dang brod skyed dang / /spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni/ /dri dang bde bas ngag tshim zhing / /yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri/ /phyi nang khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /me tog thig ler bder bkod pas/ /rdo rje me tog bla na med/ /

phyi nang sems la gnas bcas pa'i/ /mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang / /ye shes snang ba bla na med/ /rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma/ /phyi nang dkyil 'khor ma lus la/ /rang byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis/ /thams cad

khyab par gnas pa'i phyir/ /khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma/ /de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis/ /'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa/ /byang chub snying po tshar bcad pas/ /rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod/ /gzung 'dzin bral

ba'i ye shes ni/ /gnyis 'dzin rtogs pa'i gnyen po ste/ /rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na/ /ya mAn ta kr-id gshin rje gshed/ /gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/ /thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las/ /

'joms dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na/ /rta mgrin rgyal por de bshad do/ /'khor ba'i bdud kyi dug lnga la/ /ye shes lnga ru gsal goms pas/ /gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil ba/ /sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bshad/ /gang du lus dang

bcas pa yi/ /dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg /rang rgyud bcad pa'i ye shes nyid/ /sgo ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs/ /rang rgyud rtag chad bzlog pa dang / /gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang / /thig le rig par bcas pa nyid/ /gang phyir

gnas nas dgug pa dang / /gang du 'ang 'gro bar mi nus dang / /de las 'da' bar dka' ba dang / /bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma/ /gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdam pa dang / /gnyis su med pas bde chen po/ /rang lus snang srid brtan g.yo la/ /rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul

gyis sbyar/ /de dag ma lus dran byed pa/ /rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med/ /kun gzhi rdo rje mi phyed pa/ /kun tu bzang por de bshad do/ /ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos/ /ma lus zad med khyab pa'i dbyings/ /rtogs

dang shes dang gang gyur pa/ /kun tu bzang mor de bshad do/ /mi shigs thig le bde chen po/ /ye shes lnga ldan dngas ma'i bcud/ /rang byung lus can kun gnas pa/ /ston pa rig pa'i gsung can nyid/ /d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas/ /'od bzhi
