ho/ /gsang ba'i dbang po pad mar ldan gyur nas/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su/ /pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs/ /sa bcu rims kyis bkod med rdzogs/ /kun du 'od gsal pad ma spyan yang rdzogs/ /yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam

gyis mi khyab pa/ /yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan/ /thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol/ /a la la ho/ /de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las/ khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig

ste/ /bcwa brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin/ /gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag /bcwa brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te/ /byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin/ /bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /

dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal/ /yul ni pad ma bde mchog dbyings/ /sems ni byang chub 'byung ba'i gter/ /dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas/ /gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro/ /dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang / /phun sum

tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams/ /gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed/ /'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs/ /gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni/ /lta ba dman la bshad byas na/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /mgo 'gas snying yang

tshig par 'gyur/ khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar/ /mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par/ /ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur/ /de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya/ /shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis/ /blo brtan snying rje che dang dad

ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan/ /gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas/ thams cad ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i

le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin/ /sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin

te/ /yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsir

'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang / /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing / /longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong / /ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub/ /nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing / /'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang / /chur 'gyur

'bab pa 'ang de bzhin te/ /'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang / /thams cad stongs shing lhung bar 'gyur/ /'gug dang gtang dang bcing dang dgrol/ /gso dang bsad dang pham dang rgyal/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /

de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i/ /ming tshig gzugs tshogs yid bzhin gyis/ /mun la snang byung ji bzhin du/ /'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul/ /ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal/ /dam tshig sngags dang

phyag rgya rnams/ /ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan/ /'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med brlag /dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i/ /dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni/ /zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/ /'phel

'grib med par 'byung ba ste/ /dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin/ /sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur/ /dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par/ /rtogs pa'i dbang bsgyur ting 'dzin yin/ /gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa/ /de yis

chos kyi dbyings mi shes/ /de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa/ /'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni/ /pho mo ma yin ma ning min/ /mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min/ kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin/ /

gnas su ma yin gang yang min/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te/ /thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu/ /thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas/ /tha dad min la tha dad pa'i/ /nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas

ye shes rol/ /'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog /gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems/ /mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas rab brtan na/ /dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas

de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /e ma 'o snying por lam bcas pas/ /'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog /

rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po/ /byang chub lhun grub bdal ba'i ngang / /snying po nyid ni snying por kun bcas kun du gnas/ /de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun du gnas/ /a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /

gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags 'chang

rnams lhar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas/ /byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar/ /de nyid bzhugs gnas
yin par gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i/ /dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal/ /gcig dang spros pa thams cad med/ /dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul/ /ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos/ /

ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor/ /thugs rje byin brlabs 'phros pa yis/ /ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro/ /ye shes lnga dang sku
gsung thugs/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab/ /rang snang ba'i thabs las 'byung / /bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i/ /thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang / /dbus mtha' med par rgyas par

gnas/ /stod smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug /de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad/ /der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir/ /nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar/ /ye nas rnam

par dag pa'i phyir/ /ma chags pad mo 'bar ba'i gdan/ /zag med ye shes gter gyur pas/ /yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan/ /ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir/ /ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas/ /re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir/ /dpag

bsams shing gi rin chen 'bar/ /yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor/ /thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir/ /'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor/ /gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las/ /'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis/ /thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor/ /thams
cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog /'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang / /gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum/ /ting 'dzin lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag /byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brtan/ /zhes nyid

la nyid bshad do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin du gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/ lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang

bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te/ /dkyil

'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni/ /rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor bas/ /kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod/ /'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang / /kun tu gru bzhi

sgo khyud ldan/ /rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan/ /seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung / /nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la/ /nyi zla pad ma rin po che/ /gdan la rdzogs dang sems

dpa'i tshul/ /'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang / /g.yas nas mthong thos mnom pa dang / /myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas/ /gru chad la ni mthong byed dang / /thos byed mnom byed myong byed rnams/ /btsun mo dag dang bcas

par gnas/ /bar khyams la ni thub drug dang / /mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang / /bya ba dang ni gnas par bstan/ /sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che/ /

pad ma ral gri dril bu 'bar/ /uta pal klu shing la sogs mtshan/ /mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin/ /mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan/ /ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i/ /mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon
tshul can/ /gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin can/ /'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po/ /'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khyil ba ste/ /dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam pas lhun gyis grub/ /

sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni/ /de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang / /'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ /'thun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston/ /stong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul/ /

tshul nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i/ /de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la/ /so so 'dra bar snang ba ni/ /de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang / /las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang / /dper na
me long chu zla bzhin/ /de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la/ /sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan/ /dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs/ /rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul/ /gzhan yang theg mchog rim pa

bzhin/ /'og min bla med gnas mchog tu/ /sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul/ /byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la/ /de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra te/ /sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston/ /me long bstan pa'i

tshul bzhin du/ /dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel/ /'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na/ /byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med/ /me long bzhin du sku la snang / /de nas sa bcu rims kyis 'byung / /bla med byang chub yang
dag 'thob/ /chos sku dpag med brjod du med/ /longs spyod zad med rin chen gter/ /sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab/ /mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs/ /spyod yul kun du maN Da la/ /tshogs chen gnyis

kyang rdzogs par rol/ /thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog /de la sogs te bsam yas mchog /skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku/ /nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas/ /zad mi shes kyi gter du gyur/ /rdo rje rig pa

'dzin gyi sku/ /thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs/ /shes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor

brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las

rdo rje las phyung ngo / /a ho/ /dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab/ /ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang / /mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings/ /

ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams spro spros pa med/ /ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /a ho zhes

gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad

kyang / nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing / /kun du bzang po dgyes te/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /tshad dpag tu med

pa rgyas pa/ /mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med/ /kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i/ /srid gsum

yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul te/ /mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung / /dbang sgyur shin du rnam par dag pa yi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang / /

'jig rten 'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang / /gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa/ /bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub/ /dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i/ /'das dang ma byon de bzhin

nyid du sbyor/ /shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba/ /rig pa'i thabs chen dbang sgyur nyid du bsgom/ /stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i/ /zag med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur/ /b+h+ru~M/

rang byung nyi zla pad ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs/ /rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad/ /bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas pa/ /dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam

par 'ub/ /thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las byung / /spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i/ /dus bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon/ /

thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs/ nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa/ /mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya/ /rnam par rtog med byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku/ /shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs

bsdus pa/ /bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon/ /thabs tshan ma 'dres rnam pa sbas pa yi/ /dmigs med bde gshegs nyid dbyings thugs chud pa/ /thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog /phyogs

bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa/ /shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chang ba/ /thugs rje byin brlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi/ /bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par

ldan 'phro/ /rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur/ /zhes nyid la nyid du ched du rjod de rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /b+h+ru~M bi shwa bi shud d+he/ hU~M badzra d+hIka /oM dzI na dzIka /swA rad na d+hIka /A~M A ro lIka /hU~M pra dz+nyA d+h+rIka /

mu~M d+hA trI shwa ri/ lA~M dwe Sha ra ti/ mA~M mo ha ra ti/ bA~M rA ga ra ti/ tA~M badzra ra ti/ k+ShI hi rA dzA ya/ tra~M A ka sha gar+b+hA ya/ hrI ha hU~M ba da ma/ dzri ku ru pA Na hrI/ hU~M lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ tra~M mA l+ye sa ma ya hoH hrI gI ti rA go\u0f85ha~M/

a nr-i t+ya rA ga ya mI/ mai d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ th+l+hI ni s+sa ram bA ya swA hA/ hU~M swa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mu~M shrI a ra~M gA ya swAhA/ dzaH d+hU pa pra bi sha /hU~M puSh+pa a bi sha /ba~M dI pa su khi ni/ ho gan d+he tsita ta~M/ hU~M ya mAn ta

krita phaT/ pra dz+nyAn kha ta krita phaT/ hU~M big+h+nAd+na ta kriT phaT/ hU~M pad mAn ta krita phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA rad na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ oM ma hA pad ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa

la nI phaT/ oM ma hA kar ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra tsita ta hU~M/ a a a badzra b+ha dra sa man ta a/ oM mu ne krI~M swA hA/ oM mu ne tru~M swA hA/ oM mu ne sru~M swA hA/ oM mu ne bra~M swA hA/ oM mu ne k+Sha

swA hA/ oM mu ni ye swA hA/ e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA kA ru N-i ka /tri sh+ya ho/ /sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH oM AH hU~M swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/

oM AH hU~M swA hA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan 'phrin las rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig /oM badzra sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM badzra

sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas/ gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par grags so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do/ /de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po/ ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba

'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA A daR+sha shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+She NA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma

ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA sa man tA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+ThA na shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/

oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ka badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsita ta badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA

ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to/ /gsal bar gyur to/ /'bar bar gyur to/ /e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang / /sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das/ /

sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung / /gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab/ /sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags/ /thams cad gsung gi phyag rgyas chog /rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba

las/ /bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba 'ang / /thams cad pad ma'i ngang gyur na/ /grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra/ /ji ltar brjod kyang gsung mchog ste/ /theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang / /log 'gro ma lus thams

cad skad/ /byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus/ /bsdus nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags/ /sgra nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs/ /gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med/ /brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra/ /kun la grags shing so sor

mjal/ /dper na de bzhin spring bsangs bzhin/ /gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/ 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin/ /theg pa mtho dman bsam yas kyang / /de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te/ /gdul ba'i thabs su

so sor thos/ /ji ltar gsung rab kun brjod kyang / /de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med/ /yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung / /ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang / /thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis/ /'gro don sna tshogs

so sor gsal/ /gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog /de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams/ /de bzhin ngang las ma g.yos kyang / /dper na brag cha'i sgra bzhin no/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba

dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /oM hU~M badzra sa twa hU~M/ badzra pra b+hA na hU~M/

mU~M badzra gan d+ha hU~M/ oM tsakra maN Da la hU~M A~M/ lA~M badzra gan b+hA Sha lA~M/ swA rata na pra b+hA na swa~M/ oM badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha A~M/ oM pad ma pra b+hA na A~M/ pa~M badzra gan+d+ha pra b+hA na pA~M/ hA~M/ badzra ga tik+Sh+Na pra b+hA na ha~M/ ta~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra

b+hA na ta~M/ shI rad na pra b+hA na shI hU~M/ badzra gan+d+ha d+ha pra b+hA na g+ho Sha hU~M/ tra~M khaDa ga pra b+hA na trA~M/ trA~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na tri/ hrIH pad ma pra b+hA na hrIH badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIH ha badzra gan+d+ha b+hI Sha pra b+hA na ha~M/ a badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha

pra b+hA na AH me kA la pra b+hA na me/ hU~M badzra gan d+ha pra b+hA na b+hA Sha hU~M/ thA~M pra b+hA na maN Da la thA~M/ swA~M badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha ha~M pra b+hA na swa~M/ hU~M rata na swa~M sA d+ha b+ha dra pra b+hA na swa~M hrIH badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIH mu uta pa la

nI la pra b+hA na mu/ A badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na AH phaT badzra a maH mud ga ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ oM badzra gan+d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na oM oM/ phaT ma hA badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ hU~M ma hA rata na badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hU~M hU~M/

phaT hriH pad ma mud ga ra pra b+hA na hrIHhrIH/ oM ma hA badzra pad ma badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hrIHhrIH/ a karma mud ga ra badzra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ a karma badzra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hU~M/ a a a zhes brjod pas phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil

'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to/ /'bar bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste/ bcu
bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /
yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni/ /bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /nges pa'i don tshan bzhi bcu gnyis/ /yid bzhin rin chen gsal bar thim/ /thams cad ma lus thig le'i dbyings/ /sku lnga'i
'od zer mang po kun/ /thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim/ /gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /byang chub sems kyi thig pa ni/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ kha dog gnas dang dbyibs ma yin/ /

yon tan mchog gi snying po ni/ /rtog gi spyod yul yod ma yin/ /zab cing rgya chen rab sbyangs pa'i/ /gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te/ /gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu med/ /thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ /sna

tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang / /rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na med/ /dus gsum bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'/ /sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud

pa'i/ /nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim/ /thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de/ /dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor/ /shes rab dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis/ /byang chub rdo rje thig le yin/ /dkyil 'khor gzhal

yas lhun grub dang / /rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis/ /kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa/ /yon tan mchog gi gnas yin te/ /ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma/ /de yis ma zin gang yang med/ /rang gi rnam rtog ma
yin pa/ /yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang / /gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs/ /phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad kun/ /de la gsad cing gzung du med/ kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin/ /skyes bu dam
pa mchog 'dod pas/ /de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis/ /de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni/ /rgyu 'bras med pa'i dus gcig ste/ /thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du/ /yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur/ /
mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus/ /tshogs chen gnyis kyang rtogs par rol/ /skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la zhugs/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun/ /rgyal ba yum

gyi dbyings su thim/ /thams cad ma lus chos skur 'du/ /ho/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pas/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya/ /

gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi/ /snying po phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'/ /mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las/ /sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /oM dang m+'u~M gnyis rtse sbyar te/ /

'bru brgyad bsnol nas rtser sprad pa/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /bde ba chen po'i sbyin pa'i rgya/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /hU~M bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /

'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /m+'u~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar

bkan/ /oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /lA~M gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga las

su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar dkan/ /swA~M rtser 'bar ba rin po che/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas
nas thugs kar bkan/ /mAM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /

A~MH gyi rtse mor pad ma 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /pA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lnga

las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /hA~M gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar/ /zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing / /'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan/ /

'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan/ /tA~M bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar/ /nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril/ /btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta/ /ut+pal la sogs klu shing mtshan/ /rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar/ /

pad ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te/ /gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang / /pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de/ /me tog phreng ba sbos mchod ma/ /mar me byug la sogs pa yis/ /las

la 'khril cing chos la brtan/ /dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul/ /gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni/ /nri mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes gnon/ /

thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang / /rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon/ /lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH /sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang / /'dud tshul 'khril pa gong ma bzhin/ /thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /
mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no/ /gseg par dang ni pi bang dang / /go cha po ti rin chen sgrom/ /me dang chu ru rab tu bstan/ /yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings/ /kun bzang mnyam

bzhag ye shes 'phro/ yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad mo'i dkyil/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te/ /yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de/ /yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid/ /phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni/ /thabs dang shes rab

ldan 'byor na/ /ma bskyod ma bsgul thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas/ /yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sum 'phror 'bar/ /de ltar ldan

pa'i gtso mchog gis/ /rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du/ /bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar/ /de la sogs te bsam mi khyab/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su/ /'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston/ /theg pa mtho dman

thams cad dang / /phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang / /zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la/ /so sor 'thun byas kun tu snang / /dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba/ /lus las ma dgod sna tshogs ston/ /mdor na phyag rgya thams

cad ni/ /'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med/ /gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro/ /bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid/ /mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun/ /phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas/ /gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa 'ang

min/ /de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad/ /mthe bo 'dzub mo rdo rje 'dzin/ /mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin/ /srin lag mthe bo chags pa che/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo legs pa mchog /hU~M hoH/ 'dzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen

mchog /gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjid don/ /srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog /gzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe'u chung sprad/ /tro~M te ru ha/ 'dzub mo steng 'og chos kyi mchog /gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog /

srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog /mthe'u chung steng 'og smra gsung yin/ /hrIH b+ha~M TA+o~M ho~M/ /'dzub mo rgya gram las kyi mchog /gung mo rgya gram bsrung bar byos/ /srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog /mthe'u chung rgya

gram gnas bar bshad/ /ha tru~M a b+ha~M/ phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang / /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs/ /glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil

'khor 'bebs/ /phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa/ /dag par gsal bas phyag rgya yin/ /yi ge so so gsal ba yis/ /gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das/ /dzaH dang hoH la sogs pa yis/ /gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer

'ching / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so/ /hU~M lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi ye shes te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas/ /ye shes rdo rje gsor zhing spro/ /e ma'o rdo rje che mchog ni/ /nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen

mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la/ /rdo rje 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed rdo rje 'chang zhes bya/ /hU~M/ /ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /rgyal po

gtsigs la btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen por mtshan ma'i

gzugs/ /hU~M/ phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /rdo rje rdo rje drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs

shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad rdo rje nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las rdo rje gsung 'byung ba'o/ /oM badzra dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M phaT/ /oM/ lus ngag yid

gsum 'khor lo ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ /snang mdzad 'khor lo dpa' bo yin/ /snang mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas/ /ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing spro/ /e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du
gsol pa ni/ /cis kyang ma shigs mi phyed pas/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/ /'khor lo

'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya/ /hU~M/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa

yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan

phyir ro/ /oM/ 'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing gzhig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /hU~M/ btsan zhing

'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad 'khor lo nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las 'khor lo gsung 'byung ba/ /oM tsakra dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M phaT/ oM/ lus ngag yid gsum pad ma ni/ /sku gsung

thugs kyi ye shes te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /pad ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin/ /pad ma sems dpa' rang gnas bas/ /pad ma dgra sta gsor zhing spro/ /e ma'o pad ma che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /

cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang mi g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/ /pad ma 'chang rgyal thams cad kyis/ /rang gi

rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed pad ma 'chang zhes bya/ /oM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /rgyal po gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad

kun la de ltar 'bebs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /hU~M/ bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /pad ma

dgra sta drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad pad ma

nyid pas ni/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las pad ma'i gsung phyung ba/ /oM pad ma dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M phaT/ swA~M/ lus ngag yid gsum rin chen ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /

yon tan chen po dpa' bo yin/ /rin chen sems dpa' rang gnas pas/ /ye shes dbyug pa gsor zhing spro/ /e ma 'o rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma

'dres pas/ /bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab/ /swa~M/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la/ /rin chen 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes bya/ /

swA~M/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas/ /rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /

rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /rin chen dbyug pa drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /

'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba brdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis/ /thams cad rin chen nyid pas na/ /nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba

yin/ /de las rin chen gsung 'byung ba/ /swa~M rad na dz+wa lA na lArka swA~M phaT/ hA~M/ lus ngag yid gsum 'phrin las ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te/ sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo

yin/ /las kyi sems dpar nga gnas pas/ /ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro/ /e ma 'o las kyi che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas/ /bde chen

mchog tu gyur pas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab/ /hA~M rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las/ /ral gri 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed ral gri 'chang zhes bya/ /hA~M ji ltar rgyal po rang

gi rgyal/ /rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin/ /bde chen snying la gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /

bdag nyid chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /ha~M ral gri ral gri drag chen dang / /rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang

bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'du phro 'dis/ /thams cad ral gri nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las 'phrin las gsung byung ba'o/ /hA~M karma

dz+wa lA na lArka hU~M phaT/ mu~M lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las/ /sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por 'gyur/ /bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du/ /rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dam can rnal 'byor

dbang du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i/ /thams cad gcig tu 'dus par ni/ /yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur/ /mi bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas/ /oM dang ha~M ni ma thal bar/ /lan gsum gsor chen gur dkar

bsgom/ /lha ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur/ /oM dang ha~M ni thal tsam du/ kun du gru bzhir bdag gnas te/ /lan gsum gsor la gang brtson pa/ /tshe dang skal pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /longs spyod ci 'dod grub par 'gyur/ /

de nas zla gam mdog dmar sham/ /'brel ba mnyam par lan gsum gyis/ /khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas/ /yid la dmigs dang las thams cad/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur/ /de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas te/ /

drag tu phaT ces brjod pas ni/ kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing / /bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa/ /khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu/ /rgyang ni ring du 'phangs pa na/ /ci 'dod las rnams 'grub par nges/ /oM badzra da ha dz+wa la ha na badzra

pa tsa dz+wa la badzra hU~M phaT/ chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa/ /sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te/ /shes rab yum gyi tshogs su brtag /skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo/ /lce ni gar mkhan mya ngan 'das/ /chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las/ /

rab tu gsor la gang brtson pas/ /mu~M la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad ma 'bar/ /mu~M gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /kun du dbang sgyur yid 'ong ba'i/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'thun pas 'grub/ /oM badzra g+han Da pA sha d+harma d+ha ra/ hU~M hU~M

hU~M zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu 'byung ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shin du phra ba'i dam tshig mchog /phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor

dam pa de/ /sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya/ /'bru lnga spos lnga rin chen lnga/ /snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang / /bdud rtsi lnga yis rab mnyams la/ /rig pas thig ni gdab par bya/ /lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi/ /rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud

bcas/ /gru chad bzhi dang gru bzhi yi/ /bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya/ /sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la/ /tsa na 'bru tsam pad mo gdan/ /yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las/ /phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri/ /bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs

dang / /rgyan phreng dung dang bro bas bskor/ /glu tshig bro gar rol mo yis/ /sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod/ /yum dang 'jo ma sems ma dang / /ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod/ /dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ldan pa'i/ /zhal du gyur

pa'i me bos la/ /bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te/ /shin du phra ba sbyangs pa yis/ /bsam yas dag la de bzhin bya/ /rigs pas dpag pa tsam du'o/ /

mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis/ /phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing / /mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yis/ /sna tshogs rin po che yi gzhi/ /mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang / /kun 'byung rin

chen phung po 'bar/ /dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil/ /rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / /rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i tshal/ /glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra/ /bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs/

do shal dpung rgyan se mo do/ /bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang / /rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi/ /lha dang lha mo rdul snyed kyi/ /bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /dkyil

'khor kun la rgyas par dbul/ /skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis/ /rims kyis yang na cig car du/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing / /mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /gsal ldan ma 'am byin brlabs la/ /stong gsum
yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du/ /dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs mchod/ /mnyes nas grub pa'i dam tshig mchog /bdag nyid chen po mchod pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes/ /srid gsum

'gro ba ma lus pa/ /dga' ba chen pos khyab par gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba brtan pa yis/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang / khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur/ /lus ngag
sems dang chos thams cad/ /gang na mi gnas mi dmigs pa/ /rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la/ /mig yor tshur du sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom/ /goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la/ /kun

byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug /de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ /de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des/ /rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus/ /bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul/ /dbang phyug logs spyod lngas

mchod na/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin/ /nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos/ /nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur/ /dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas/ /phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang / /rim pa bzhin du

sbyin par bya/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung / /yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas/ /phyag rgya chen po yi phang du ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'dzub gang tshad du bya/ /mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya/ /yang na sa gzhi mnyam pa la/ /dkyil 'khor

khru gang tshad du bya/ /yang na lus grang tshad du ste/ /yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad/ /phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang / /gos rgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs/ /thig gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya/ /

yang na khru ni bcu drug dang / /nyi shu 'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom/ /sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod/ /yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam/ /nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par/ /sangs

rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom/ /ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon/ kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye/ /ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog /yi ge 'am gdan nam snying po 'am/ /

phyag rgya 'am sku gsung thugs ldan par/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che/ /'grub 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam/ /sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas/ /rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur/ /dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa/ /smos ci

dgos te de nyid yin/ /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che/ /mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo / /rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la/ /'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba/ /phyogs

dus kun nas gshegs pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni/ /kun du bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin/ /kun du bzang mor de gnas par/ /ye shes dril bu bsil zhing spro/ /e ma 'o sangs rgyas yum chen gyis/ /nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni/ /

cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la/ /cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pa/ /bde chen yum du gyur bas na/ /kun kyang phyag rgya yum lngas btab/ /mu~M/ kun du bzang mo'i thugs nyid las/ /rdo rje yum chen thams cad kyi/ /rang gi rtags su bstan

pa'i phyir/ /mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya/ /mU~M ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te/ /rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar/ /bde chen yum du gnas pa dang / /dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis/ /thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs/ /

'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas/ /rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas/ /bdag nyid yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs/ /phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro/ /m+'u~M dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang / /

yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang / /'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis/ /phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs/ /dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin/ /btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis/ /thams cad dril bu nyid pas na/ /nam mkha'

khams kun bkang ba yin/ /de las chos sku gsung 'byung ba/ /mu~M g+ha dz+wa lA na lArka mu~M zhes brjod pas phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste

bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos thabs dang / shes rab 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de nas yid dang chos 'thun par/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang / /shes rab dril bu

chos la brtan/ /hU~M dang mu~M gi snying po 'bar/ /de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar/ /oM dang mU~M gi mchog tu brtag /shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs/ /'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brten/ /de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni/ /'bru lnga phyag

rgya nyid du ste/ /de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor/ /de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor/ /de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa/ /de las pad ma phyag bsnams 'dzin/ /de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod/ /de nyid rdo rje

phyag bsnams pa/ /thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor/ /de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis/ /oM dang mU~M gyi mtshon bzhin du/ /rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po/ /thugs kar bstan pa'i tshul du 'bar/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /phyag na mi

'jigs thugs kar 'dzin/ /mU~M las phyag rgya chen po ni/ /dri bsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum/ /mchod gnas chos la brten par 'dzin/ /thams cad kun du phyag rgya yi/ /thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang / /sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa/ /yon tan

'phrin las kun tu rdzogs/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs/ /de las rdo rje mchog bsnams pa/ /de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las/ /oM hU~M swA~M gyi rtser 'dzin pa/ /nyid yas

yang dag bskyed tshul du/ /shes rab yum du shin du brtags/ /rdo rje 'bar bas rab brten pa/ /thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab/ gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med/ /de las 'gro don 'phrin las char/ /yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i/ /rdo rje 'chang

rgyal tshul chen las/ /rdo rje drag por lan gsum gsor/ /gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas/ /bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog /dpag bsams shing dang yid bzhin gyi/ /rin chen dbyig dang 'byung

ba kun/ /de dag rdzas yod ma yin te/ /rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin/ /ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos/ /gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te/ /thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid/ /de lta bu'i ngang du 'byung / /shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin

nyid/ /thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir/ /ye shes la ni ye shes rol/ /ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog /rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang / /byin brlabs ston pa 'ang de bzhin te/ /bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis/ /sgyu ma rdo rje btsan

po mchog /cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing / /yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan/ /sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas/ /ma nyams 'jug pa rab brtson pa/ /zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis/ /

dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub/ /de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis/ /sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni/ /ye shes thig le de nyid la/ /ye shes thig le nyid snang ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon

rdzogs pa'i/ /zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang / /rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang / /'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun/ /mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang / /rgya chen gsung las don

byung ba/ /'thun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo / /gcig dang du mar bral ba yi/ /mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te/ /rang byung ye shes gnas med snang / /log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing / /

ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /thugs rje chen pos 'brel bas na/ /'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang / /bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga/ /byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na/ /'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par

'gyur/ / skal pa mnyam pa'i ye shes de/ /gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi/ /ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges/ /dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur/ /zhes ched du brjod do/ /rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas

de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dngos grub blang pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so/ /ye nas mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor la/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te/ /rang rig ye shes rgyal

po yis/ /thams cad ma lus maN Da la/ /de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la/ /rig pa rang byung gyur pa yis/ /mnyam par mnyam la mi gnas pa'i/ /chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom/ /'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la/ /rang bzhin

dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi/ /gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis/ /rang rig bsgribs shing bdag tu bcings/ /kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir/ /de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan/ /rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang / /yang dag thabs

chen rdzogs pa'i don/ /rin chen sna tshogs la sogs dang / /'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun/ /thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ /gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag /ye shes chen po rab 'byams gyis/ /don du mi 'gyur yong ma

gsungs/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis/ /thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni/ /nyid kyi thugs la bstim byas te/ /thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che/ /dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil

'khor du/ /rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis/ /thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che/ /yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis/ /ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te/ mA ma kI yi rgyun chags la/ /yang dag chos sku phyag rgya che/ /de bzhin

ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas/ /don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir/ /mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal/ /dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med par/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas/ kha dog dbyibs dang

gzugs su bsgyur/ /sna tshogs 'phrin las rnam par rol/ /don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang / /byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs/ /'jig rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor/ /a hoH chos sku phyag rgya de dag las/ /las lnga'i

dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /drag po gtum po gdul ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni/ /chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis/ /bgegs kyi ling ga mnan par bya/ /

gtum po rngam po 'ang rnyag par 'gyur/ /mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog /'di dang 'gro ba thams cad du/ /shin du stobs drag che ldan 'gyur/ /thams cad gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir/ /bdag nyid ha ya grI bar bsgom/ /dmar po'i chos

sku gsal bsgoms te/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams gdan du gding / /ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na/ /thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu/ /mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang / /ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /thams cad yon tan

'phel bya'i phyir/ /bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste/ /gser gyi mdog 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom/ /gang 'phel chos sku gdan du gzhag /de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang / /

ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir/ /dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom/ /gang zhig gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan/ /de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na/ /

gtum po rngam po 'ang zhi bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin/ /zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis/ /rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus/ /bya byed med par dkyil 'khor

spyod/ /lhun 'grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs/ /a hoH chos sku phyag rgya chen po ni/ /dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges/ /nye ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa/ /phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na/ /gang bsgoms the tshom med par

'grub/ /de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam/ /the tshom med de nges 'grub 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa yi lha sgrubs na/ /lha yi snying po gang yang rung / /bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na/ /lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos nyid rten cing 'brel

bris na/ /chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te/ /rang dang spyi yi don rtogs nas/ /skye rga na 'chi med par rtogs/ /phyag rgya chen po de dag la/ /nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed pa'i/ /snying po ma nor don bris na/ /ngan song sdug bsngal med

par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas dang / /dpag tshad med pa'i phyag rgya che/ /sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad/ /zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam/ /a ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag

pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod de/

shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las/ /bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun/ /rdo rje lam las pad mor dkyil/ /rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor sgyur/ /nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /tra~M gi phyag rgya'i

tshogs mchog las/ /rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim/ tra~M gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog dang / /gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya/ /gsang ba'i don nyid rtogs pa las/ /gzhan du smra bar bya ba min/ /gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal

yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las/ /rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung / /rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod

la/ /rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor/ /lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /hU~M gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim/ /oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas/ /

las rnams ma lus kun byos shig /pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun/ /khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin/ /smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid/ /hriHyi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las/ /chos kyi 'khor lo gsal spro thim/ /

oM/ chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis/ /dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i blo can la/ /'thun par gsang bsgrags gzhan du min/ /bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ /hU~M oM swa~M a~M ha~M

rnams las/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po/ /dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod/ /slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing / /dbang rnams thob par ma

byas par/ /nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams/ /'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur/ /dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang / /go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang / /gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang / /snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na/ /dus 'di phan

chad rgyal ba'i sras/ /ngan song thams cad med pa dang / /gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas/ /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /kun du bzang po la sogs mtshan/ /mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur/ /lus dang phung por bcas

pa'i sa/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin/ /rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa/ /bla med kun tu bzang por 'gyur/ /yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la/ /de nyid byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ /pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams/ /sangs

rgyas bka' las mi 'da' zhing / /de yi dgos pa byed pa dang / /sgro dang skur pa la sogs pa/ /de ni myur du rlag par 'gyur/ /tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur/ /zhes ched du brjod do/ /

gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub

myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so/ /de bzhin nyid dang mnyam sbyor phyir/ /dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya/ /byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas/ /mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas/ /mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom

zhing / /byang chub sems su brtan par gzung / /bya ba med las bya byed bya/ /mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling ga a/ /shin du 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas/ /'od 'phro 'bar bas thams cad khyab/ /

dus gsum ngan song gnas bsregs nas/ /b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim/ /thim gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 'bar/ /a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar/ /phyogs bcur 'thoms pa'i mun sel zhing / /nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsil ba'i

sman/ /thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/ /rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab/ /mkha' la 'ja' tshon sprin mang yang / /nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus/ /thams cad mkhyen nyid bsam yas kyang / /chos kyi

dbyings su thams cad 'dus/ /thams cad yi ge hU~M du gyur/ /hU~M nyid gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil/ /'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste/ /yang na 'od zer 'bru lnga yi/ /lnga pa'i don spros bzhi bcu lnga'i/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor
bsam yas mchog /ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa la/ /ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /sen zlum zla ba gang ba yi/ /thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba yi/ /gzhal yas 'od zer

'bar ba'i khang / /pad ma'i gdan dang rin po che/ /de dkyil yi ge hU~M gnas pa/ /shin du phra zhing yungs 'bru 'bar/ /gnas gcig dang ni gnas gsum dang / /gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom/ /shes rab spyin la 'dris pa dang / /

nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par/ /shin du phra zhing gsal bar bsgom/ /shin du blo gsal 'dris gyur nas/ /phyogs bcu'i stong khams rdul snyed du/ /thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam yas spro/ /spros kyang hU~M las nyams pa

med/ /bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med/ /spro med bsdu med de bzhin las/ /yi ge mu~M du thim par gyur/ /thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar/ /shin du gsal zhing 'dris pa dang / /phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom/ /sku de tshon gang 'od

'bar nas/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya/ /'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed bsgoms/ /yang na phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom/ /gzhal yas khang dang gdan

khri rnams/ /phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin/ /mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad ldan/ /dbu rgyan yi ge lnga dang ldan/ /rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar/ /rin chen pad ma dril bu 'bar/ /phyag rgya chen po de dag las/ /phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal

yas khang / /nyi zla gza' skar dkyil 'khor gdan dang rgyan/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom/ /thugs rje byin brlabs 'gro don mdzad/ /zhi ba phyogs gcig shes bya spro/ /sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing / /

bde gshegs 'khor yang dag par byed/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de/ /'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang / /sdug bsngal thams cad yong mi 'byung / /lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub/ /theg pa dman par yong mi skye/ /

bde gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur/ /byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin/ /zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste

nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sgyur ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /rgyu gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul/ /

byin gyi brlabs dang mngon sum par/ /rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis/ /thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che/ /yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun/ /rnam smin oM du shes par bya/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /

gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs/ /rnam smin mu~M du shes par bya/ /yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom/ /yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig /bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung la/ /hU~M du shes

pas rab spyad na/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /dbye ba 'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i/ /sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po/ /yum gyi

pad ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro/ /sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus pa/ /dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim/ /grub pa'i nyi zla snying po de/ /'gro drug dus gnas de dag nyid/ /mchod pa chen por mnyes sbyar zhing / /

dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang / /mkha' 'gro gsal bar tshe la sogs/ /yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams/ /nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag /nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed

bsgom/ /hU~M du gyur pas rnam par dag /dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar/ /skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid/ /gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom/ /ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs/ /ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid/ /sgyu ma snang

ba mig yor tshul/ /sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang / /rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med/ /snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing / /mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i zhing / /byed spyod tshogs chen

gnyis gyur nas/ /yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan/ /cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi/ /rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub/ /lnga zhing lnga dang sbyor ba yi/ /tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la/ /

khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/ /'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par sgom/ /de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs/ /pad mo'i rigs dang sku gsung thugs/ /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /rigs kyi rigs te

rigs kyi gtso/ /thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog /khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi/ /tshom bu gcig gi lha rnams bsgom/ /khro bo khro mo tshogs chen dang / /pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs/ /ci bgyi la sogs pa rnams kyis/ /

dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed/ /rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni/ /mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ngang gnas shing / /spyod pa ci la 'ang thogs med pa'i/ /thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'i/ /rdo rje'i rigs su thams

cad dkyil/ /'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom/ /chags med tshul gyis bstim par bya/ /gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che/ /yang na sku gsung thugs nyid do/ /thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs/ /ting 'dzin gsal

bar 'od zer 'phro/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim/ /rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ /rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas/ /

sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni/ /thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'od zer rnam pa mang po spro/ /gnyis su med par bstim par bya/ /dngos grub

mchog gi snying po 'grub/ /rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom/ /sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom/ /so so sngags dang phyag rgya dang / /ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal/ /

gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang / /ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas/ /dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya/ /le lo sgyid snyom med pa yi/ /the tshom med par bsgrub byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsang mchog

dam pa thob/ /sgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni/ /rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bya/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na
nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis/ /'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /glu tshig sgra yi

phyag rgya yis/ /chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /'bar ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'grub/ /bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni/ /yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub/ /A li kA li'-i phyag

rgya yis/ /sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas/ /thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs/ /'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen/ /nus mthu can du gang gyur pa/ /rig 'dzin rgyal po'i

zhing du grags/ /mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi/ /skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi/ /khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin/ /pha rol phyin pa kun du rdzogs/ /thabs dang shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i/ /sa'i khyad par bcu dang gsum/ /

rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs/ /mkha' dbyings dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla/ /ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal bsgom/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun/ /ma lus par ni bsgoms par 'gyur/ /dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas

kyang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ /sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /dkyil 'khor kun du rab sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga lhag

gam ma tshang na/ /skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to/ /rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur ste/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /

a hoH /ma mthong rmongs la chags pa yis/ /chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam/ /'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i/ /zab chen spyod yul log par rtogs btags ming tsam pa/ /A li kA li la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po nyid/ /

phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs/ /thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ /nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsol/ /mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags kyi 'phrin las rdzogs/ /

rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor

thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin du gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /ma rtogs

pa dang log par rtogs/ /phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs/ /'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang / /rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni/ /yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs la/ /brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te/ /khong nas
gab sbas don 'byin pa/ /ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor

dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings/ /sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' ba'i/ /bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs/ /'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum/ /chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te/ /

byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs/ /dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams/ /kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la/ /bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi/ /thugs kyi ye shes lngas lta zhing / /snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas/ /

bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis/ /ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul/ /zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis/ /ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba/ /rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /

de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i/ /sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs/ /ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba/ /dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin/ /dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor

nyid/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub/ /rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs/ /rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung / /phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon/ /

sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis/ /bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod/ /ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis/ /rang byung kun nam lhun gyis grub/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ /

'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog /gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis/ /phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis/ /nye ba'i sras su dgongs par

'gyur/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du/ /shin du sbyangs la rab gnas shing / /dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi/ /'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /'das dang da ltar byung ba yi/ /

rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas/ /brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs/ /'byung dang ma thongs thams cad kun/ /'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi/ /'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil

'khor ma lus la/ /'di yis gsang ba'i nges don med/ /btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do/ /kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog /thos bsam bsgoms la rab sbyangs pa'i/ /shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung / /snod ldan ngang tshul bzang

la brtan/ /lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin/ /gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin/ /dus min par ni srog zad nas/ /bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas/ /shes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du

brjod do/ /dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ shin du gsang ba man

ngag gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog /

gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems/ /rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing / /ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin/ /'gro 'ong med par dus gsum gcig char rdzogs/ /dbye bsal med phyir bzang ngan blang dor med/ /

rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin te/ /rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med/ /bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa/ /khri la 'ga' tsam gal te 'byung 'gyur zhing / /snga rabs phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i/ /mngon sum sangs rgyas

skyes mchog de dag la/ /bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa/ /dad ldan 'ga' yis 'tsham par ci thig gi/ bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa/ /gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis/ /bstan kyang ma thos mtshon

kyang ma mthong ba/ /bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas/ /de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing / /bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te/ /shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing / /bya byed las 'phags gyin 'da' 'dug

byed pa/ /gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob/ /ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yong med pas/ /dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de/ /ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la/ /blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang / /

mchod cing bsten pas byang chub thob mngon te/ /nam mkha' gzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na/ /sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do/ /rnam par rtog pa'i g.yung

drung sangs rgyas la/ /thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing / /mi rtog sa ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad/ /snyad du med pas sna tshogs 'byung ba yin/ /bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter/ /ma bkag

pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i/ /thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdags su med/ /ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing / /thob rgyu med pas ye nas bder gshegs yin/ /zhes brjod pas chos dang ye

shes kyi khams thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas bar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje

gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /e ma'o ma sgrubs grub chen po/ /grub pa chen po ye shes che/ /blang dor med pa'i sa chen po/ /mi g.yo 'du 'bral med pa'i gzungs/ /rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter/ /thams cad la yang me long

bzhin/ /bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo / /gang na gsang chen 'di yod par/ /me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs la/ /spu gri so ni gtams pa la/ 'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos/ khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du/ /lcags kyi sgrom bu

kha bsdam mo/ /dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir/ /dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod/ /de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid pa las gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan
la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi sku la thams cad ma

lus par ston te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs dang / /'byung bar ma nges dus 'di dag /snga phyi med par mnyam yin par/ /nges pa med par yang dag gsungs/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /rang dang

spyi ru bstan pa dang / /ji snyed brtan g.yo la sogs pa/ /sgyu ma mig yor tshul yin te/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/ /de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing / /sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa/ /de dag gnyis med dbyings su sbyor/ /

thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de/ /thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor/ /thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi/ /de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog /ji snyed brjod pa'i kha rgyud kyang / /yang dag don gyi snying po ni/ /gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de/ /

rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin/ /de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni/ /bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te/ /de ni ma nor lam yin par/ /a yis b+ho d+hi rab tu bsdus/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni/ /gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du med/ /gsum

du sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'phro/ /byin brlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog /don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis/ /de las lhag pa'i don smra ba/ /de ni rnam dag lam min te/ /rang blos bsams pa'i 'khrul pa yin/ /thams cad rang

rig byang chub sems/ /de ni lung gi tshad mar bshad/ /tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te/ /dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing / /'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs che te/ /'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas/ /bya ba med la byas pa med/ /zad pa'i dus

med yid bzhin gter/ /bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod/ /za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal/ /gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtogs pas brtags pa la

mngon par zhen pa dang yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs pas/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu

tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so/ /de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin du grang yang ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa pad ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyan

pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang / shin du grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo / /de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dgas ltogs pa

dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyan pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur pa dang / yong mid par yang 'gyur zhing shin du rid cing skams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang

dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang / bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so/ /de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dgas srin po chen po rab tu gdug pa gtum po

lus gcig la mgo brgya pa dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor

rab tu mang po dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrogs pa/ gzugs dang / ro dang / dri dang / kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyid bung zhes byed pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang

ba dang tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs kun tu khams 'khrugs par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs pa byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i ris dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / lha'i ris dang /

tshangs pa'i ris dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba man cad dbang du bsdus so/ /de sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dus par gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan

pa'i glu 'di blangs so/ /e ma 'o 'gro ba yongs ni bde gshegs lam yin te/ /sdug bsngal sreg mdzad sgyu ma'i sprul par snang / /yon tan rmad 'byung che ba'i rang bzhin 'di/ /sdug bsngal kun la bshes gnyen mgon

po yin/ /rmongs dang 'khrul pa rab sel zhe sdang 'joms/ /kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste/ /rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i 'phrin las bsam yas pas/ /thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms/ /sku
mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam yas la/ /rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing / /byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par mdzad/ /'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu pa/ /a hoH dgyes pa'i

mnyes pa nyid la gnas par mdzad/ /byin brlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang / /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun nas rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i

rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa gsum gyi bdag po 'dul ba'i nga rgyal chen po gzi brjid ston pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das

dgyes pa chen po khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin chen po rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas khro mo'i dbang phyug chen mo mngon du phyung ste hi hi zhes

dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad ma rgyas par mdzad nas gnyis su med par 'khyil pa'i dgyes pas thim nas byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M bi shwa badzra kro d+ha dz+wa la na maN Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha hU~M zhes brjod pas

'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad g.yos/

rab tu g.yos kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun du rab tu chem chem mo/ /shig shig rab tu shig shig kun du shig shig go/ gtor gtor rab tu gtor gtor/

kun du gtor gtor ro/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i stong khams thams cad na gnas pa'i dbang che ba dang mthu che ba'i dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad brgyal rab tu brgyal po gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes

pa chen po nyid 'jigs byed chen po shin du rngam pa'i skyi bung zhes byed pa'i 'bar ba chen po khrag 'thung sku smug nag cir yang 'gyur ba dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa de dbu gsum

phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur te/ dur khrod chen por dgyes nas khrag gis rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor keng rus chen por ri rab kyi steng gi 'bar ba chen po'i klong gi 'khro lo'i dkyil na dbang phyug chen po dang dur khrod kyi bdag po dregs pa chen po khyo

shug gi gdan la brkyang bskum du bzhugs so/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin phung de dag kyang la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rdo rjer gyur te shar phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po rin po cher gyur te lho phyogs su bzhugs

so/ /la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po pad mar gyur te nub phyogs su bzhugs so/ /la la ni dpal khrag 'thung chen po kun tu las su gyur te byang phyogs su bzhugs so/ /de dag kun kyang 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs dang /

rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'bar ba'i klong na dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / gshin rje la sogs pa khyod shug gis gdan du byas pa la bzhugs so/ /btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo rnams kyang so so'i sku la

'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/ /rigs lnga'i he ru ka las gcig tu bstim te bsdus nas gcig gis mang po 'dul ba'i ngo mtshar bstan nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gtum pa'i sems kyis gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan

nas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros brlang po'i gtum tshig tu smras pa/ thong thong snying rje'i bdag po ci de ltar byed dam zhes 'dzer zhing shin du gtum sems kyis rngam nas khros so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos thams cad

kyi bdag nyid des dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad zhabs brgyad du gnas nas rngam pa'i skad kyis thugs rjes 'dul ba'i thabs kyis shin du 'khros nas/ hU~M hU~M hU~M ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi zhes brjod nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa chen po 'i tshogs

de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung / nad grol kun drangs/ yan lag kun bcad gtubs nas khrag kun 'thungs/ rus pa kun 'chos so/ /de nas hU~M hU~M hU~M e A ra li dzaHdzaHzhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'

dang bcas par yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so/ /de nas 'byung po ma lus pa'i rgyal po 'ang rgyal po dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma/ 'byung po thams cad kyi chung ma/ 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo

srin mo chen mo mo'i srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung

myos byed dang / gcig spyod mo dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod myed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum rna

sngo gnag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser nag chen mo la sogs pa/ bran dang yang bran g.yog dang yang g.yog 'khor zhing gi rdul snyed kyang bsdus so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i

'dul ba'i thabs kyis yang rigs lnga'i 'jigs byed snang bar byas nas de dag kun dgyes pa rol pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di dag

phyung ngo / /oM hU~M a~M badzra pra be sha a la la hoHzhes brjod pas 'byung po'i rgyal mo rnams shin du chags pa'i yid g.yos nas pad ma'i dkyil 'khor sdud cing rgyas par gyur nas/ dper na khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan

'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'i sku la srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang / dmar mo dang / dga' mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / dmar ser chen mo dang / sngo gnag chen mo dang / ser nag chen mo rnams 'khril

to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i sku la tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo rnams 'khril to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rin po che'i sku la bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba

mo dang / be con mo dang / za ba mo dang / srin mo rnams 'khril to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung pad ma chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos pa dang / gcig pu spyod pa dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / gru mo dang / rlung mo rnams 'khril

to/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i kun du las kyi sku la me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo rnams 'khril to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo'i dkyil 'khor

de dag gis hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas pad ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs bsdus nas shin du bcum par gyur to/ /de nas dgyes te ha zhes brjod pas byang chub sems kyi sprin las dkar mo'i tshogs dang / rkun mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs

mo'i tshogs dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs dang / spos mo'i tshogs dang / gtum mo'i tshogs dang / sme sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma tshogs mo'i rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas 'thon to/ /'thon nas kyang 'bar ba

chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang rang gi lag chas chas nas 'khod do/ /de nas shin du dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang /

wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / gzhad gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / kAng+ka gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / dur bya gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / 'ug gdong chen mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang

ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to/ /'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs kyi phyi rol nas 'khor ba'i rngam pa'i mdangs kyis 'khod do/ /de nas shin du dgyes pas phyogs bcu'i zhing du ma lus par

khyab nas phaT ces brjod pas rdo rje bsrings 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / /rdo rje gdong mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'jig rten ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro langs ma'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas 'thon par gyur to/ /
