'thon nas kyang 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgor shin du gtum pa'i gzugs kyis gnas so/ /de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las phyogs bcu nas phaT ces bsgrags pas thams cad khros nas ma mo thams cad kyang rang rang gi gnas

ga la bar yud tsam gyis bgye'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dpal khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun thugs rje chen po'i bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang

thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM badzra ma hA a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+he a~M a~M a~M zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po de dag gi sna nas 'thon to/ /mi gtsang

ba'i 'dam gyi rgya mtshor btsud pa las gnas nas u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha phyung bas 'dam kun 'thungs ste/ dran pa slar rnyed nas khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyang dbu dgu brgya/ phyag stong brgyad

brgya zhabs brgyad brgya/ sku 'bar ba chen po'i dkyil na bzhugs par mthong ngo / /de'i dus su 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu'i srid pa kun du dregs pa'i dbang phyug thams cad 'dul ba thabs sna tshogs bsam gyis

mi khyab par so sor snang bas dus gcig tu btul to/ /de nas de dag shin du 'dar zhing bred pas rab tu zhum pa'i nga ros 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi/ 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ /mgo dang lus ni brgyar 'gas shing / /
snying yang 'gas shing gtubs gyur cig /rul myags tshig nas brlab pa dang / /dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog ces 'bangs su mchi bar mna' bor nas dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la bzhag go /
thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu yang smras pa/ bdag cag rnams kyis mchis brang dang / /ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams/ /dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol/ /dpa' bo lha rje bzhes su gsol/ /bdag cag
so so'i 'khor bcas kyis/ /tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yang / /gtsug gi nor bu 'bar ba ltar/ /g.yo sgyu med cing gus ldan pa'i/ /sems kyis blangs nas spyi bo'i/ /
gtsug tu bzhag ste bkur bar bgyi/ /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag sgrub/ /gal te dpa' bo'i spyan snga 'dir/ /smras pa bzhin du ma bsgrubs na/ /bdag cag rnams kyi mgo lus

snying / /gas gtubs dum bur rul par mchi zhes smras so/ /de nas de'i chung ma'i tshogs dang sring mo dang bu mo'i tshogs thams cad yud tsam gyis 'ongs nas thams cad kyis mgrin cig tu smras pa/ bdag cag 'khor
tshogs thams cad kun/ /dpa' bo chen po'i 'bangs su mchi/ /dpa' bo chen pos bdag cag rnams/ /las kyi dngos grub stsal du stsol zhes smras so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lag tu rdo rje

byin nas ming gi dbang bskur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen mo btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje

rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo / /oM ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA

tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pad ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TA~M ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la nI sarba duSh+TA~M hU~M

phaT/ oM ma hA badzra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma hU~M phaT/ oM hriHma hA sA ra swa ta ma hA pad ma kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hU~M phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa hU~M phaT/ badzra gau rI haH badzra tsau rI haH

badzra pra mo he haH badzra be tA li haH badzra tsaN DA lI haH badzra puk+ka sI haH badzra g+hasma rI haH badzra sma shA nI haH badzra siM ha mu khI he/ badzra byA g+h+ra mu khI he/ badzra sr-i gla mu khI he/ badzra shwa nA mu khI he/ badzra g+h+r-i D+ha mu khI he/

badzra kAng+ka mu khI he/ badzra kha ga mu khI he/ badzra u l+'u ka mu khI he/ badzra Ar+ya te dza te rA dzaMH badzra a ma ka hU~M/ badzra lo kA ba~M/ badzra b+hash+mi pa la ya ba to hoH b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/

b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hU~M/ e h+ye hi A na ya dzaHhU~M/ ba~M hoHrA~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ /thugs rjes khros dpal rngam pa'i tshogs/ /

'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che/ /de nyid du ni bdag la stsol/ /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/ /a li u li/ ta li ta pa ti/ daMSh+Ta~M/ go nA ro/ tri kha ra~M yo gi nI khA hi hoH/ /hU~M ha he phaT ces brjod pas/

'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig rab tu tshig kun du tshig go/ 'bar rab tu 'bar kun du 'bar ro/ /thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang kun du rab tu gang bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i

tshogs chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// //dbang po'i yul de rig pa'i rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing / /mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na/ /thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya/ /bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su/ /

khro bo khro mo thams cad kun/ /gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na/ /bsgul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /zla med chen pos de skad gsungs/ /yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu/ /las rnams so sor rab tu

bsgom/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs/ /rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur/ /thabs chen re re bskyod na ni/ /pad ma chags med re re 'byung / /rdo rje pad ma de 'byor na/ /sems can thams cad bla na med/ /byang chub zhing

du skye bar 'gyur/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang / /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te/ /dbu yi dkyil 'khor bsgul bskyod na/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad g.yo/ /lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na/ /

rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo/ /rkang pa'i stabs chen mnan mchongs na/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad dang / /bdud dang log 'dren thams cad gnon/ /yan lag thams cad bsgul bsigs na/ /ba spu bu ga re re

nas/ /khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro/ de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis/ /phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed du/ /khro bo'i don rnams rdul phran snyed/ /thugs rjes 'dul zhing dbyings su bstim/ /thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang / /

khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus/ /thams cad rdo rje'i brag stengs dang / /me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bar/ /'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin/ /steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'khor lo nr-i mgo gdengs/ /'og gi 'jig

rten bgegs 'dul ba'i/ /rdo rje thong gshol nr-i spar dang / /rdo rje gtun chen dril bu'o/ /shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ /rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang / /ti ra chen po'i dbyug pa'o/ /lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ /rin chen mi

mgo'i dbyug pa dang / /gshin rje chen po'i rkang bzung ba'o/ /nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ /sbrul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang / /khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs/ /rgya mtsho che rnams rkad par gtub/ /byang gi bgegs rnams

'dul ba ni/ /rin po che yi dbyug to dang / /nr-i mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can/ /gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o/ /mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag gis gdul bar 'gyur/ /gal te de yis

ma dul na/ /byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo gdengs/ /i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/ /'byung po de kun rab tu btul/ /shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rdo rje ye shes me lce

'bar/ /me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed/ /drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams/ /me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdus/ /lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rdo rje dang ni srin po'i mgo / rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar/ /

bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/ /srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus/ /nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba/ /rlung gi ba dan nri mgo gdengs/ /shin du drag po'i glang po'i brjid/ /tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams/ /

g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdus/ /'og tu 'jig rten bgegs 'dul phyir/ /phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste/ /phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams/ /'og gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o/ /gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /tsha dang grang

ba'i sdug bsngal sel/ /me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ /thams cad ma lus sreg par byed/ /chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ /thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ /thams cad ma lus stor bar

byed/ /gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lor bcas/ /mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang / /rdo rje mdung chen dgra star bcas/ /mche gtsigs spu gri so dang ni/ /mda' dang mdung dang sti ra dang / /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so/ /dbus kyi he ru'i phyag rgya

ni/ /sti ra dbyug to chen po dang / /'khor lo chen po rab tu 'bar/ /dung chen dmar gyis gang ba la/ /rdo rjes dkrug cing rab tu gsol/ /shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar/ /

nr-i mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol/ /lho yi phyag rgya chen po ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su/ /dmar gyi ar+g+ha rab tu gsol/ /nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /

pad ma chags med rab tu 'bar/ /dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol/ /byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni/ /sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang / /rdo rje rgya gram rab tu 'bar/ /dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol/ /khro mo rnams kyang

khro dang 'thun/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni/ /rgyud gzhan ngag dang 'thun par bshad/ /ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni/ /'jig rten 'das mdo che las bshad/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi pa/ /gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan/ /gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid/ /'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po
'khrug /khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag /gtum pa'i dom gyis spar bas ni/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzur/ /smug nag sngo gnag ser gnag dang / /dmar gnag ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku/ /dbu

gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad/ /ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon/ /rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs/ /sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlar bcas/ /steng gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas/ /rdo rje dung chen gang

ba dang / /ral gri dgra sta gshol la sogs/ /rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing / /slas dang byi mo tshogs

kyi gtso/ /bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes/ /rang gi stan dang lag cha dang / /ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar gyur

to/ /de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /a ho/ bskal par bcas shing dug tshogs 'bar ba yi/ /nyon mongs kun
g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i/ /ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa/ /ro tshogs khrag la brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas/ /zhen pa'i gdug mo shin tu gsal dka' ba'i/ /
mi mngon dbyings nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis/ /snyigs mar bcas shing mtshams sbyor kun dam zil gyis gnon/ /rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi khyab/ /de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun

'byung kun du gsal/ /ho/ chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod mi lang / /dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang / /'dod pas zhen pa'i las kyang ji snyed ji srid par/ /drag po brngo ba'i rlung chen

bsam mi khyab/ /bde bar bcas pa gzhan du med par brjod mi lang / /bskal bar bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtog kun du rtog /de rnams zil gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par/ /rkyen du bcas nas sbu bus

'bras bu smin pa rab smin ltar/ /dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i tshogs/ /dpag med bsam yas lhun grub pas/ /rab tu 'dul bar shin du gsal/ /ho/ /khro bo'i rang bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin

zhing / /zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yod ma yin/ /de nyid gnyis su min pa'i cho 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun tu khyab/ /rigs lnga khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rab ston

pa'i/ /rnam dag byang chub mchog gi dbyings te gsang ba'i snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu gnas par gsal/ /ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil
'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos nyid kyi byin brlabs dang yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba

'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /oM sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po ni/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes snying po'i mchog nyid de/ /sangs rgyas kun du bzang po nyid/ /'di yin gzhan na med pa ste/ /

rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing / /srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun/ /sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du/ /ma g.yos lhun gnas snying po ste/ /rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las/ /ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la/ /

sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa/ /snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis/ /nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan/ /gdug cing gtum pa'i khams gsum na/ /'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyong zhing / /phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad/ /

ye shes ngo mtshar tsham ngam gyis/ /chos bzhi rnam dag che ba'i lha/ /ye shes sku ste khyad par che/ /chags pa'i tshogs kyis mtshan ma ni/ /'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku/ /gtum ngam gdug pas mtshan pas na/ /zhe sdang chen po nyid

kyi sku/ /'dul bya zhing du rab sbyor zhing / /chos nyid mnyam las bzhengs pas na/ /gti mug chen po nyid kyi sku/ /snod bcud dag pa'i spyod yul ba/ /thugs sku gsung las 'phros pa dang / /rgyal ba nga yis mtshan pas na/ /nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku/ /

gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis/ /thig le thugs su bsdus pa nyid/ /gzhan du mi gtong mtshan pas na/ /de nyid phrag dog nyid sku rdzogs/ /stong gsum stong gi stong chen po/ /'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa/ /rdul dang bye ba la sogs pa'i/ /

bgrang ba las ni rab 'das mtshan/ /de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid/ /'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings/ /chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog /snying po thig le bsam yas nyid/ /'jigs byed dbu dgu bcwa

brgyad phyag /sgyu mas mtshan pa'i dra ba yin/ /de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags/ /gcig la gsum du mchog tu sngags/ /yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do/ /bdag rig gzhan don snying po nyid/ /thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa/ /

gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes che/ /ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa/ /phyag dang zhabs su rnam par brtags/ /brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i sku/ /ci yang med las cir yang snang / /skal bzangs mchog gi sgyu 'phrul pa/ /

dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs/ /brtags pa zil gnon chos nyid spyan/ /spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid/ /ji bzhin dbyings kyi yul la sbyor/ /rol ba'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa/ /gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs/ /

pad ma 'khyil ba nyid sku gsung / /mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig /ye shes chen po'i spyan dgrad las/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba yi/ /mi yi tshogs kyi gzhan phug glog /bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas na/ /bdud rtsi

mchog gi khro bo yin/ /sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las/ /sna tshogs 'char bar rab ston pa/ /ye shes sgyu 'phrul stobs chen po/ /mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las/ /gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni/ /shes rab tshogs la 'phrul

pa dang / /thugs rje dra ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas pa/ /dbyings nyid bde la skyod pa ste/ /'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don/ /rta yi gar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o/ /chos

dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mthas klas par/ /rtsed mo mchog gi phyag rgya ni/ /brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te/ /thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don/ /rab dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba/ /thig le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs la/ /zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa/ /sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams/ /nga rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang

gcod/ /gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul ba/ /dra ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni/ /khros pa'i dam tshig snying de yis/ /mnyam pa'i thig ler dgod pa ni/ /gshin rje gshed por gdug pa'i rgyal/ /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams

mchog sgrol bden/ /'gro la mgon du gyur pas na/ /dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa'i/ /chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i sprul/ /dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag /dur khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'i/ /g.yang gzhi

stag gi lpags chen bgos/ /'jigs byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni/ /skye shi rtsa ba gcod mdzad pa/ /mi g.yo mgon zhes mchog tu bsgrags/ /nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed pa/ /nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig ste/ /kun du

bzang po'i spyod yul la/ /sngags kyi snying po de nyid pa/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M gis sdud za 'thung / /rdo rje thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis/ /hU~M mdzad ches ni rnam par bsgrags/ /mi mched gti mug chen po ni/ /nyon mongs rgya mtsho rdub pa'i phyir/ /ban d+ha klong chen 'thung

bar snang / /'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin chen po/ /bskal pa las kyi zil gnon pa/ /rdo rje me yi 'bar ba 'byung / /nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par byed/ /'jigs byed thams cad dam tshig gis/ /bsam yas 'jig rten 'khor yug

bcas/ /rang gi sku yi gzhal med bsdus/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes ni/ /zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling / /tshom bu gnyis kyi lha chen po/ /rdo rje sku yi byin brlabs kyis/ /thig le mi g.yo bde ba las/ /rang bzhin rol pa chen pos ni/ /

rdo rje 'phra men pho nya'i tshogs/ khams gsum 'dul bar yang dag mdzad/ /ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid/ /ha ni thig le zhi khro snyoms/ /ha ni thig le dbang chen yin/ /ha ni thig le drag po nyid/ /ha ni thig le rol pa nyid/ /ha ni thig les phrin las nyid/ /

ha ni thig les chags dbang 'dul/ /ha ni thig le las kun rdzogs/ /he ni thig le ye shes thugs/ /he ni thig les gsung snyan pa/ /he ni thig les tsham ngam lca/ /he ni thig le rol pa nyid/ /he ni thig le dbang rtags yin/ /he ni thig les

drag shul ga /he ni thig les thugs chen rdzogs/ /he ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba/ /'jigs byed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te/ /dra bas zil gnon lam 'gog go/ hU~M ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs/ /hU~M ni ye shes thugs sku nyid/ /

hU~M ni ye shes thugs sku gsung / /hU~M ni ye shes yid bzhin las/ /hU~M ni thig le ye shes so/ /phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs/ /phaT ni gsung gi gsung gi thugs/ /phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs/ /phaT ni chos sku'i thugs kyi

thugs/ /phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs/ /phaT ni chos thugs thugs kyi thugs/ /sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa ho/ /dbang phyug chags pas dgyes pa ho/ /gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho/ /sku gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho/ /

yon tan las kyi dgyes pa ho/ /pho nya 'du 'phros dgyes pa ho/ /kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho/ /byin gyi brlabs kyis dgyes pa ho/ /chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho/ /ye shes rol pa dgyes pa ho/ /ci yang min pas dgyes pa ho/ /gnod pa spud pas

dgyes pa ho/ /chos kyi dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho/ /des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dgyes par gyur te/ chos thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya las dgyes pa chen po'i byin brlabs

dang yon tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso/ /btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/ /sku

gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgom/ /'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /

'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/ /bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs byed rin chen rigs kyi gtso/ /

btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/ /bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du/ /

sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgom/ /yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro/ /'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su/ /'jigs pa'i 'phrin las rigs kyi gtso/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom/ /

zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas/ /las bzhi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su/ /lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas/ /bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil
'khor bsgom/ /'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs/ /yon tan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom/ /rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par/ /

tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs sgom/ /glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang / /shes rab thabs su shes pa dang / /byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dang / /brda la sogs pa'i yon tan dang / /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod
lnga ldan thams cad kyi/ /mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig le'u ste sum bcu gsum pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil 'khor yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro/ /gsang sngags

spyi yi dkyil 'khor las/ /shes 'jug yum gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs dang / /lus gang lus do gsum gyi tshad/ /rang gi rigs pas ci nus par/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /

gnod bskrad sa gnon byin gyis brlab/ /ljon pa lcug phran sdong gcig dang / /ma reg tshon gyis ji bzhin du/ /goms par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab/ /'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas/ /gnas dang zla dang rdzas
rnams ni/ /tshogs kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag /dang por mchod sbyin dam pas mchod/ /gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni/ /ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod/ /'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas/ /

khro mo ji snyed 'khor du bya/ /bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog /gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te/ /'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing / /thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas/ /bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul

du/ /de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim/ /dzaHzhes lan gsum brjod pas na/ /de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing / /ye shes lnga yi dngos grub sbyin/ /pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams/ /de yi dgos pa byed par 'gyur/ /yang na

sa gzhi rab mnyam la/ /phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams/ /lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya/ /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/ /rdo rje dung chen dmar rtsis dgang / /dung dang srog shing gsar rnying dang / /zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang / /

ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun/ /'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang / /nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la/ /rdeng dang bcas pa'i bsam pa yis/ /re ba med par rab tu bsgrub/ /bsnyen pa dang

ni nye bsnyen pa/ /sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos/ /zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na/ /dkyil 'khor 'thun pa nyid du sbyar/ /zhag ni sum bcu phrag drug gam/ /drug bcu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu/ /'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor

bsgom/ /'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus dbul/ /de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag /'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig las/ /nams kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dgyes pa chen

po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste sum bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sngags kyi snying po 'di ched du brjod do/ /a ki du na dz+wa la maN Da la phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ta thA

ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ma hA badzra shrI he ru ka badzra kro d+he shwa ri sarba duSh+TAn hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha mu kha hU~M phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA sa

ma ya hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM hrIHpad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka pad ma ma hA kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba a ga ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa rU pe hU~M phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hU~M/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta

badzra rat+na pad+ma a mo g+ha ma hA badzra shrI he ru ka /ma hA sa ma ya ha he hU~M phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pad ma shrI he ru ka man tra dz+wa la ma hA maN Dal kA ya bA ka tsita ta/ oM oM oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ swA~M swA~M swA~M/ A~M A~M A~M/ hA~M hA~M hA~M / badzra

ma hA ka pA la khaD+ga daN+De na dz+wa la sid d+ha/ ma hA shrI he ru ka a me du me sid d+hod b+hA be/ sa~M ha ra Na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ma hA yo ga ad d+ha ma hA sa ma ya/ ru lu ru lu/ a la la hoH ho sems nyid thig ler rab gnas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis nyid

rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje he ru ka /tshom bu dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi/ /sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cig /oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM a~M hU~M su ra s+t+wa~M/ ka ma la ma hA su kha mA lai ma nu sa ma na dz+wa la ni

d+ha na a ba yo ga khA hi a la a la hoH gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das

dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen pos phung po dang / khams dang skye mched sbyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad ma sa ma

yo gi nI dzaH zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun tu pad mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa las dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul

snyed du srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas par gyur to/ /de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing / oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na zhes brjod

pas lha'i tshogs dang / /klu'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to/ /de nas yang ha ha a pi ra tsa ti

Sh+Tha zhes brjod pas la la ni lus shin du brjes te ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur te/ la la ni mngon sum gcan mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to/ /de nas yang sa 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba

dad pa med cing rdo rje theg pa dmod pa zhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ oM pad ma sa ma yo gi ni ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M zhes brjod pas kun tu sku chags pa'i bdag nyid dang /

kun du gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang / kun du thugs chags par gyur pa dang / kun du rin po che chags pa chen po dang / kun du 'phrin las chags pa chen por gyur/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / dbus

chen por khrag gi dba' klong keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid snang bar gyur to/ /de yang kun du sku lnga 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /

'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun du thugs lnga'i rol pa dang / zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jigs pa dang / rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to/ /de las mchog gi snying po chen po mahA rad+na ti la ka'i

dbur gyur las rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs byed chen pa'i theg le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhugs so/ /de nas de nyid du sku dang / dbu dang / phyag dang / zhabs

dang / 'khor stong khams kyi rdul snyed du 'jigs byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par mthong ngo / /de nas yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes bu chen po sa 'dzin gyi bdag po thong thong ji de lta bu byed dam zhes pa

las de nas yang dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis/ oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan pas dam pa'i bstan pa rdo rje theg pa dmod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab

pa dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te rab tu brgyal nas ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su

phyin par gyur to/ /de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+Tha badzra a~M a~M zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang phral/ mi mthun pa'i lus brjes te lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to/ /de nas

dgyes pa chen po'i dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las las thugs kyi

dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje thig le chen po'i dam tshig sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /oM khrag mangs dba' klong 'khyil ba yi/ /keng rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum/ /'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga yi ri/ /

'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang / /gru chad bzhis brgyan rab brjid pa'i/ gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan/ /'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid/ /ta na mang po lha chen brten/ /

dgyes pa chen po kun du bzang / /phyag dang zhabs ni brgyad pa yin/ /thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid/ /'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i/ /rdo rje snying po thig le thugs/ /dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad/ /

khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni/ /dgyes pa chen po'i tshul 'chang ba/ /phyogs bzhi grwa dang bcas par ni/ /sprul pa'i rnal 'byor phra men rnams/ /ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas/ /'bar bas phyag bsnams

chen po ni/ /rdo rje dug chen gang ba dang / /pad+ma'i gzhal med rnge'u chung brdung / /zhing gi zhags pas 'ching ba dang / kha T+wA~M 'phen cing 'khril ba ste/ /btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /sgo

bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par/ /bran mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i tshogs

byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum bcu drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi/ /sgyu 'phrul lam gyi dkyil 'khor las/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs par/ /'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin/ /shin du phra la sbyangs pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis mdzes/ /

tshom bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu/ /spro zhing bsdu ba 'ang de bzhin no/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir ni/ /rkang 'thil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri/ /oM dang mu~M gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de las phra mo rdo rjes dgang / /phra bar sa bsdus 'thil du gzung / /

yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags/ /gang gi yul yang dbang du 'gyur/ /mi mthun gzugs su brtags pa ni/ /dra ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin/ /lugs ka bzhin du ha~M du brtag /de las 'od bzhin 'thil du gzung / /gsang

nas ngag lam ha~M du bya/ /rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag /drag po lce yi sbyor ba yis/ /gling khams gzhan du shin du gtang / /bdag nyid hU~M gi tshogs bcas pa/ /ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom/ /bya ba chos khams de yi

tshogs/ /m+'u~M du byin brlabs yi ger bstim/ /brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du yis/ /nam mkha' bzhin du shin du bsgom/ /brtan 'gyur a yi snying po bzlas/ /nyams su lon par ma gyur tshe/ /'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor/ /

dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang / rnam pa mang por mnyam du'o/ /de las mi snang gzugs zhi ba/ /rab tu blo yi theg gnas ni/ /gzhan du nams kyang mi bstan cing / /gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs/ /longs spyod rnam par sbyor

ba dang / /rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no/ /rmongs pa 'phar dang brtson 'grus zhan/ /nams kyang sbyin par ma gsungs te/ /smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du/ /sus kyang phyin par ma gsungs la/ /srog chags kha yi gtam bzhin du/ /

nams kyang smra bar mi bya'o/ /byed pa rdo rje gsha' yi tshogs/ /bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gling bzhi'i lam/ /kun du bzang po'i thabs tshul ba/ /tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /chos khams bya ba a yi tshogs/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis

gleng slong ba/ /kun du bzang mo shes rab tshul/ /gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs/ /tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de ni chos khams a la bstim/ /chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings/ /kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum/ /

de yi ngang du tshogs kun brtags/ sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams/ /de yi dbyings nas 'byung bar ni/ /'dod pa'i bdag la shin du brtag /mi gnas nam mkha'i mthas klas par/ /goms par 'dod pa thod pa dang / /chu las sa

bzhin 'gro ba dang / /bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang / /tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang / /phyogs bcu kun du phyin par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi le'u ste sum bcu

bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /k+Sha lam

a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs mi bzhin du ni/ /de nyid yid lam mchog grub pa'o/ /de nyid gsal bar mnyam sbyor las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /

oM lA~M a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub pa'o/ /de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /

swA~M lam a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de nyid khyad par lam mchog go / chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /

oM lam a yi tshon bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de nyid gsum mchog grub pa'o/ /chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas/ /sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab/ /

hA~M lam a yi tshogs bzhin du/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni/ /de ni 'phrin las ye shes so/ /de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni/ /rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag

rgya bsgom/ /de nyid ha dang k+ShaHnyid de/ /mu~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa/ /de nyid hU~M lam phyag bsnams pa/ /rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /

yang na rtse lnga thugs kyi thugs/ /dbus nas hU~M gi lo tsa na/ /lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing / /hU~M hU~M hU~M gis lan gsum du/ /rang lus ngag yid byin gyis brlab/ /mu~M gi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul/ /'bru lnga rgya bcings byin gyis

brlab/ /bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri/ /zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis/ /de 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur/ /bcu pa drag po mthing gnag dbud/ /'gying ba'i gar gyis

gsor ba yis/ /gsung snyan sgra yi bro rdebs pa'i/ /phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na/ /phaT phaT hU~M gis gsod pa yin/ /snying po thugs brtag phyag bsnams pa/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyal po las/ /bsod nams lus 'jig dbang

du 'gyur/ /ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad/ /brgyan pa sgegs pa pho nya dang / /tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang / /mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag /drag shul mthu yi dregs pa can/ /sngags shing brgyal te blo stor nas/ /bum pa bzang po

'bul bar 'gyur/ /lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang / /rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang / /gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang / /gtsug na nor bu yod pa dang / /ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul/ /de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /de yi dgos pa thams

cad ni/ /ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs

pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma'o ye nas dag chos la/ /log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub/ /

thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes/ /thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las/ /rnam rtog mi mthun so sor gyur/ /la la'i sman la la la'i dug /sman du ma gyur gang yang med/ /thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las/ /mi mthun khyab par so

sor snang / /sus kyang ma byas su byed yod/ /rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcing / /sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang / khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang / /dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang / /nyon mongs sdug

bsngal thams cad sbyong / /rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed/ /sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs/ /de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya/ /kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas/ /de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin/ /gtsang dang sme ba'i blo rtog bor/ /

thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod/ /rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs/ /thabs kyis pha rol phyin la spyod/ /snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis/ /bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /bdud rtsi'i don ni skye shi med/ /bdud rtsi gnas ni

byang chub sems/ / bdud rtsi las ni rnam rtog sbyong / /bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad/ /sman gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/ /ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris 'grub/ /gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin/ /gzhan yang dgos

pa sna tshogs 'grub/ /rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang / /rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug /klu dug sbod gtong dug la sogs/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /dug rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang par

bsgom/ /gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim/ /oM hU~M trA~M hrIHa/ /yang na yi ge A~M gyis bya/ /yang na yi ge hrIHlas gtang / /dug rnams bdud rtsir bsgyur bar bya/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya/ /a hoHrdo rje gsang ba'i chig tu'o/ /hU~M bdag

nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste/ /thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed/ /nga dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing / /byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o/ oM bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste/ /ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang / /thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi/ /

trA~M/ bdag nyid nga rgyal yon tan te/ /snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed/ /zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor/ /yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o/ /hrIHbdag nyid 'dod chags gsum mchog ste/ /nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal

rnam par dag /chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o/ /A bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste/ /don rnams ma lus grub par byed/ /log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog /phyogs bcu dus bzhi 'phro ba'o/ /m+'u~M bdag nyid shes pa 'od gsal te/ /le lo

g.yeng ba sel bar byed/ /thugs rje myur ba las byung ba/ /rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o/ /nyon mongs las rnams dag byed cing / /dbugs chen dag kyang 'byin par byed/ /dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsum ste/ /lam lnga sbyong pa ye shes lnga/ /'khor

ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon/ /hU~M du bsdus shing hoHyis g.yeng / /ra~M gyis bsregs shing phaT kyis 'phang / /thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi/ /thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya/ /de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas/ /ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru

bsgom/ /'bru gcig 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom/ /bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang / /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom/ /nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsal/ /de las longs spyod lnga kun dang / /ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang / /

lha mo lnga dang sman lngar bsgom/ /oM hU~M trA~M hrIH aHoM badzra a mr-i te kuN+Ta li ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM bi shud d+he a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ oM d+harma a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ oM AHhU~M ces brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur/ bdud rtsir gyur/ sa chu me rlung nam mkha'

rnams/ /rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /gcig la lnga lngar dbye bya zhing / /mu~M gi dbyings su bstim par bya/ /'byung ba che rnams de dag la/ /lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya/ /rigs pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing / /

'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de/ /yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya/ /de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do/ /rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu gnyis/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na/ /de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun/ /smos ci dgos

te de nyid yin/ /a hoHe ma'o lhag pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bdag la lha rnams bsdu bar bsgom/ /de nas lha dang gnyis med nas/ /bdag nyid yi ge oM dang mu~M/ /gnyis dang bdag dang dbyings su thim/ /bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil bar bsgom/ /sku mdog

gangs la nyi shar 'dra/ /zla ba pad ma gdan khri la/ /nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan/ /lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes/ /slas dang byi mo tshogs kyis bskor/ /a ho 'khor lo

rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas/ /dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste/ /shar gyi rtse la rdo rje 'o/ /lho yi rtse la rin po che/ /nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas/ /byang gi rtse la don yod grub/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan par bsgom/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar
bsgom/ /snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas/ /de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni/ /bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar/ /re ba yid bzhin skong bar byed/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed/ /

'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed/ /dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o/ /bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed/ /sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan par dang / /a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid ni/ /byang chub sems dang sha chen dang / /dri chu dri chen mAng sar bcas/ /pad ma

raka ta la sogs dang / /gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams/ /dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar/ /bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis brlab/ /rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir/ /gtsang sme med par dag par bya/ /dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya/ /

phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing / /dug gsum sdug bsngal med pa dang / /bskal par yun ring gnas pa dang / /dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsung / /

bdag nyid yi ge hU~M gyur nas/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/ /oM AHhU~M du gyur par bsgom/ /'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro/ /slar 'dus 'od 'phro bdud rtsir 'bar/ /shin du gsal zhing rtse gcig bsgom/ /

gzhan yang yi ge'i tshogs pas gdab/ /'thungs na ngan song sgrib pa byang / tra ta/ rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub/ /bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing / /lha la rtag tu mchod byas na/ /bdag dang gnyis su med par

'gyur/ /mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas na/ /drag po gtum po 'ang lhan ner 'gyur/ /gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob 'gyur na/ /lha srin la

sogs smos ci dgos/ /the tshom med par bsgrub par gyis/ /rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste

sum bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni/ /'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid/ /

khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas/ /de nyid sgyu 'phrul thabs mkhas pa/ /dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi brten gyur pa/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /

de nyid ngag lam kun khengs par/ /hU~M gi tshogs su rnam par bsgom/ /lus nyid hA yi tshogs la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas/ kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /dzaHzhes bya ba'i

sngags bzlas nas/ /mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spang / /dri rno snga bas mgyogs pa dang / /gang du bya ba byin par byed/ /de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/ /zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la/ /dal bus hU~M zhes bsdus

pa yis/ /bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi brten gyur pa/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par/ /oM gyi tshogs su shin du
bsgom/ /lus nyid aHyi tshogs la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ kha dog dkar po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ /mang pos bkur ba

rgyal chen po/ /blo rno yid mdzangs bzhin bzangs dang / /snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang / /gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/ /zhi bas bdag gis gzugs bzung la/ /ngal bus
oM zhes bsdus pa yis/ /bdag gi lus la gzung bar 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa/ /phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag lam kun khengs par/ /

swA~M gyi tshogs su rab tu bsgom/ /lus nyid swA~M gyi tshogs la stim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ kha dog ser po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /swA~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ /

nor mang blon po yid mdzangs la/ /blo rno snga bas longs spyod 'dud/ /de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing / /gnas ni dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/ /rgyas pas bdag gi gzugs bzung la/ /

dal bus swA~M zhes brjod pa yis/ /bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi brten gyur pa/ /phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag la lus khengs par/ /A~MHgyi

tshogs su shin du bsgom/ /lus nyid A~MHgyi tshogs la bstim/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ kha dog dmar po'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /A~MHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ /rgyal mo

zhang blon dbang chen dang / /ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ /de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing / /gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na/ /dbang gis bdag gi gzugs bzung la/ /dal bus A~MHzhes

brjod pa yin/ /bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid/ /chos sku mchog gi brtan gyur pa/ /phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom/ /de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par/ /hA~M gyi tshogs su shin du

bsgom/ /lus nyid hA yi tshogs la bstam/ /gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas/ kha dog ljang khu'i tshon phye yis/ /de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la/ /hA~M zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas/ /las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod

gzugs/ /dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon bzang / /zhe sdang can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur/ /'dod chags can rnams 'du ba dang / /nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur/ /de yi bstan pa 'dzin par byed/ /de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing / /

gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur/ /de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na/ /snyoms pas khro yi gzugs bzung la/ /dal bus ha~M zhes brjod pa yis/ /mi snang ba'i gzugs su 'char/ /bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur/ /gling ngam

dur khrod gnas rnams su/ /nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis/ /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la/ /dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

byin gyi brlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las

phyung ngo / /dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum/ /dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs mU~M du brtag /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /mU~M gyi tshogs kyi lha

rnams bsgom/ /de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /de zla'i ngang tshul da bzung nas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /lam du zhugs la de lus dgang / /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /de bzhin
rigs rnams oM du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang 'thun par rnam par bsam/ /brtan pa AHyi 'phro 'du

ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med ba'i sems nyid las/ /yid bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya shin du gsal ba na/ /nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags/ /'phro 'du rigs dang

'thun pa'i grangs/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /lcags kyu mchog gi phyag rgya bcing / /des na 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /rang bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas/ /gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje rigs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje

sgyu 'phrul yum/ /shin du chos kyis bsgrags pa la/ /gsal bar 'dod pa smra bya ba/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngar byin brlabs lA~M du brtags/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /lA~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams

bsgoms/ /sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las/ /rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob/ /de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan

par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlab te/ /pad ma gsang gnas 'dzum thabs yin/ /sbubs nas zhugs la de lus dgang / /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /rdo rje rigs rnams hU~M du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur

par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang 'thun par shin du bsam/ /brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin rlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i

sems nyid las/ /yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun pa'i grangs/ /sgoms dang bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bskul bar gsungs/ /

rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /rigs dang 'thun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom/ /yon tan sku gsung yid bzhin gter/ /dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo/ /chas shing bsgregs pa'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /ljon pa lcug phran la

sogs la/ /dbab pa mchog gi las bya ba/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs oM du brtags/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan la/ /oM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /sangs rgyas me yi

sbyor ba la/ /rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlobs/ /de nyid mtha' bral mi dgyes las/ /yon tan gter gyi gzugs bcas na/ /sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs

te/ /pad ma gsung nas 'dzum thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /rin chen rigs rnams swA~M du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang

gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying bo gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang 'thun par shin du bsams/ /brtan pa swA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /yid

bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun pa ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /dam tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi/ /

rigs dang 'du 'phro 'thun par bsgom/ /gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal/ /gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang / /ci 'dod 'od dang smra yang rung / /mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang / /bcings pa'i las dang mtshon las thar/ /dpal ldan pad ma

mchog gi yum/ /bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa/ /dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /ljon pa'i lcug phran la sogs la/ /dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs/ /de nas gnas lnga shes rab bsgom/ /spyi gtsug kha dang

snying ga mtshan/ /las bzhi 'bru bzhi ba~M du brtags/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba la/ /rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob/ /de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs
las/ /rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas/ /sangs rgyas gsung chen tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs
la de lus dgang / /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /ming dang snying po bcas pa dgug /rdo rje gsung rnams oM du bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /

phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang 'thun par shin du bsam/ /brtan pa oM gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /chos dbang yi ge sprin
tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /chags pa'i lcags sgrog mchog gis bcing / /chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya

bzhis/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas/ /ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags/ /dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phrul ba/ /dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /ljon pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la/ /spyi gtsug

kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs hU~M du brtags/ /de ni e yi tshogs yin te/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /mi yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms/ /de nyid steng gi lha rnams te/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /

don yod ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /don yod mchog gi tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rgya gram byin brlabs te/ /pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /rgya gram tshon gyis khengs

pa dang / /so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /rdo rje la la rnams hA~M bsgom/ /snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /

rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs

dang 'thun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni/ /dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan cing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /phyogs bcu 'gro dang dbrog pa dang / /tshe bstung ba dang las rnams

dang / /mngon sum ci 'dod smra ba'i mchog /rigs kyi yum dang rtsen par 'gyur/ /srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i

yon tan nyid du mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /a hoHbsam bya bsam par zin pa yi/ /bsam pas mi zin bsam mi khyab/ /bsam yas lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag

med bsam mi khyab/ /rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shes/ /ngo mtshar srid la mtha' bral dmigs med pa/ /de nyid yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam mchog yin/ a hoH rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung

gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams/ kha dog grangs bcas ma brlams pas/ /shes pa blo che khongs yangs la/ /

zab par spyod la mi skyo bar/ /zas srung gos rjes dam zas sbyin/ /dung chen snod du chu yis bsing / /rten du rung bar ting 'dzin dang / /dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan/ /mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig dbog /oM dang mu~M gyi blo bstan

nas/ /gsang bas mtshan ma lnga nas sbyang / /sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis/ /phung po khams dang skye mched sbyar/ /longs spyod lnga ldan mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje ngag lam gsung chen bzlas/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzI na oM/

oM badzra ku la hU~M badzra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta swA~M rat+na swA~M/ oM pad ma ta thA hr-i da ya A ro lig /hA pra dz+nyA hA~M/ d+hA twI shwa ri mU~M/ dwe Sha ra ti lA~M/ mo ha ra ti AM/ rA ga ra ti pA~M/ badzra ra ti tA~M/ mU~M mU~M mU~M/ lA~M lA~M lA~M/ AMHAMHAMHpAM pA~M pA~M/ tA~M tA~M tA~M/ e ba~M

ma ya/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ s+t+waM hoHzhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog /de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang / spyan chen mo dang / mA ma kI chen mo dang / gos dkar mo chen mo dang / dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du kun du snang

bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang pos sgyu 'phrul

chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /sgeg mo mchod pa sbyin bsdu ba/ /gzugs ston dbab par

bya ba ni/ /rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs ya nyid sbyin/ /de nyid pad ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /ya yi tshogs kyi lha

rnams bsgom/ /de nyid hU~M gi lha rnams dang / /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /

pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /spubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /rdo rje tshon gyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying bo ming yang 'bod/ /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /ming yang snying po bcas pas dgug

rdo rje lha rnams hU~M du bsgom/ /snod gnas sgeg mo khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsam/ /brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du

ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni/ /bsgoms

nas bzlas dang mngon sum du/ /sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /rin chen phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba/ /gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/ /rigs dang 'thun pa'i

gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs e nyid sbyin/ /de nyid pad ma'i dkyil 'khor yin/ /de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa/ /e yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid swA~M gyi lha

rnams te/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rje byin brlabs te/ /pad ma gsang nas 'dzul

thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /rin chen tshon gyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /rin chen lha rnams swA~M du bsgom/ /snod gnas phreng ba

khengs gyur par/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsam/ /brtan pa swA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i

sems nyid las/ /sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su

chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /pad ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba/ /gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/ /rigs dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /

'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du brtags/ /de nyid pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid a~M gyi lha rnams te/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs
las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /sangs rgyas pad ma tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus

dgang / /pad ma'i tshogs kyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /pad ma'i lha rnams oM du bsgom/ /snod gnas dbyangs ma khengs 'gyur bar/ /yum gyi tshogs

kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /

sangs rgyas pad ma'i sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ 'phro 'du rigs dang 'thun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /

rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /gar mkhan las kyi byin bsdu ba/ /gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni/ /ris dang 'thun pa'i gzugs brnyan la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs ma nyid sbyin/ /

de nyid pad ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa/ /ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /de nyid hA~M gyi lha rnams te/ /bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las/ /rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas/ /sangs

rgyas las rnams tsa na ka /shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom/ /de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te/ /pad ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin/ /sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang / /las kyi tshogs kyis khengs pa dang / /so so'i

snying pos ming nas dgug /de goms blo bde gsal spro thim/ /las kyi lha rnams hA~M du bsgom/ /snod gnas gar mkhan khengs 'gyur bar/ /yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas/ /phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs/ /

rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /brtan pa hA~M gyi 'phro 'du ltar/ /rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las/ /sangs rgyas las kyi sprin tshogs bsgom/ /phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa/ /'phro 'du

rigs dang 'thun par ni/ /bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na/ /sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing / /rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis/ /rigs dang 'thun pa nyid du bsgom/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /lha rnams mngon du snang ba

dang / /sgo ba sgo ma mang po dang / /dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang / /lha dang klu yi tshogs bcas las/ /mngon du smra bar bya bar 'thun/ /rgyal srid dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang / /bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang / /gsad dang bskrad pa'i tshogs

bcas dang / /bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang / /nor 'dod pa dang ci bya ba/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /dus med par ni mchod dang phrad ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por

gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las byin bsdu ba dang dam tshig dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen pos longs spyod chen po rdo rje snying

po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo / /rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rnams kyis/ /

nges par bsgom par bya ba ni/ /rgyal po'i sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas/ /gzugs su bri 'am rten bcas la/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom/ /de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus te/ /

rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin/ /spyi gtsug kha ngang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du brtags/ /de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing / /goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul du/ /

lA~M nas dag gi dbang por bsdu/ /oM las sangs rgyas tsa na ka /snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom/ /ming dang snying po goms pas dgug /mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na/ /lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi/ /rjes su

chags pa'i mchod par bsham/ /yid la goms pa gsal ba na/ /gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur/ /blon po'i sa 'dzin mchod par bsham/ /yid la goms pa gsal ba na/ /gang la bya ba kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /goms par dzaHnyid mdog

dmar bsgom/ /de goms gsang nas khong bsdus te/ /rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin/ /spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan/ /'bru lngas byin brlabs ba~M du brtags/ /de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /dzaHzhes rgya

bcings drang bya zhing / /goms par gsang gnas zhugs tshul du/ /lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdu/ /A~MHnas sangs rgyas tsa na ka /snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom/ /ming dang snying po goms pas dgug /

mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na/ /lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi/ /rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham/ /de la las su stsal ba na/ /gang la bya ba dbang du gyur/ /lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo/ /yud tsam rtag par 'dod

sgrub rnams/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur/ /dbang phyug lha chen lha dbang po/ /rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la/ /chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan/ /'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams/ /ting 'dzin 'di yis
byed par 'gyur/ /de yi dgos pa thams cad pa/ /ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos kun du gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs

pa'i longs spyod chen po kun du snang bar gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// //

de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang bar gyur to/ /gdug pa'i las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di

brjod do/ /klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang / rigs gsum pa dang / rigs tha dad pa dang / phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba

ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir gegs bsal ba lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di 'thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so/ /sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang / /sa gzhi bdag tu dbang ba dang / /sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod

pa/ /gdug pa'i sbrul rnams bsal ba dang / /'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la/ /gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing / /ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la/ /gdug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir/ /lnga pa zhes ni rab tu bsngags/ /

bdag gis gdug par mchod pa'i phyir/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las/ /bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog /lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin/ /mgo la gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu/ /nyi shu brgya 'am stong dang khri/ /
bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po/ kha dog nag po lce gsum 'bar/ /gdug pa klu yi tshogs mangs bas/ /'khor mang 'jigs brjod skyi bung bas/ /mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca' bya/ /mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru

rnams/ /phral te go ran byas pa na/ /gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding / /nA ga pu ka la nA ga phaT ces brjod/ /'di la goms par gang brtson pas/ /nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung na/ /me lce'i tshogs la phung po bzhin/ /

rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por/ /kun la snang bar gsal gyur nas/ /rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang / /de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /sa la bdag tu bya ba ni/ /thog mar sa gzhi rab mnyam te/ /oM dang

mu~M gyis tshogs kyis dgang / /rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor las/ /'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /de la gshog pa rab brkyang ste/ /rdo rje thal mo drag tu rdab/ /oM badzra kro d+ha du na mu ne du nA gats+tsha/ /

de nas yig 'bru shin du gshig /de nas yig 'bru tha ma bsgreng / /de nas yig 'bru 'phrul bskyed pa/ /nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste/ /sa gzhi mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ de la shin du dngangs gyur to/ /phyogs bcu

kun du 'phros par 'gyur/ /de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor/ /'khor mang ji snyed mchog byed pa/ /gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir/ /rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas/ /nga yi

snying pos brjod nas 'byung / /de la yig 'bru drug brjod na/ /de la gnod par mi nus shing / /gdug pas mchod cing bkur bar 'gyur/ /de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur/ /mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brnyan dang / /mchog dang tha ma 'bring rnams la/ /gdug

pa'i tshogs kyis zhen pa ni/ /snying kar a~M gyi 'bru rnams te/ kha dog dmar po 'bar ba'i nang / /gzugs su snang ba kun bzhun te/ /thub pa'i ngang tshul de bsgoms nas/ /rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam/ /de las rab tu 'jigs par brkyang / /

yig ge dang po tha ma mig /a~M gyi tshogs su 'bar ba gzhan/ /mi bskyod nyid mas be con 'chang / /thod pa'i dbyig bar chad nas ni/ /lce la sngags 'di dran pa yis/ /rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing / /gdug pa'i klu rnams

'dul 'gyur te/ /phyogs bcu kun du 'bros par 'gyur/ /de la mchod dang bran du 'gyur/ /oM mu ne pad ma sa ma yo gi hU~M hU~M dza dza/ /'di la goms par gang brtson pas/ /nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung nas/ /bkur gnas mchod

par byed pa dang / /sgrub pa thams cad myur par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan

'das dpal kun du bzang pos 'byung po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /nga nyid sdug pa'i gnas gshams te/ /lo dang zla ba gsum dang

lngar/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/ /sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/ /rdzas la tshon gyis mdog sgyur bzhin/ /brtags dang mngon du gyur bar ro/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/ /khro bo

chen po rnam par rgyal/ /rang gi rang bzhin de sgyur nas/ /spyan bgrad mche gtsig sdang mig 'bar/ /brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom/ /shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/ /de yi snying po bzlas nas ni/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /de ltar 'grub pa'i

rtags rnams ni/ /gang la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu/ /bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni/ /lce la drag tu phaT ces brjod/ /brgyal 'gyur a~M nas dmar rtsi dbab/ /de las hU~M zhes bya ba yin/ /dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa na/ /'chongs

par 'dod na langs par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las/ /tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom/ /nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te/ /lo dang zla ba gsum lnga bdun/ /de yi dung chen gang ba dang / /rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/ /
sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/ /rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/ /rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal/ /gshin rje

khros pa'i rgyal mor sbyor/ /rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/ /spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par/ /brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom/ /shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/ /de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang / /
oM zhes pas ni rked par gcad/ /des na dbang du gyur bar bsgom/ /sa la gser dang chu las sa/ /yid dang 'thad pa nyid du ni/ /ji bzhin ji bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ /de las 'dod pa bzhin du nges/ /de
bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /de ltar nges pa'i brtags rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na/ /dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos blta/ /oM gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod/ /brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi

dbab/ /ngag las a~M zhes bya bas ni/ /bzlas brjod bcas de bdag nyid bstim/ /de nas 'dod pa bzhin du nges/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la/ /

bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni/ /oM las drag tu phaT ces pas/ /brgyal 'gyur a~M las dmar rtsi dbab/ /de las hU~M zhes bya ba yin/ /dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na/ /'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul

dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa/ /byang chub mchog gi kun ngo bo/ /phyag rgya bzhugs yul la sogs pa/ /gcig pu cha yi ting nge 'dzin/ /rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang / /rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la/ /sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen/ /

rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin/ /rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas/ /khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal/ /rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/ /spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par/ /brkyang

bskum rngam pas zhing steng bsgom/ /shig shig drag tu gyur pa na/ /de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang / /oM zhes bya ba'i rked par gcad/ /des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom/ /sa las gser dang chu las sa/ /yid dang 'thad pa ji lta ba/ /

ji bzhin ji bzhin grub par nges/ /de las 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni/ /ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na/ /dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos lta/ /a~M las

drag tu phaT ces pas/ /brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab/ /de las hU~M zhes bya ba yid/ /dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa ni/ /mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul chen po de nyid las/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams

pa/ /khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas/ /spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar/ /brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing steng bsgom/ /shig shig drag tu gyur pa las/ /mgyogs par

phyogs su song ba na/ /de'i snying po mchog bzlas nas/ /hU~M zhes pas ni bskul ba yis/ /dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed/ /des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom/ /de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par/ /thams cad thams cad grub

par 'gyur/ /de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin/ /oM la drag tu phaT ces pas/ /gang la bya ba mngon bsam nas/ /se gol snol mar gtogs pa yis/ /brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab/ /yid la bsgoms pas langs par

'gyur/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ sgyu 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed pa dam tshig mchod bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i

spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong bar gyur pa sde dpon dang chung mar bcas/ bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis

gus par dam bcas shing / rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig tu yang smras so/ /dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang / /lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni/ /'khor g.yog bye ba drug bcu rnams/ /

keng rus gsar rnying gnas su gyur/ /rlon pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod/ /thod par 'thung za med pa'i nang / /mdung thung ral gri dgra sta dang / /zhags pa dbyig pa zor ba dang / /rnga dang lda ldi khrag 'thor zhing / /gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun

gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te/ /rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/ /de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid/ /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs

bar bdag cag bsgrub/ /'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul/ /oM kha~M d+hu ha swAhA/ dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang / /lus dang ngag nyid dbul ba ni/ /'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu stong / /me tog sil ma bkram pa dang / /

ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang / /rin chen btsal dang brdung ba dang / /rol mo glu gar rab tu snyan/ /rin chen khang pa'i gnas su ni/ /lha mo mang por bdag spyod cing / /rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung / /gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas

g.yogs/ /gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid/ /rin chen me tog la sogs dang / /lha yi me tog phyogs su 'thor/ /lha yi tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la/ /ming tsam 'dzin par

byed pa yis/ /zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te/ /rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/ /de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/ /gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang / /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs pa bdag cag bsgrub/ /

de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid/ /oM sarba de bA ma hA u pa ha/ /rgyal po rnam thos yul 'khor bsrung / /'khor tshogs stong phrag mang po yi/ /lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni/ /'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya/ /me tog

sil mar bkram pa dang / /rgyan mang byug pa bcal bkram pa/ /sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams/ /ci legs par ni rab tu smra/ /rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus/ /mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i/ /bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/ /

rin chen bcal dang 'thung pa dang / /rol mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan/ /rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing / /bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis/ /rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba/ /gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yog /gzugs

mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid/ /rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor/ /rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/ /dri za med pa'i bdag po dang / /dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams/ /'di bzhin gus par bdag cag bgyid/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil

'khor 'di rnams la/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang / /rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/ /de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/ /gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang / /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /ma lus rdzogs

par bdag cag bsgrub/ /de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid/ /oM sid d+ha d+hi d+hi d+hu ho swA hA/ rgyal po mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/ /'khor tshogs khri phrag mang po yis/ /lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni/ /'khor tshogs khri phrag bye ba brgya/ /

me tog sil ma bkram pa dang / /rgyan mang byug pa bcal bkram pa/ /sde dpon nyi shu bye ba rnams/ /ci legs par ni rab tu smra/ /rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus/ /mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par/ /bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags/ /rin chen

bcal dang btung ba dang / /rol mo glu gar snyan pas brgyan/ /rin chen khang bar bdag mchis shing / /bzhon pa dmag mang 'khor bar mchis/ /rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba/ /gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs/ /gzugs mdzes pa ni gda'

bar bgyid/ /rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor/ /rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams dang / /chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mang rnams/ /de bzhin gus pas bdag cag bgyid/ /dgyes pa'i dkyil

'khor chen po 'di/ /ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang / /rang gi snying po 'di brjod na/ /de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid/ /gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang / /de yi dgos pa ci yang rung / /

ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bgyid/ /de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid/ /oM d+ha ka b+hi du b+ha bi shu pa she oM hU~M/ zhes mgrin gcig tu smras pas/ srid pa ji srid pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar gyur nas

bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di byung ngo / /a ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam yas par/ /'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyag dka'

ba'i/ /ma nor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing / /de yi bsngags pa'i bka' las 'da' bar ngas mi nus/ /thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyid la/ /gsang ba'i snying po nges pa sgyu 'phrul mchog

nyid pa/ /nga nyid 'dud 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /de nyid thugs las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do/ /ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin du 'dul bar gyur pa gnas dang / snying po
dbul ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig

rten pa'i tshogs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te/ ched du bstod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so/ /e ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal/ /

dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med par/ /dag pa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor thugs/ /kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku/ /ye shes lnga yi khro rgyal gtso/ /khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka /sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya mtsho 'dul/ /thugs rje

bsam yas khro rgyal kun gyi gtso/ /khrag 'thung kun las ches 'phags yid bzhin mdzod/ /ser gnag mthing gnag ljang gnag dmar gnag dang / /sngo gnag ri rab lta bur brjid pa'i sku/ /bskal bar bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i/ /

ro tshogs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i/ /bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi zad pa'i/ /skar tshogs mang la nyi zla'i 'od bzhin du/ /che btsan dregs pas 'jigs pa'i tshogs kun 'joms/ /mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab

ston cing / /'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs/ /za byed brkam pas thugs sku gsungs gi zhal/ /khrag mtsho mtha' med skems shing sgal tshigs 'joms/ /khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyu/ /

dur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid/ /'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig mdzad thod rlon phreng bas bsgegs/ /rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a a ha las bzhad/ /rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbu la brgyan/ /

smin ris khro gnyer glog bzhin rab 'gyu bas/ /phyogs dang 'thun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed cing sdud/ /sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa/ /'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang / /sdang mig spyan ni nyi zla rgyas

'bar bas/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong / /khros pas zhal gdangs so chen gtsigs 'bar bas/ /srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyegs pa ltar/ /'jig rten dus gcig mid mdzad lam drug gtan
nas gcod/ /ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar ba yis/ /srid gsum ma lus rdul phran stongs par mdzad/ /rkan sgras rol bas 'gro la pheg brdabs bzhin/ khams gsum kun la chos ston rgyas par mdzad/ /
zas su khrag 'thung rdo rje che mchog gsol/ /'jigs tshogs sad pa'i ko rlon g.yang gzhi bsnams/ /klu 'dul yon tan sbrul gnag stong gis klubs/ /'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'og mnan/ /'dod

chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi gtso/ /'dod chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi sku/ /mang po'i 'khor bcas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas/ /zhe sdang 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso/ /zhe sdang gdug pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku/ /
'jigs pa'i tshogs rnams zer gyis kun bzhu ba'i/ /rab tu brjid pa 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /gti mug 'dul ba gti mug kun gyi gtso/ /gti mug blo sel gti mug chen po'i sku/ /mi 'byed khrag 'thung
