sran chen ri rab brtan/ /nga rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun gyi gtso/ /'jigs tshogs sad nas ro tshogs mang gi gnas/ /zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs chog pa'i dus mtha' med/ /'jigs pas phebs par dga' zhing shin tu sdang / /
phrag dog 'dul ba phrag dog kun gyi gtso/ /phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku/ /bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing / /lam nor gdug par bcas pa phaT kyis gsod/ /zhing gi sham thabs

gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams/ /sku 'dra 'jigs tshogs gzugs kyis sku la brgyan/ /zhabs dang phyag tu gyur pa bsam thag chad/ /zhabs chen g.yon mang brkyang pas lha gnon bdud la khyab/ /zhabs g.yas thabs chen

mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing bskum/ /rdo rje se gol phyar brdabs gnyis cher rab sel mdzad/ /'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyu ba'i/ /'jigs par gong na med pa'i dpa' bo khyod/ /zas ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag /

'jigs byed khyod lta bu ni rab tu dkon/ /bskal par bkrus kyang slar skye dri ma la/ /ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin brlabs dang / /thugs rje dag pa'i char gyi cho 'phrul gyis/ /brda tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs las spyod zhing / /shi ba'i

lam 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor du/ /skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char/ /byams sdang mi mnga' bka' drin chen po'i gter/ /khrag 'thung sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las
bka' drin dran pa'i glu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig

rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i ched du 'byung po rnams kyi/ jo mo'i yang jo mo/ mi srin mo chen mo/ mi srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu ma dang /

dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos dang / gcig pu spyod dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / klu mo dang / gsod byed mo dang /

mi mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byad mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum rna sngo gnag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser gnag chen mo dang / rgyal mo dang /

blon mo dang / sde dpon mo dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang / bran dang / yang bran la sogs pa/ slas dang byi mo dang / bran mo rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di/ /gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po

yin/ /thabs chen mtshon pa'i shes rab ni/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang / /gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnams/ /nga yi thugs las sprul pa yin/ /tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang / /dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa/ /sde dpon 'phrog

ma'i yul rnams dang / /lus 'phags pa lang spyod pa dang / /sgra mi snyan dang 'dzam gling du/ /nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di/ /phyogs bcu kun tu spel ba dang / /de yi gzugs la gtad pa ni/ /yid bzhin mdzod 'byor bka' yi

gnas/ /phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos dang / stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /spyod dang bsgom dang bzlas pa dang / /sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis/ /bsgom pa sran dang chos phyogs dang / /bstan pa 'dzin par nus pa yi/ /

gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad/ /gzhan la bsnyad par ma yin no/ /mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing / /yid bzhin sbyor bar mos pa la/ /rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig bstan/ /zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che/ /sbyor ba gnyis ga

mkhas pa dang / /lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang / /gzhan la bsnyad par mi byed cing / /bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o/ /nye ba bsnyen pa dam tshig la/ /bsgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa/ /ci nus par ni shin tu brtson/ /sems can ngang tshul kun

bor nas/ /gang gi yid kyang mi 'khrugs shing / /mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rub/ /bud med 'gugs pas gtso la dbul/ /zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis/ /nges pa can la shin tu gtad/ /gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o/ /thogs med

phyal bar 'dod pa spyod/ /bud med yon tan kun yod cing / /'dod chags kun dang 'thun spyod la/ /rtsa ba dang du blang pa dang / /'tsham par lha yi sku bstan te/ /nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams/ /nam yang sbyin par mi

bya'o/ /de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas/ /gzhan ni bstan par ma gsungs so/ /dad ldan srun cing blo rno bo/ /dad pa che zhing chos la gus/ /chags par ran pa bka' nyan cing / /gnas la dga' zhing lus nyan pa/ /rtsa ba yan lag

dam tshig sgrub/ /mchod pa'i gnas shom sdom pa srung / /bsnyen pa la ni byin phab nas/ /gsang sngags tshogs kyi mchod gnas su/ /nga yi gsang ba byin phab ste/ /thogs pa med par mngon sum la/ /sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam

sbyor ba/ /dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ /bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing / /mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la mchod/ /dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang / /gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la/ /'dod chags spel bar

mi byed cing / /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na/ /nges pa'i don ni mi ston la/ /nga yi dbang dang bslab pa rnams/ /rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin/ /rigs ngan pho mo 'dod spyod ni/ /spro thung 'dod chags rab tu che/ /blo zhan phrag dog sgro skur can/ /

gnyid che chad dang brtson 'grus chung / /slob la mi gus nan tan med/ /slob dpon mi dran spun sems chung / /gal te dam la gnas na yang / /nga yi gsang ba 'dzin pa la/ /mngon du dga' bar mi nus te/ /lta zhan bka' las 'das pa dang / /

grol bar dka' zhing nus mthu zhan/ /mun dang lkog dang skye bo la/ /gar dben phrad par 'dod spyod cing / /'dod chags 'ga' lam de dag la/ /tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed pa/ /dngos kyi don dang 'thun pa las/ /gsang ba'i snying po sbyin mi bya/ /

bskal pa'i 'jig rten bar du yang / /thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing / /nam kyang bstan par mi bya'o/ /'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams phyir/ /gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni/ /rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de/ /rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin/ /

bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas/ /zhes brjod pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku gsung thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje

gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /e e ma e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi/ /ngang nyid bud med gsang bsngags pa yi/ /lnga drug dus btab snang srid 'byung ba'i gter/ /yang dag lam rnyed mngon par kun gnas kun tu gnas/ /chos mang chos

nyid mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las/ /las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul lam chen 'di/ /kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bde ba gcig pu yin/ /chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi dmad 'tsham par bstan/ /sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni bder
gshegs nyid yin rab tu gsal/ /rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las/ dam tshig chen pos bud med btul ba'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de la mchod sbyin chen po ni/ /thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral/ /de nas gnyis med blo yis ni/ /blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje/ /gnyis su

med par bsgral bar bya/ /'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas/ /bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya/ /mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag /bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul/ /bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ /

longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/ /bder gshegs yon tan rmad po che/ /gzhan na yod pa ma yin na/ /lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos/ /

rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing / /gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni/ /dkyil 'khor chen po 'bar bar 'gyur zhes brjod pas/ mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad

khyab par gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste/ lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig chen po ched du
brjod do/ /bla med theg par nges gyur pas/ /nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang / /byas la mi stsogs tshogs gyur te/ /tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs/ /bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu/ /'dul ba'i

dbang du tshul khrims dang / /ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/ /ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /yod med dbu ma 'ang mi dmigs shing / /sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul/ /srog med srog gcad gcad du med/ /srog dang skyes

bu log rtog tsam/ /bden pa gnyis gar dbyer med pas/ /'phrul dga'i tshul te tha dad min/ /gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir/ /blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/ /chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang / /ming dang tshig tu

btags pa brdzun/ /brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa/ /brdzun zhes btags tsam yod ma yin/ /ma chags pa la chags pa dang / /chags pa nyid na chags med pa/ /de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste/ /shin tu chags pa chen po

yin/ /bla med mi spang bla ma bkur/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /yang dag lam du zhugs la byams/ /gsang ba'i don phyir smra mi bya/ /'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te/ /bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog /

gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog mi spang ngo / /dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen/ /dag pa'i snod du mi dor ro/ /yan lag bcu yi dam tshig mchog /ye nas dag mnyam rtog pas spyad/ /bsrung zhing bsgrub

pa'i dam tshig lnga/ /rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur/ /mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni/ /yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o/ /mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi/ /mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na/ /mnyam rdzogs

chen po thob par 'gyur/ /'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no/ /rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal ba dag /gso la nye bar mi brtson dang / skad cig yud tsam smra ma byed/ /nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang / /rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur

na/ /bsgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur/ /yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i/ /'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du/ /yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na/ /'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung / /dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin/ /rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni/ /gcig la 'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum/ /yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la/ /gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su dbye/ /dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che/ /

'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i/ /rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro/ /gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi/ /bsgrub med dam pa ma lus 'grub/ /
de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste/ /'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur/ /dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis/ /sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob/ /bder gshegs

nyid kyi yul la bzhugs/ /'jigs med kun tu bzang por spyor/ /ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs/ /ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa/ /ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub/ /nyams na bkangs pas rdzogs pa dang / /

de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog /ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshigs sum brgya pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas/ sngags 'chang rnams kyis don ched du
ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed/ /rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab/ /'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang / /rdo rje theg mchog mang

po kun/ /nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang / /rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis/ /lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab/ /de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan/ /yang dag nyid dang log rtogs gnyis/ /ngo bo nyid
kyis gnas gyur nas/ /de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/ /ye nas ngo bo nyid med na/ /nyon mongs spangs shing don bsgrub med/ /thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur/ /kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas/ /cir yang

'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis/ /don dam skye 'gag med pa ste/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/ /ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig sum brgya drug bcu pa'i

rtsa ba bcwa lnga pa mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas/ thugs rdo rje rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di

brjod do/ /nam mkha'i mkha' dkyil dang ba yi/ /yid bzhin sprin tshogs rnam par 'byung / /sna tshogs 'byung zhing 'od 'phro 'bar/ /ra~M/ srid gsum sreg pa'i me yin te/ /yid kyi ye shes me ru 'bar/ /ha~M/ dbang po dang

pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /spyod yul rdzas rnams bsdus nas ni/ /lhan ne lhang nger 'od du zhi/ /a/ zhi 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar/ /thugs rje byin brlabs rmad po che/ /hU~M/ 'gro ba sna tshogs don byed pa/ /'di ni byang chub mchog tu

gsungs/ /ho/ /bzhi po 'joms shing ngan song sbyong / /trA~M ta/ sman bcud len gyis dug sbyong bzhin/ /phyi dang nang gi dri ma dag /bdag med gnyis kyis dag par byed/ /hri/ gsal zhing gzhag par bya ba med/ /nyi ma shar ba'i 'od

bzhin du/ /snang dang mi snang gnyis ga med/ /de bzhin mnyam gnyis ye shes kyis/ /thams cad rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor/ oM/ rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis/ /phyogs bcu khams rnams dbang bsdus nas/ /thams cad mi dmigs dbyings su thim/ /

thams cad khro bo'i tshogs su 'gyur/ /rtog pa rnam bzhi mi dmigs dbyings gyur pa/ /shes rab yum gyi mtshan nyid dbyings su thim/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dbyings gyur pas/ /chos rnams thams cad dbyings kyi khro bo khro mor 'gyur/ /

a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad khro bo dang khro mo'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi mes sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ma

lus pa thams cad kyi rgyal po'i 'bar ba'i thugs rjes gtum 'khrugs ging tshogs chen por sgyur nas/ thams cad 'od dpung 'phro zhing 'bar bar bstan pa ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa yis/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing

khams ma lus par/ /bru~M dang tsakra'i 'khor lor sbrul/ /'od 'phro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen hU~M/ /gtum chen dus mtha' me ltar 'bar/ /ra~M/ nyi ma'i thod sbrul mang po'i gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong

ldir/ /phaT/ khros pa'i sprin chen phyogs bcur 'bar/ /khros pa'i me dpung rdo rjer 'bar/ /rdo rje 'khor lo brtsegs par 'bar/ /tsakra/ khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya mdzes ha he/ /slas dang bran mo'i byi

mo'i tshogs/ /rang gi stan dang mal cha dang / /ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas/ /sti ri'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang / nr-i yi tsi ta za zhing rgyug /shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs su gnas/ /ral pa mun dza cod pan 'bar/ /phyogs bcur khebs pa'i gshog pa

gdengs/ /rdo rje gtams pa'i brag ri 'bar/ /ra~M/ so so'i rig sngags skad gdangs dang / /skad dang nga ro drag tu 'don/ /hU~M ha he phaT b+h+yo ru lu/ /khro bo chen po tshogs pa yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i zhal 'bar ba/ /bdag nyid gnyis su med par bsgom/ /

so so'i rang sngags bzlas nas su/ /rgyud drug sems can thams cad las/ /ma rungs gdug pa thams cad du/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsa bkug nas ni/ /lan gsum lan bdun zhal du bstim/ /lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/ /

hoH gzhan yang mchod pa'i zhal zas ni/ /'byor pa rnam pa kun gyis mchod/ /nr-i yi tshil dang tsha ba'i mar/ /dmar gyi ar+g+ha rgyun du dbul/ /a hoH yang na lan gsum brgya rtsa brgyad/ /stong ngam 'bum du dbul bar bgyi/ /

nag po'i tsher ma dug shing ngam/ /gzhan yang bsreg rdzas gdug gsum dang / /gnon pa'i cho ga kun gyis bya/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rje rol pa'i dkyil 'khor spyir bstan pa'i ho~M/ oM hU~M trA~M hrI AH gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges

pa las ho~MH thams cad ma lus par 'dir 'dus pa'i le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khros pa'i rgyal pos sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las khro bo rngam pa'i tshogs su bsgoms nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod

do/ /byang chub mchog gi snying po ni/ /mtshan mas btsal ba ma yin gyi/ /dag pa rnam gsum ma nor zhing / /rang rig rgyal po goms pa yis/ /byang chub mchog 'di rnyed par 'gyur/ /drag po gtum po bsgrubs pa ni/ /b+ha ga la ni ling ga

bzhag /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /khro bo'i zhal ni gang yang rung / /lan gsum lan bdun rtag bsgoms shing / /mngon du byung ba'i zhal 'bar te/ /bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lhar gyur nas/ /ling ga yang nas yang bsdus te/ /dbyings kyi

dkyil du bstim par bya/ /hU~M gis bsdu zhing phaT kyis 'phang / /zhal gyi rang sngags khri 'bum du/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis bzlas nas su/ /yang nas yang du gsol bar bya/ /'gro lnga sems can thams cad kun/ /dbang med zhal du thim

par 'gyur/ /ya ma ya yang lhag par mdzes/ /sku mdog dud ka la sogs dang / /mche gtsigs khro gnyer gtsigs pa dang / /zhal bgrad phyag rgya 'bar ba dang / /gang la sogs pa bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ /

mtshan ma bzung nas rang sngags don/ /mngon par dbang pos bltar yod par/ /ril bu bsdus nas dbyings su mchod/ /the tshom med par 'grub par nges/ /dam pa'i chos 'jig ma rungs pa/ /dpa' bos dgos pa yod pa'i phyir/ /

kun la phan pa de gyis shig /hoH hU~M dzaH dang phaT dang spo la sogs/ /'dren pa'i mchog tu des gsungs so/ /mtshan ma ming du bsdus pa yang / /ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin du/ /smon pa byang chub lam du gzhug /mtshan ma'i bag

chags med par bya/ /dbyings nas spro zhing a la bstim/ /a ho/ thugs nyid la ni thugs brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i khro bo nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

khro bo'i rgyal po las thams cad rdo rjer bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgoms shing / /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan par gnas/ /thams cad hU~M du bsdus nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum 'bar bar bsgom/ /

me dpung 'bar ba'i tshogs chen du/ /me lha ag ni dzaHsa bkug nas/ /ra~M zhes bya ba'i me spar te/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /zhe sdang rdo rjer bsgom par bya/ /hU~M gtum po'i tshogs chen rab tu 'bar/ /dud ka nag po'i

mdog 'dra la/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer mang por 'khrugs/ /nyi ma'i thod sprul mang pos brgyan/ /seng ge glang chen stag rngam dang / /phyag rgya sna tshogs 'bar ba bsnams/ /phaT dang hU~M dang ha la sgra/ /skad drag phyogs bcur nam mkha'

'khrug /phaT/ khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kyis bskor/ /yul dang gnas kyi phyag rgyas mdzes/ /ha he/ slas dang byi mo bran mo dang / /b+h+yo/ /ci bgyi la sogs tshogs kyis bskor/ /so so'i stan dang lag ca dang / rngam pa'i nga ro rang

sngags sgrogs/ /mi sdug gtum pa'i gzugs can dang / /shin tu khro bar bsgom par bya/ /bdag nyid phaT kyi ngang nyid du/ /gsal 'dris blo goms rtag tu bsgom/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hos bsdus nas su/ /rgyud drug sems can kun

bsdus nas/ /khro bo'i tshogs la dbul bar bya/ /lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/ /yo byad gzhan ni spyi dang 'thun/ /gzir ba'i thabs kyang gong ma bzhin/ /mchod pa'i grangs kyang spyi dang 'thun/ /AH gzhan

yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi/ /hU~M/ zhal gdangs spyan bgrad khro zhal bsgom/ /rdo rje gtan pa gdengs pa dang / /thod pa lcags kyu rnams kyis bskor/ /hU~M sgra drag po'i tshogs kyis 'bar/ /'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas bkur nas su/ /

zhal du bstims na lhag par 'grub/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /'khor gyi tshogs kyis snga ma bzhin/ /bskong pa'i tshul du slod gtong bya/ /hU~M/ gtum po dmar po mchu rings po/ /'bar ba rdo rje phreng bas bskor/ /'od chen 'bar ba

'phro ba yis/ /'jig rten khams rnams dus gcig brngubs/ /hU~M khro bo'i tshogs kyi sngags rnams dang / /gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang / /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /so so'i rang sngags rdzogs par 'don/ /

ha he b+h+yo/ gzhan yang bstod tshig 'di dag gis/ /hU~M rdo rje thugs rje byin brlabs kyis/ /'jig rten khams na kun bkang ste/ /gtum 'khrug ma lus thams cad kun/ /rdo rje mthu yis btul bar gyur/ /hU~M rdo rje zhe sdang
'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /skad cig yud la rlag mdzad de/ /brlag par ma gyur gang yang med/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las drag po ho ma gyi le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po pad ma sdud pa zhes bya bas/ 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi phyir/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /shes rab thabs su sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad ma lus dbyings su bsdus/ /
dbyings nas ye shes 'od 'phro 'bar/ /thams cad ma lus dbyings su sbyor/ /hrIH dkyil 'khor zla gam gdengs pa las/ /'od zer mang po rab 'bar dang / /rdo rje lcags sgrogs bsdams pas bskor/ /gzhan

yang rgyan gyi dam pa mchog /kun gyis de la brgyan cing bskor/ /me lha spyan drangs snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /pad ma rigs kyi khro bor bsgom/ /dmar smug drag po'i mdog dang ni/ /
gzhan yang sprul pa mang po yi/ /phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bskor/ /rngam pa rang sngags drag tu bsgrogs/ /hrIH bdag nyid ma chags rdo rje ste/ /dkyil 'khor gong ma gsal bsgoms nas/ /phyogs

bcur 'gro ba thams cad dang / /gdug pa yid can ma lus kun/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH s+pho Tas bkug nas su/ /dkyil 'khor la ni dbul bar bya/ /dgongs pa grub cing ngan song sbyong / /hrIH gzhal yas dkyil 'khor mang po'i

tshogs/ /dkyil 'khor pad ma'i zhal 'dra la/ /tha ma pad ma ljon shing dang / pad ma rdo rje 'od 'bar bsgom/ /gzhan yang rgyan mchog mdzes pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor kun la mdzes par brgyan/ /bdag nyid pad ma'i lhar gyur pas/ /

mchod pa lha rdzas sna tshogs dang / /zhal zas bza' btung mchog rnams dang / /dmar po'i shing dang dri zhim pa/ /lan grangs gong du smos pa bzhin/ /rtag tu mchod pa byas na ni/ /'jig rten 'di dang 'das pa yi/ /ci 'dod

las de 'grub par gyur/ /sngags ni yi ge ra~M dang hrIH /mdog ni dmar smug 'od po che/ /phyogs bcu khyab cing hrI la bsdu/ /dgyes pa'i glu dang gar gyis mchod/ /hrIH /rdo rje pad ma 'bar ba yis/ /phyogs bcu mtha' klas rab

'byam kun/ /dpal dang gzi byin tshe la sogs/ /pad ma 'bar ba de bsdus nas/ /sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang / /gzhan yang longs spyod mchog la sogs/ /cing 'dod las rnams dbang du 'gyur/ /lha srin la sogs

smos ci dgos/ /hrIH/ 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /skad cig yud la dbang du bsdus/ /dbang du ma gyur gang yang med/ /hrI/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thams cad ma lus par

dbang du bsdus te/ dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i rgyal po rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi dbyings nas phyung nas

ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'bar/ /'od zer 'phro ba mang po 'khrug /bsod nams zhing gyur mchog tu 'bar/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha' gang bar bsgom/ /rdo rje rin po che yis bskor/ /rgyal

ba'i yon tan mkha' dang mnyam/ /trA~M ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus 'od 'bar/ /dkyil 'khor zhags pa rin chen bskor/ /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs dang / /khro bo kun kyang dga' 'phro ste/ /'od chen dkar po 'bar ba dang / /phyag rgya

sna tshogs cir yang sgyur/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyis bskor/ /mchod pa'i yo byad sna tshogs dang / dkar la dri zhin shing rnams dang / /gzhan yang mchod yon thams cad kyis/ /dkyil 'khor la ni rgyas par dbul/ /bdag nyid

rin chen rab 'bar nas/ /trA~M/ dkar la yi ge 'od du 'bar/ /khro bo kun kyang de bzhin te/ /mngon du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /pA sha hoH dang dzaHhU~M gis/ /phyogs bcu'i lam lnga kun bkug ste/ /dbyings su thim

par 'od 'phro bsgom/ /thams cad sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam/ /gzhan yang yod pa 'ang ma yin te/ /sgyu ma'i ye shes bstan pa yin/ /gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas ni/ /rin chen dbyings la rdo rje 'bar/ /dkyil 'khor rgyan gyis

'khor bar bskor/ /gzhan yang lha dang lha mo yis/ /phyogs bcu khyab par mchod cing dbul/ /yon tan rgyal ba'i zhing dang mnyam/ /trA~M/ glu dang gar gyis mchod par bya/ /sangs rgyas zhing khams ma lus kun/ /mchod yon rin chen

dpal 'phel gyis/ /phyogs bcu gang bar rgyas phul nas/ /rdo rje dbyings kyis rgyas par rol/ /hoHtrA~M/ nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams 'di rab 'byam kun/ /skad cig yud la rgyas mdzad de/ /rgyas par ma

gyur gang yang med/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rgyal po rgyas mdzad kyi rgyas pa hom gyi le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad khro bo chen pos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen por bsgyur nas

ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /ye shes dkyil 'khor dbus mtha' med/ /bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa yin/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun/ /bder gshegs nyid la mi zhan shar/ oM dkyil 'khor zlum por 'bar ba

las/ /'khor lo 'bar bas rab bskor zhing / /'od ni ser por rab tu 'bar/ /rmad du byung ba'i sku la sogs/ /bdag nyid chen pos bsgom par bya/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /sa bon yi ge oM ser te/ /me lha spyan

drang snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rnams/ /kun kyang gti mug rdo rje ste/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba dang / /'khor lo phyag rgya 'bar ba dang / /lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis brgyan/ /gdan dang gnas dang dbyings nyid de/ /rgyal

ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag tu/ /phyogs bcu gnas pa de dag tu/ /tsakra lcags kyus bkug nas su/ /dkyil 'khor dbyings su bstim byas nas/ /gtum 'khrug gdug pa ma rungs pa/ /lhan ne lhang nge zhi bar 'gyur/ oM gzhan yang

dkyil 'khor bsam yas te/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'bar ba yi/ /oM dang seng ge mgos bskor te/ /brgyan pa'i rdo rje phyag rgya kun/ /rdzogs ldan zhi bas bskor bar bya/ /rgyal po lus mdzes 'khor lo 'bar/ /rgyan rnams zhi la dkar ba dang / /

byang chub mchog 'bar lhan ner bsgom/ /mkha' la rgyu dang bar snang 'phyo/ /gzhan yang 'gro drug ma lus kun/ /zhir 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gar dang glu yis mchod byas te/ /phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa/ /gdug pa'i yid ni

rnam bor nas/ /lha dkar po yi 'od du 'gyur/ /bde ldan byang chub 'od 'phro 'bar/ /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /skad cig yud la zhi mdzad de/ /zhi bar ma gyur gang yang med/ /sgyu 'phrul
dra ba las thams cad ma lus par zhi bar gyur nas zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste/ lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig

byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la/ /khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /sangs rgyas

bsod nams sku yang 'jig /bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /bkug nas rdo rje phur bas btab/ /rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul/ /e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel

bsdams nas/ /bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo/ /myos nas gal te tshig par 'gyur/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la/ /chags pa yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /rdo rje gsung

yang dbang du 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya/ /rdo rje chags pa'i phur bas gdab/ /chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul/ /ba~M gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu brgyud du

sbrel nas bsdams/ /'gugs 'gyur ci yang phyi bzhin 'brang / /ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur/ /ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khro mchog /'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /yon tan nam

mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag /nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab/ /rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar dbul/ /ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu rgyud du

sbrel bsdams na/ /gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro/ /yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog /gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la/ /dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya/ /gtum chen rngam

po 'ang lhan ner 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la/ /gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag /lhan ne gsal ba'i phur bus gdab/ /'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs la dbul/ /ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lu gu brgyud du sbrel nas

bsdams/ /'bar ba lhan ner byin gyis brlabs/ /thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs/ /lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa sbyin/ /gang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas/ /gang 'dod las de byed par

bsgom/ /sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka /shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can/ /thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i/ /dbang dang byin brlabs rmad po che/ /lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas/ /'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas/ /

so so'i las rnams bskos pa de/ /ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i/ /ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung / /dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na/ /ji ltar rang gis mna' bor ba'i/ /sdom bcas de las 'da' ma byed/ /dam tshig de las 'das

gyur na/ /mgo lus snying yang tshal ba bdun/ /yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur/ /de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis/ /ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos/ /las de mngon du ma byas na/ /rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin/ /

rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro/ /rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur pa'i/ /las rnams yongs su bya ba dang / /'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs/ /phra men ma yang dngos grub 'thob/ /bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du

byos zhes bsgo'o/ /khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni 'di yin no/ /khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni/ /thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/ /mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu

tshig chen mos ni/ /'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed/ /'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byad/ /sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /lha ner 'dod na thim par byed/ /rmugs par 'dod na myos par byed/ /

seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i/ / bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /thams cad kun tu za bar byed/ /rdul cha tsam yang med par byed/ /gzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i/ /bro gar glu tshigs chen mos ni/ /thams cad

kun la za bar byed/ /kun la rab tu nyams par byed/ /slas dang byi mo bran mo yi/ /bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni/ /sbod cing gtong bar byed pa ste/ /thams cad thams cad byed pa yin/ /ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal/ /sdong gcig dang ni me

reg tu/ /dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang / /khros pas ka li rab tu bya/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur to/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin

las byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/ drug bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las chos thams cad yid dang / chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang / shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir
'dus/ yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so/ /thabs thams cad ni rigs bzhir 'dus/ /rigs bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus te/ thams cad dbyings dang / dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas/ tshig mgo mjug gi

don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod de/ /don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no/ /thams cad ma lus mi lus shing / /mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de/ /de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thabs su snang / /thabs nyid sgyu ma mig

yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin/ /de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna tshogs snang / /thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas/ /ji ltar spyad kyang zad med gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs chen

mchog la ye nas rol pa yin/ /de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs sprul pa rang rig ste/ /rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas/ /'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor/ /'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams

cad 'byung ba'i gnas/ /thams cad 'du ba'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod/ /gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings/ /nga dang bdag med mtshan ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa/ /stong dang mi stong mi gnas de bzhin

nyid du 'dus/ /rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med dkyil 'khor spro/ /'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang / /mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa/ /skye med dbyings kyi rang byung 'od gsal phreng ldan

mchog /ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig dang gis gsal/ /thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen ngang du bsdus/ /phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus dang / /zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen

mchog chen kun/ /skye med dbyings dang rang gi gnyis su yang dag 'ub/ /mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa/ /ye nas 'od gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas/ /ming tsam mchog

rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs/ /lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod/ /mnyam nyid pa yi rdo rje thabs chen yang dag ldan/ /'gro med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad/ /

a ho/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa bcu gnyis dang / thabs kyi mchog dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par yid dang / chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa gcig

pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang / /'bru lnga gnas pa'i byang chub ste/ /oM dang mU~M du

'brel ba yi/ /byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung / /spyir na brjod pa thams cad kyang / /kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a/ /skye 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga/ /de ni byang chub sems yin te/ /dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba/ /
gsum shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa/ /zad med rin chen gter yin te/ /mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spags/ /e las 'phro zhing ar 'dus pa/ /gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings/ /nam mkha'i dbyings

nas sprin byung ba/ /kun la khyab cing sna tshogs sprin/ /bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i khong nas bsam mi khyab/ /byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che/ /yon tan mi zad gter du gyur/ /ho/ ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor

dbyings/ /dbyings las mi gzhan ye nas thig le'i ngang / /ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul/ /snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas/ /ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun

grub dam pa ni/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mnyam par gnas/ /dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas shing / /mnyam pa rnam bzhis don rtogs mchog gi gnas/ /rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir
'dus/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus/ /chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler 'jug /ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la/ /ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan/ /thams

cad ma lus rang rig rgyal po yis/ /dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor/ /chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong / /nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang / /dngos po med dbyings skad cig ma/ /

de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam/ /phyin ci log nyi yang yang dag ste/ /ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog /thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas/ /a ho/ /phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i dkyil

'khor ma lus kun/ /nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus/ /bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus/ /lnga po'i don nyid 'bru gsum nang du 'dus/ /gsum po de nyid yi ge ar 'dus te/ /a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings

su thim/ /a ho/ /mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod mi lang / /mi dmigs de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab/ /ma skyes mchog gi dbyings kyang bsam mi khyab/ /ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med/ /

'gro med 'ong med mi gnas pa'i/ /thugs rje byin brlabs rnam par 'phro zhes nyid la nyid gsung ngo / /dbyings las dbyings byung thabs kyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal/ /dbyings

su dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor pas na/ /byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus par mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyar thim pa'i le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa gnyis

pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po mtha' yas su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te/ /b+h+ru~M dang bi shwa'i dkyil 'khor du/ /ma dang a yi dkyil 'khor la/ /rdo rje 'khor

lo rab bsgoms nas/ /bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te/ /de yis phyogs bcur gang bar bsgom/ /b+h+ru~M dang dzaH hU~M ba~M hos dgug /sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog /lus ngag sems la thim par bya/ /nr-i nyid dngos sam yid

bzhin mdzod/ /bum ba mchog ni bzang po yi/ /tshe gzhag gnas ni 'di yin te/ /yang nas yang du dgug bya ste/ /mngon sum smyin par gyur pa dang / /dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya/ /rdo rje go cha bsrung ba yis/ /brtan zhing 'khor

los dgag par bya/ /snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du bstim/ /sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus kun/ /rgyal ba tshe dpag med pa bsgom/ /sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la/ /rgyan phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba

dang / /yid bzhin rin chen za ma tog /rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang / /gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog /bgegs kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na/ /tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste/ /phyogs bcu nam

mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /sgra skad drag po bton nas ni/ /thams cad ma lus thul bar bya/ /dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur/ /tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang / /tshe bsgrub dang ni bsgrub chen dang / /thabs dang shes rab

'byor pa yis/ /ci 'dod las rnams grub par byed/ /tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma/ /dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'bar/ /phyag na rin chen gang ba yin/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur/ /'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na/ /

gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la/ /phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no/ /de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med/ /yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul par/ /sngags bzlas cho ga bar ma gcod/ /'dris gsal

brtan pa mchog gis bya/ /oM oM oM oM oM/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ swA~M swA~M swA~M swA~M swA~M/ AMHAMHAMHAMHAM/ hA~M hA~M hA~M hA~M hA~M/ brU~M brU brU~M brU~M brU~M/ bA bA bA bA bA/ dzra dzra dzra dzra dzra/ A A A A A/ yu yu yu yu yu/ sh+She sh+She sh+She sh+She sh+She/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ a a a

a a/ o/ /tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na/ /bder gshegs la yang tshe dpag med/ /sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs kyis ni/ /phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas/ /phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis/ /'jig rten phyogs

bcu'i bdud bcom nas/ /'gro lnga tshe rnams dbang du bsdu/ /phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis/ /'og gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas/ /gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste/ /snying po lnga la bstim par bya/ /phyag rgya 'khor lo chen

po yis/ /steng gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs te/ /dbang phyug lha chen la sogs dang / /bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las/ /nr-i tshe rab tu dgug par bya/ /'khor lo'i 'bru las bstims nas ni/ /de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de/ /nr-i yi gnas lngar

bstim par bya/ /oM oM badzra ka pa tsa badzra rak+Sha hU~M/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra a d+hi tiSh+Tha badzra swA hA/ phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste/ /'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste/ /'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim/ oM yid bzhin bum pa'i

rin po che/ /rgyan dang rin chen phreng bas brgyan/ /rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang / /'bru lnga spos lnga yungs kar lnga/ /sngags mkhan rab brtan blo ldan pas/ /yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom/ /rgyan chas lnga

dang ldan byas nas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas rigs kyi bu de yis/ /yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas/ /mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba

las tshe'i cho ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sdud pa pos 'gro ba lnga dbang med par smra zhes bya bar yang bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings/ /kun tu bzang po thugs rje'i ngang / /sku gsung thugs ldan yon tan rdzogs/ /mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis/ /rdo rje rab tu kun sbyar te/ /oM dang mU~M du 'byor par bsgom/ /

thams cad dbyings su thim par bsgom/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa dang / /thig le man tra de dag tu/ /nr-i thal man tra bzang po'i thig /rta babs sgo khyud bzang po dang / /rdo rje rtse gcig 'od 'bar dang / /'gugs pa'i lcags

kyu dam pa yis/ /rdo rje rtse gcig rtse gsum bri/ /dkyil 'khor rgyu dang ldan par bya/ /mchod yon sna tshogs mchod par 'bul/ /ya~M dud ka'i ye shes 'od 'phros nas/ /a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dza las lcags

kyu grangs med pas/ /de yi snying du zhugs par bya/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dzaH las lcags kyu mang po yis/ /gang dgug de yi snying ka nas/ /drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya/ /ma las nyi ma'i dkyil

'khor du/ /dzaH las lcags kyu mang po yis/ /gang dgug de yi snying ga nas/ /drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya/ /sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM dzaH hU~M ba~M ho/ a nri pra du/ ming pra be sha /ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya/ /

lag gnyis sor mo spyir bsnol te/ /khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni/ /srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bo gnyis/ /bar du mthe bo de drangs te/ /oM ming pra be sha A A/ /thal ba yungs dkar drag tu rdeg /ming de khong du

zhugs par bya/ /babs nas rdo rje lcags sgrog zhags pas bcing / /gang yin zhes ni dris nas ni/ /lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa/ /lha zhig na ni mchod par bya/ /gdon zhig na ni tsan dan gur kum bsres nas ni/ /de blud sngags 'di

rab tu brjod par bya/ /oM badzra d+ha ka kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M phaT/ gal te smra ru mi btub na/ /lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te/ /khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung sbyar/ /gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru gtug /sngags oM badzra b+hA Sha bi dze pra

be sha hU~M hU~M zhes lan mang du bzlas pas/ /ye shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'/ /bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam/ /lce yi thor to a dkar po/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du/ /oM dzaH d+hIH dmar po bsgom byas na/ /gdon mi za bar

smra bar 'gyur/ /bdag nyid TAk+ki hU~M bsgoms la/ /a dang nr-i la sogs pa yi/ /lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung / /oM TAk+ki hU~M dang rang sngags kyis/ /lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug par bya/ /pra be shas kyang bzlas par bya/ /

gzhan yang dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH ste/ /gzhag cing dbab pa'i sa de ni/ /byis pa lo grangs bcu gnyis pa/ /gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya/ /thig le bum pa me long 'bar/ /gzhan yang gnas rnams thams cad ni/ /

smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs/ /phyag rgya rdo rje spar mo sder/ /dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug /dzaH hU~M dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdu/ /bcol cing bya ba de bzhin no/ /TAk+ki hU~M dzaHsa mi btub na/ /ha ya grI ba

gnas dang yul/ /zur phyin mgo mjug mnan nas ni/ /drag tu bzlas shing lcags kyus dgug /srog gi snying po ma nor bar/ /gzir cing drag tu drang bar bya/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /dgug pa'i thabs yod ci yang rung / /

nem nur med par dgug par bya/ /bya ba sna tshogs las zin na/ /sngar byas bum pa lnga po la/ /sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga/ /rigs kyi yum dang bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang / /gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang rung / /oM badzra

a mr-i ta a a a/ oM ma hA badzra a mr-i te phaT/ dza gad dza gad tsa zhes kyang brjod do/ /oM bud d+ha lo tsa ni swA hA zhes bzlas/ gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa der/ /ye shes lnga rdzogs nyid la brjod/ /ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig /

yang nas yang du mngon gsal du/ /byang chub mchog gis rtag bsgoms shig /de ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /brda phrad skad kyis dngos grub thob ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /'gro ba'i don gyi

phyir yang ched du brjod do/ /pra dbab pa'i le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // dpal shrI he ru kas yum kro d+hI shwa ri dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad nas/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po spros

nas 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen po dang / dbang po dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / sde dpon dang / 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te

'jigs byed chen po rnams da ltar dang / dus phyi ma'i dus su la la ni tshe 'phel ba'i las su bskos/ la la ni longs spyod 'phel bar bskos/ la la ni 'byung ba chen mo la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs

mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur bar bskos/ la la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos/ la la ni nyams shing rmongs par bskos/ la la ni bskoms shing 'phro bar bskos/

gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci 'dod par bskos nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis/ /'jig rten gtso mchog dbang du sdud/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /'gro ba'i don rnams sna
tshogs bstan/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /'di ni rang byung lha yi lha/ /byams dang snying rje ldan par rol/ /thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas/ /thams cad

kun la sbyor 'gyur yang / /bag chags stsogs par mi 'gyur te/ /bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'gyur rdzogs/ /thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par/ /gzung 'dzin 'khrul rtog rdul tsam med/ /de bzhin nyid dang dbyer

med phyir/ /rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas/ /de nas bdag nyid rgyud don gong nas 'byung ba bzhin lha khro bo dang zhi ba de dag gang la goms par bsgom/ ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba lha gsal bar gyur pa dang / rang gi lha'i

bzlas pa 'bum 'bum gdon to/ /lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta ba~M/ ma hA de bA hU~M dzaH/ dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH lha yi dbang po'i snying ga nas/ /yang nas yang du rnam par drang / /ma ma trag sha ma hA de ba grih+Na grih+Na hU~M hU~M/

lha'i gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar/ /lus ni rin chen kun gyis brgyan/ /gcug na yid bzhin rin chen 'bar/ /lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni/ /yid bzhin rin chen bum chu gsol/ /yon tan rin chen sna lnga ste/ /

lha rnams kun gyi re ba skong / /btsun mo ud ma ta gnas pa/ /rtag tu 'dod yon lnga dang ldan/ /bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang / /lha yi gzugs ni snga ma'i tshul/ /lha yi sa bon 'bum phrag tu/ /srog

dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya/ /mdun nas dzaH hU~M ba~M hoHsa drang / /rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /je nye je nye gnyis med par/ /lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas/ /ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug /lha chen 'khor bcas

thams cad kyang / /de grub dbang byed 'du bar 'gyur/ /gang 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi bsgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs so/ /byang chub sems mchog ting 'dzin gyis/ /phyogs
bzhi ma lus thams cad kun/ /rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub tu/ /rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdus/ /bdag nyid rigs bzhi'i he ru ka /gong don byung ba bzhin du bsgom/ /lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur

cing / /lha yi gzugs tshul gsal bar bsgom/ /bdag nyid lha dang gnyis med par/ /yang dag don du gsal bar bsgom/ /de nas rgyal po yul 'khor bsrung / /gzugs ni gangs ri nyi shar 'dra/ /mchod sbyin 'od zer brgya dang

ldan/ /lag g.yas rdo rje tri shU la/ /lag g.yon bdud rtsi bum pa gsol/ /in tra sA ya swA hA/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH tra mi ta hU~M hU~M su ra ta ba g+h+ra dzaH dzA dzA hU~M hU~M/ zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas/ bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka 'dren

pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis/ /lha yi dbang po'i snying nas drang / /rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /de nyid lha yi dbang gyur nas/ /las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhug /thams cad thams cad grub par byed/ /kun la 'byin cing

kun la za/ /lha yi 'khor rnams thams cad kun/ /ma lus par ni yang dag 'du/ /bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang / /rgyal po 'phags skyes bsgrub pa ni/ /bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka /sku mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba

bzhin/ /phyag rgya rnams kyang de bzhin te/ /'od kyi 'phro 'du byin brlabs kyis/ /'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus/ /d+h+ri ta d+h+r-i ta swA hA/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na du r+thid swA hA/ ha~M ha~M ha~M/ rad na dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH zhes snying

po lan 'bum du bzlas te/ /srog dang ldan par ting 'dzin bya/ /bdag nyid rad na he ru ka /'phags skyes po yi snying ga nas/ /dzaH yis rab tu bzung nas ni/ /bdag gi mdun du dgug par bya/ /rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /

de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang / /gang 'dod las de byed du gzhug /mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu 'bar/ /'khor rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu/ /yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub/ /rgyal po mig ngan bsgrub pa ni/ /

bdag nyid pad ma he ru ka /sku mdog gong gi snga ma bzhin/ /phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te/ /snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya bsgyur rung zhing / /lha nyid du ni gsal gyur nas/ /

rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni/ /shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste/ /lag g.yas bdud rtsi bum pa gsol/ /lag g.yon bdud rtsi lnga yi tshul/ /nub phyogs klu rnams re ba skong / /sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can/ /de ni rab tu dbang

bsdu phyir/ /bi rU D+ha ka swA hA/ dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH/ nA ga shi ni bi ya phag sha phag dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH 'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni/ /de ni bdag gi dbang du bsdu/ /bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas/ /mig mi bzang gi snying ka

nas/ /dza yis rab tu bzung nas drang / rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i/ /dbyer med par ni gyur pa dang / /ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug /mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus par/ /

dbang gi las rnams grub par byed/ /rgyal po rnam thos bsgrub pa ni/ /bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan snga ma bzhin/ /gsal zhing 'od 'phro rab bsgoms shing / /rang sngags snying po 'bum phrag bzlas/ /

ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang / /rnam thos dag ni rab tu 'grub/ /gzugs ni rin chen bai dur+ya/ /yang na mdog ni sngo zhing 'tsher/ /phyag g.yas rin chen dbyig to thogs/ /g.yon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol/ /

dbu la rin chen sna tshogs mdzes/ /bai shra ma Na ye swA hA/ dzaH hU~M ba~M hoH/ ku be ra/ kang kang / yang yang / dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH 'bum du bzlas shing srog yod par/ /yang dang yang du bzlas par bya/ /bdag nyid bdud

rtsi he ru ka /dza yis rnam thos snying nas drangs/ /dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya/ /rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul/ /yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin 'khor rnams bran bzhin bsdu/ /rin chen spros shing las rnams

bsgrubs/ /ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lha chen po bsgrub pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dkyil 'khor bkod cing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom

ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so/ /hU~M gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar/ /'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi/ /khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin/ /

mche ba zang yag za byed che ho/ /hU~M rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir/ /thug tshem ri rab 'bum bsnyil skang / /a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che/ /dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho/ /hU~M khros ba'i shes rab 'od po che/ /ye shes
dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ /'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms/ /sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho/ /hU~M khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po/ /khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs/ /dkyil 'khor yid bzhin

'byung ba'i gter/ /sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che ho/ /hU~M/ bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po/ /bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms/ /'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs byed chen po thig le che ho/ /

hU~M rdo rje brag chen sra ba po/ /rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po/ /rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che/ /rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che ho/ /zhes ched du blangs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste/ drug bcu rtsa drug pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dbyer med par yang yang dag pa'i dbyings

su 'dus shing bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so/ /kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i/ /thams cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul/ /snang srid ma lus thams cad kun/ /

chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing / /yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par/ /gang gis de ltar rig pa de/ /gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma/ /snga phyi med dbyings de bzhin nyid/ /cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin/ /rdo rje sems

dpa' de la gnas/ /lta spyod 'thun pas zhal mthong yin/ /rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/ /chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med pa'i/ /mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o/ /thams cad byang chub lhun grub pa'i/ /de ltar gang gis

rtogs 'gyur ba/ /de ni ye shes gnyis can te/ /de yis yang dag snying po mthong / /de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs pa/ /shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin/ /rang bzhin dbyings nas 'od gsal ba/ /sems dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs/ /
de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin/ /de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub yin/ /de bzhin gshegs dang ye shes lnga/ /rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /rtogs nyid bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis/ /lha gsal
dngos po med bsgoms na/ /mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul/ /rang gi ye shes gsal bsgoms na/ /rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub/ /'grub 'gyur nyid na dngos po med/ /ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis/ /

bdud dpung dkyil du ta la btsugs/ /thams cad byang chub shing bsdus te/ /gdug pa ngang gis mi dga' nas/ /ta la bcad skams yong mi gcod/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin/ /bdag dang ting 'dzin mthong gyur pa/ /

de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bsgoms te/ /ting 'dzin shin tu 'dris gsal na/ /thams cad rdo rje nyid du 'gyur/ /kun la dbang sgyur cis mi tshugs/ /bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med de/ /
las 'thun ji ltar snang ba bzhin/ /bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod cig /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni/ /chen po rags pa thabs kyis rtogs/ /so so'i mtshan 'dzin

shes rab rtog /gnyis med 'brel ba thabs chen yin/ /kun kyang shes rab ngang du gnas/ /snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun/ /de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos phyir/ /g.yo dang med pa gnyi ga med/ /gnas dang mi gnas
dbye ru med/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus/ /'dus gnyis gnas su thibs pa yi/ /thams cad de lta bu yi dang / /mnyam gnyis dbyer med sus mi tshugs/ /de nyid sems dpa' bzhugs gnas yin/ /de ltar

rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de/ /sems dpa' nyid dang rigs 'thun pas/ /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la/ /gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig /sgyu mar snang ba gzugs brnyan tshul/ /snang ba nyid

ni dngos po med/ /dngos nyid de nyid sna tshogs ston/ /phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /dbang po rnam sems byang chub sems/ /yul dus po de chen mo yin/ /bdag rtog rnam pa khro bo yin/ /rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo yin/ /

de sems rang rig nyid ces bya/ /thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun tu bzang / /de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin/ /gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur na/ /sems dpa' nyid dang dgongs 'thun pas/ /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /chos rnams

ma lus thams cad kun/ /ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang / /sgra yis mtshon nas don bstan pa/ /kun kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin/ /gang yang dngos po ma yin te/ /dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang / /snang ba nyid na gang yang med/ /bya byed

sna tshogs kun byed kyang / /dngos po med de yang dag nyid/ /de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i/ /sa rdo dran med ma yin te/ /de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas/ /gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni/ /rigs mchog

dam pa rgyu yin te/ /rdo rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir/ /de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/ /kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te/ /'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang / /byang chub sems la gnas bcas pas/ /

dper na mngal dang sgo nga yi/ /mngon du ma gyur bsgribs gyur kyang / /rtsal chen 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin/ /rnam rtog gzugs ni bor ma thag /thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhing / /rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ /

rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa yi/ /dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs/ /bde ba can gyi zhing yang thob/ /byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur/ /lha mi rnams kyi ston pa po/ /lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin

du 'grub/ /tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur/ /bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod/ /tha mar skye rga na 'chi la sogs pa'i/ /sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob/ /rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin 'gyur te/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /

'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun/ /rdo rje rigs su 'dren par byed/ /bdud sde tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul/ /chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor/ /'gro ba ma lus thams cad la/ /mi rtag pa yi tshul yang ston/ /nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul/ /

byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul/ /bla med theg pa sangs rgyas tshul/ /lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings/ /kun la 'thun pa'i tshul yang ston/ /rang bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med/ /ma g.yos bzhin du kun tu ston/ /chos rnams ma lus

thams cad kun/ /de lta bu yi ngang du gnas zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /nyid la nyid de skad ces brjod do/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong ba'i le'u ste/ drug

bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig sum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du ched du brjod pa 'di

brjod do/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du/ /log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed/ /rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab/ /'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang / /rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun/ /nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang / /rang rig

'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis/ /lta ba mthon dman bsam mi khyab/ /de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan/ /yang dag nyid dang log rtogs nyid/ /ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na/ /de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/ /ye nas ngo bo yod yin na/ /

nyon mongs spangs shing byang bsgrub med/ /thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur/ /kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas/ /cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub/ /rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis/ /don dam skye 'gag med pa ste/ /kun rdzob

sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/ /gnas ngan dus na log rtog nyid/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs na/ /bdag med ye shes rang bzhin nyid/ /snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis/ /cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /so so rang bzhin nges

zhe na/ /yang dag lam nyid bcos su med/ /de bas yang dag blo chen gyis/ /thams cad dngos po med par bshad/ /dper na dug gi rigs shes pas/ /dug gis mi tshugs bzhin du snang / /ha la ha la'i dug rnams kyang / /bsgrub na ra

sa ya na'i sman/ /bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring 'grub/ /nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa/ /mtshan nyid ma nor rtogs pas na/ /rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang / /gang na med de de yin te/ /

nang gi chen po lnga nyid kyang / /rang dang spyi yi don brtags na/ /mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag /so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas/ /thabs chen du ni rnam par spro/ /mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas/ /shes rab dbyings

su rnams par sbyor/ /gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni/ /ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te/ /gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad/ /rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams/ /ngo bo nyid la sogs brtags pa/ /

rtog nyid sgyu ma klung gyur te/ /log rtogs spros pa'i rgyun yin la/ /thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste/ /bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin/ /spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /ma rig pa ni spang du med/ /

rig pa yang dag bsgrub tu med/ /thams cad dbyings su ro gcig thim/ /sgyu ma dngos por rtog pa ni/ /sgyu ma rtog nyid mi dmigs pa/ /mi dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang / /skyes pa nyid na chos nyid gcig /

dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin ny-id/ /de nyid chos sku phyag rgya che/ /mi dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la/ /rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid kyang / /chos nyid mi dmigs ye nas dag /sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir/ /yod med

gnyis ga dbyer med pas/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /chos nyid dmigs su med pa ste/ /mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spros/ /gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/ /gsung gi phyag

rgya chen po'o/ /de ltar gti mug spang du med/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin/ /zhe sdang rang dang spyir bstan pa/ /kun nas mnar sems rtog pa yi/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad kun/ /'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can/ /

spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /zhe sdang snying rje spangs bsgrub med/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir/ /sgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa/ /dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na/ /

sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang / /chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin ni/ /bdag srog gso ba'i rang bzhin med/ /snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings/ /

mnar sems sgyu ma chos nyid do/ /thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin yin/ /kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya/ /mi dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar/ /rtog pa kun nas mnar sems te/ /chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs te/ /chos nyid

sgyu ma mi dmigs phyir/ /don dam kun rdzob ro gcig ste/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa/ /'dul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o/ /

zhe sdang spyi yi mtshan nyid ni/ /yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na/ /rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de/ /gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med/ /nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /khong nas 'gying zhing khengs sems pa/ /pha rol zil gyis gnon par byed/ /

spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas/ /kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying nyid/ /de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te/ /chos nyid mi dmigs

'gying par skyes/ /skye 'gying nyid na chos nyid de/ /'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs dag /'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir/ /chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu ma 'gying / /'gying bas zil gyis gnon pa nyid/ /chos

kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te/ /sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med phyir/ /don dam kun rdzob gnyis ga gcig /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni/ /nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi

khyab/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /zhi bsgrub nga rgyal spang du med/ /'dod chags rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni/ /sred pa kun la zhen pa ste/ /spyi yi mtshan

nyid bshad pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /chags spangs ma chags bsgrub tu med/ /chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du/ /'dod cing chags pa sgyu ma sred/ /mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan

phyir/ /mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /chos rnams bdag las mi gzhan phyir/ /mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /spyod pa sgyu ma ro gcig phyir/ /chos nyid chos can dmigs su med/ /rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i/ /
chos kyi sku yi phyag rgya yin/ /mi dmigs sgyu mar 'dod cing chags/ /'dod chags chos nyid mi dmigs te/ /sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir/ /bden pa gnyis gar dbyer med gcig /ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang
bsgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs dbyings nyid 'dod chags spros pa ni/ /'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /'dod chags rang dang spyi yi mtshan/ /

rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /chags dang ma chags gnyis med pas/ /'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med/ /phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni/ /gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la/ /sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan/ /

thabs kyis sbyor ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can/ /phrag dog spyi mtshan bshad pa ni/ /mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med/ /phrag dog spang zhing yang bsgrub med/ /chos nyid du ni ro gcig phyir/ /kun rdzob sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la/ /phrag

dog rtog pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid/ /mi dmigs pa las mi bzhin te/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i lhag par sbyor ba yi/ /thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid de/ /dus gsum rgyal kun dbyer med pas/ /

chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la/ /phrag dog rtog par 'dzin pa dang / /rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te/ /sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med pa'i/ /bden pa gnyis gar ro gcig pas/ /ting nge

'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na/ /thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun sum la/ /phrag dog rnam par spros pa ni/ /gdul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab/ /gsungs gi phyag rgya chen po yin/ /phrag dog rang dang spyi

bstan pa/ /rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin/ /dog pa spang zhing yangs bsgrub med/ /sems can rnam pa mang po kun/ /nang gi chen po lnga sogs bstan/ /rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas/ /

ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin/ /de ltar nges par ci mthong na/ /sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad/ /kun la gnod par byed mi nus/ /de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rtogs/ /dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur/ /

thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na/ /lam gyi dge spyad stegs bcas kyang / /mtho ris lha dang mi ru skyes/ /skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob/ /thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni/ /mtshams med sems can ma lus kun/ /byang chub sems

dpa'i snying rjes bsad/ /bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob/ /ma bsad na yang sems can yal bor te/ /snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang / /nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag /gang phyir

byang chub sems de ni/ /rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal/ /nyon mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs/ /ngo bo yin par gsal por gsungs/ /chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir/ /'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/ /

thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la/ /nyon mongs thams cad byang chub rgyu/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas/ /de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas/ /phyin ci log nyid byang chub

lam/ /'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/ /mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin/ /gsang sngags bla na med pa yi/ /thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med/ /don dam cir yang ma grub la/ /sgyu ma'i

sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /thabs chen dag gis zin pa ni/ /nyon mongs lam yang rnam par grol/ /thabs chen dag gis ma zin na/ /dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis/ /nyon mongs 'ching

ba'i chos spyad kyang / /rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gnyis ga yod pa ma yin pas/ /'khor ba yongs su shes pas na/ /de ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'/ /nyon mongs phyin ci log rnams

dag /thabs la mkhas pas zin 'gyur yang / /grol la thar par mi 'gyur na/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/ /'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed kun/ /rngon dang rmad 'tshong ston pa 'ang ltung / /byang chub sems

dpa'i spyod tshul bzang / /phal la med pas mi rung na/ /sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yi/ /skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung / /bdud rtsi dang du blang par gsungs/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam dbyer med na/ /sku gsung rdo rje dbang

thob 'gyur/ /grub pa'i rjes su de phyir gsungs/ /shes rab mnyam pa ma rtogs na/ /byol song la la chos dang ldan 'gyur yang / /drang srong 'tsho dang rtag 'thun dang / /ji srid 'tsho yi bar du 'dod pa spong byed pa/ /de dag grol

bar ngas ma bshad/ /chos rnams thams cad yongs su dag pa yi/ /rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs mngon/ /rgyu rnams rang bzhin dag pa dang / /'bras bu yongs su dag 'gyur te/ /rgyu yi mtshan nyid rnam par dag /phyi rol chen po lnga rnams

te/ /sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba/ /gzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che/ /rgyud nyid rang gi sems yin pas/ /'byung ba chen po rgyu las dag /'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni/ /sems na kun gyi rus pa ste/ /rdo rje byang chub

sems yin te/ /sha ni pad ma rag ta yin/ /dri chen dri chu gur kum chu/ /so so'i lus la gnas pas dag /don dam dmigs med dag pas ni/ /phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang / /gang gi ngo bo ma yin te/ /skye 'gag

med pas ye nas dag /kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni/ /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang / /chu zla'i chul du mi dmigs gnas/ /mi dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang / /de bzhin gshegs par ye nas mnyam/ /de bas gtsang sme med

par spyod/ /sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir sman/ /gtso ru dang du blang bar bya/ /de bas sems can phyin ci log /chos rnams thams cad dag par ma shes te/ /thabs dang shes rab don ma rtogs/ kha cig gis ni 'tsho ba'i bar du zos/ kha cig

gis ni drang srong ji bzhin du/ /sha spangs rtswa dang chu la zos/ /zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs/ /rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni/ /rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa'i phyir/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis rab rtogs pas/ /thabs dang shes rab

'brel pa yi/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /dngos dang dngos med rtogs pa mtshan/ /gtsang dang mi gtsang rtogs pa mtshan/ /mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam spangs te/ /mkhyen pas dbul la gnas mi 'gyur/ /bsgrub pa'i

rdzas su yang dag gsungs/ /byang chub sems dang sha chen dang / /dri chen dri chu rag ta dag /sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya/ /dngos grub ya mtshan chen po 'grub/ /tshe la dbang dang rig pa 'dzin/ /mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs med 'grub/ /

mthar ni skye med rdo rje yis/ /gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis/ /yi dam mi spang rtag bsgom zhing / /ye nas lha yi mtshan nyid ni/ /dus gsum gshegs

pa thams cad kyi/ /lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur/ /lha ni mi spang don nyid ni/ /lhun grub ye shes thams cad kyi/ /bdag dang gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i/ /dus gsum bde gshegs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/ /sku gsung thugs

kyi rdo rje bdag po ste/ /yongs su rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don/ /dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs par spyad pa'i don med 'gyur/ /bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na/ /yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor nas

su/ /lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom/ /bde gshegs kun dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs grub/ /rdo rje slob dpon dmad mi bya/ /byang chub ston pa 'dren pa po/ /long ba dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra/ /nyon mongs

sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin/ /slob dpon de la dmod pa ni/ /dper na mun khung sgron bsad na/ /mthong ba'i don ni mi rtogs bzhin/ /sdug bsngal nyams thag yun rings su/ /bskal pa mang por myong bar mngon/ /de bas de

la gus pa rtag tu gyis/ /lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po pas/ /shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya/ /drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas/ /shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya/ /rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni/ /bla med byang chub zhing 'gro ba'i/ /

chos nyid dam tshig smon lam mthus/ /byang chub rin chen sar nges pas/ /de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni/ /rang la rang gis mtshon btab na/ /rang srog tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar/ /rang gis srog gcod phung bar 'gyur/ /

tshe 'di mi bde sna tshogs pa/ /mi bde bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang / /ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa'i/ /sdug bsngal kha brgyud myong bar 'gyur/ /yun ring rtag tu mi thar pa'i/ /

shin tu nyams thag myong bar 'gyur/ /grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyod/ /gnyis med dang bas rjes spyod spun/ /bde gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin/ /shes rab gsal bas rtag tu gdung zhes gsungs/ /gsang ba
gzhan la mi bsgrags shing / /sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshigs rnams/ /rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis gyis/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs nas/ /mnyam pa'i spyod pas ma dor te/ /phul dang mi 'dra yang
dag rtogs/ /ma rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang / /skye bo kun la rab tu gsang / /gsang ba'i brda dag sna tshogs gsungs/ /thabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin/ /gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te/ /

thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas kyis/ /snod ma yin dang blo rtul rnams/ /las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang / /brgya la gang zhig gsang don 'di/ /las 'phro ngan la bsgrags 'gyur na/ /dper na gtsubs shing mes

gtsugs nas/ /gtsubs shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang / /gzhan yang tshig par gyur pa bzhin/ /chos don bzang po me dang 'dra/ /skal pa chung zhing shes rab dman/ blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams/ /mnyam

pa nyid la skur 'debs pas/ /ngan song gsum du 'phangs par 'gyur/ /gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong 'gyur na/ /gsang ba 'phel bar byed pa yang / /smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing / /sdug bsngal chen po myong bar

'gyur/ /de phyir sems can don phyir gsang / /rlung phyogs tsam du'ang brjod mi bya/ /sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad/ /sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa ni/ /don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i/ /mnyam pa chen po'i

dkyil 'khor chen po ru/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM/ /de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi/ /sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga/ /bdag dang

dbyer med phyag rgya che/ /gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan/ /yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te/ /goms shing brtan par bya ba yin/ /de bas bar chad brtson med na/ /dper na sa bon tshig pa las/ /'bras bu 'dod pa

dang 'dra ste/ /bsgrub pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /mi khom 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas/ /phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la/ /dmigs med gcig dang du mar bral/ /mtha' dbus gang

yang ma yin pa'i/ /ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med/ /mnyam pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang / /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /yon tan skyon rnams skye 'gag med/ /gang gi ngo bor

ma grub mnyam/ /kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag med/ /mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo yin/ /chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par/ /snang zhing bya ba byed nus pa'i/ /phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang / /dus gsum khams gsum

thams cad dang / /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/ /yon tan skyon rnams thams cad dang / /sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas gnas/ /sngags 'chang rgyal po'i rtogs byas nas/ /bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med/ /

ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na/ /phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang / /rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs/ /thams cad dbyer med ye mnyam la/ /ma 'dres rgya yongs

ma chad pa'i/ /gzhal yas khang dang nyi zla yi/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bsam mi khyab/ /mnyam pa'i dbyings chen rdzogs par bsgom/ /de ltar dam tshig 'di gsum ste/ /de la

gnas na 'grub par 'gyur/ /yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas shing / /'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya/ /lus dang ngag sems brtan 'gyur na/ /byang chub rab 'byam thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig chen po las 'das nas/ /nyen ni shin tu che bar gsungs/ /

sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sngags kyi spyod pa don bsgrub pa/ /rmongs pas gal te 'das byas na/ /de yi srog kyang der zad 'gyur/ /dam tshig bsrungs dang sngags bzlas dang / /phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad pa bzhi/ /brtson 'grus

che zhing brtan pas gzung / /rnal 'byor brtson 'grus chung 'gyur na/ /mi 'grub nyen yang che bar gsungs/ /ji ltar ral gri so la nan tan du/ /skyes bus myur du ma bzung na/ /lag pa nges par chod par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nan tan med pa'i

gsang sngags la/ /'chi 'am yang na 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dam pa rnams kyis ni/ /sngags kyi yan lag ma nyams gsal/ /don dam ma nyams dag byas shing / /brtson 'grus cher bskyed myur bar 'grub/ /sngags

bsgom ma nyams phyag rgya gsal/ /cho ga yo byad gtsor ma gsungs/ /tshogs na yang na nyes pa med/ /ma tshogs na yang nyes pa med/ /ma tshogs na yang 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rang gis lhar sbyor bas/ /dngos grub

thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na 'ang / /'grub par gyur te nyes skyon med/ /ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /dam tshig sum brgya pa rtsa ba bcwa lnga mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos bzhugs gnas dang / spyod lam dang / lta stangs bstan pa/ theg pa chen po'i lhun grub don 'dod na/ /rgyal chen zab yangs shes rab myur/ /zab pa'i don rtogs mi ldog bde/ /nga dang bdag med

yangs pa bde/ /gnas su chos dbyings gnyis med bstan/ /thabs chen kun mdzad 'od gsal byams/ /thams cad dgyes mdzad dbyings ma gtum/ /che chung byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ /g.yog 'khor lha srin sde mang gtso/ /bdag gi

mtshan gzugs shin tu spags/ /chos dbyings mkha' dkyil yangs pa la/ /shes rab myur du don 'gro ba/ /'gro med 'ong med mi gnas pa/ /byang chub sems mchog a re bde/ /shes rab zad med dkyil 'khor la/ /thugs rje rol pa'i

ye shes 'phyo/ /gnyis med dbyings sbyor a re bde/ /ma rig 'khrul pa'i 'dam dbyings su/ /ye shes sgron me'i mda' 'phangs nas/ /gti mug mun pa rnam bsal te/ /rang bzhin 'od gsal bde ba'i mchog /dge dang mi dge gnyis su med/ /

rnam rtog mtshan ma yong mi 'dzin/ /rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal ba'i/ /dge sdig med pas shin tu bde/ /bde dang mi bde gnyis med pas/ /ye shes chags med rnam par dag /thams cad dbyer med ye shes yin/ /sems nyid dang bas

a re bde/ /rgyun du dkyil 'khor thams cad mdzes/ /ye shes rgyu las grub pa yi/ /phyi nang sgrib med gsal ba'i ngang / /ye shes blo brtan shin tu bde/ /longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad la/ /gtsang dang sme ba'i blo mi 'dzin/ /thams cad chos

nyid ro gcig pas/ /gnyis med pas ni shin tu bde/ /shes rab chung chen ting 'dzin gyis/ /thams cad ma nor gzhung lugs bzhin/ /'khor ba ma spangs sdug bsngal med/ /gnyis med tshim pas a re bde/ /thams cad ma lus gcig pa'i

ngang / /lta dang lta ba gnyis ga med/ /ye shes sgron ma bsgreng bar ni/ /phyogs bcu'i zhing khams thams cad mthong / /'di dang pha rol gnyis med phyir/ /'gro dang 'gro bar bya ba min/ /yan lag stabs chen ma mchongs par/ /phyogs bcu stong khams

thams cad na/ /thub mchog ston pa'i spyod yul ni/ /ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub/ /chos rnams thams cad dmigs su med/ /chos nyid sgyu ma cir yang 'grub/ /zag med zab pas don brtags na/ /dag par ma gyur gang yang med/ /ye shes

ma bcos kun tu gsal/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o/ /ye nas de ltar gnas mod kyang / /ma rig rmongs pa'i ling tog gis/ /gsal ba'i sgron ma bsgribs gyur te/ khams gsum mun nag rgyun tu 'khor/ /rnam rtog

mtshan mar 'dzin pa yis/ /lus dang longs spyod gnas dang ni/ /bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong / /de la su zhig byed pa yod/ /yang dag mthu chen sus ma byas/ /rang la rang gis bcings par zad/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /

snying po yod pa ma yin te/ /sgyu ma mig yor sprul pa dang / /smig rgyu 'ja' tshon chu zla'i tshul/ /de ltar gang gis rab rtogs pa/ /de nyid sangs rgyas yin par bshad/ /sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin/ /skye med phun sum tshogs yin te/ /byed

med pa yi mchog kyang rdzogs/ /zhes nyid la nyid brjod do/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba las bzhugs gnas khang pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mi 'chi ba'i rdo rje bsgrub pa 'di gsungs

so/ /rdo rje zhing chen bsgrub 'dod pas/ /thams cad skye shi med pa'i tshul/ /mnyam nyid dag pa nyid du bsgom/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yis/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hos dgug par bya/ /bdag dang khro bo gnyis med par/ /yang nas yang du

bsgrub par bya/ /sku rnams gsal bar gyur pa dang / /zhing chen 'og tu gzhug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor ma lus der bkod nas/ /khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom/ /mngag pa'i pho nya phyogs bcur gtang / /thams cad ma

lus dbang du sdud/ /bsgrub pa gcig gam yang na gnyis/ /gsum dang lnga ru bsgom par bya/ /pho nya mang pos nr-i bkug nas/ /zhing la yang nas yang du gzhug /snar dang ser dang mdog snum 'byung / /de nas bdud rtsi'i ting

'dzin gyis/ /lan grangs 'bum phrag mang por ni/ /bzlas pa'i tshul yang rnam gsum dag /rdo rje sngags bzlas rtse mo gsum/ /de yi bar nas bzlas pa 'byung / /'od zer lnga dang ldan par bya/ /zhing de ldem ldem por gyur dang / /bdud rtsi lnga

yis bskul bar bya/ /de nas yi ge 'bru lnga dgod/ /gsal zhing 'tshe bar bsgom par bya/ /dbang po lnga dang dbang po'i tshul/ /yan lag lnga la rigs lnga'i tshul/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis bsgom/ /de nas zhing de 'gul 'gyur nas/ /

zhing de drag tu 'gul ba dang / /shin tu zhags pas bsdam par bya/ /yan lag rnams kyang gzhum par bya/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu thod pa bstan/ /ha ya grI ba'i skur bsgoms shing / /sngags ni 'bum phrag mang du bzlas/ /phyogs

bcur spro zhing zhing la bstim/ /de nas zhing de drag 'gul nas/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin de yis ni/ /brtan pa nyid du bsgom par bya/ /de nas par par byed pa dang / /a nri pre du gang yin pa/ /rdo rje drag tu brdeg cing dbab/ /thod pa'i kha

nas nr-i phyung nas/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin so yis bcad/ /rdo rje sngags zos khong du bstim/ /gnyis su med par bsgom par bya/ /de nas zhing de langs pa dang / /rdo rje dbyings nas dbang yang bskur/ /bdud rtsi chu yang blud par bya/ /las rnams

thams cad byed du gzhug /zhing des rab tu smras pa'i tshig /dpa' bo ci bgyi mi rgas skye med chos rnams dang / /las rnams ma lus kun bgyid do/ /de ltar bsgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis/ /thal ba thams cad sos par 'gyur/ /

bsgrub pa'i sa ni dur khrod dang / /ri brag gnyan po bgegs gnas dang / /nags khrod stong pa tsher ma can/ /ri bos bskor ba'i lcug ma can/ /rab tu rnam par dben pa dang / /gnod sbyin srin po 'byung ba'i gnas/ /

de dag tu ni bsgrub par bya/ /dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu gsum dang / /bcu drug man chad bsgrub par bya/ /the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyi nang 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams/ /lam lnga'i zhing dang sman lngar bcas/ /'bru

rnams thams cad bcang bar bya/ /rtag tu tshogs chen mchod par bya/ /gsum dang lnga ru bar mi gcad/ kha zas rnams kyang thod par bza'/ /btung ba dag kyang de bzhin te/ /mar me rtag par gtang bar bya/ /rgyu ni nr-i yi mar las bya/ /

yan lag bsku ba 'ang de bzhin to/ /sdong bu pad ma'i rgyu las bya/ /gnod ni dung chen srungs med pa/ /lcang lo yod dang med kyang rung / /de byi pu tra ma byung ba/ /mdog ni ban lang can la yod/ /rdo rje bsgrub pa bar gcod

phyir/ /rtag tu mtshams ni bcad par bya/ /nr-i yi rkang pa g.yas g.yon nas/ /sbom po ma yin phra ba nyid/ /de la ki la ya byas nas/ /phur bu'i sngags dang khro sngags kyis/ /lan 'bum du ni bzlas pa bya/ /lag pa

g.yas g.yon thal sor la/ /khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu/ /'od 'bar gzungs kyi sku ru bsgom/ /de nas gnyis med sbyor tshul du/ /sgrub po rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /bsgrub pa dngos la ma gtogs pa/ /phyogs bcu rnams

su mtshams kyang gcad/ /dngos grub ma thob bar du ni/ /bsgom dang bzlas dang phyag rgya gsum/ /bag yod mgo la me 'bar bzhin/ /bar mtshams med par bsgrub par bya/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog gis/ /lha ma srin rnams

bran bzhin 'khol/ /'jig rten dbang phyug dbang du sdud/ /rdo rje rigs mchog 'khor rkyen rnams/ /yid bzhin du ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di dag ni/ /lus sbed nus nas mngon du dbyung / /de ma yin par shin tu

gsang / sku'i bsgrub pa nges pa'i don du bka' stsal to/ /ro langs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun cu pa'o/ / gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro gar rtse 'jo bro gar gyi dam tshig ces bya ba nges par ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /

phyogs bcu mtha' yas dus bzhi yi/ /thams cad dbyer med maN Dal la'i/ /nyi zla shar ba'i gzhal yas la/ /pad ma chags med gdan bting nas/ /rin chen zad med pho brang sa/ /che chung dpag tu med pa yi/ /byang chub bde

ldan dkyil 'khor la/ /bde ldan byang chub rab bkod nas/ /ma lus kun bsdus dbyings bsdus te/ /lus bskyod yan lag bskul bsigs dang / /dbang po lnga yi lta spyod kun/ /phyag rgya chen po yin par bshad/ /gong gi
