ro yis mchod par 'gyur/ /tshim byed bsod nams tshogs chen 'gyur/ /dngos por mi 'dzin bsod nams tshogs/ /de lta bu yi ro mchog gis/ /thams cad kun la tshim par 'gyur/ /yid dgas gnas su longs spyod ldan/ /

dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin/ /bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'o/ /rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis/ /rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa dang / /sbyor mchod dag gis longs spyod na/ /dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub 'gyur/

bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar 'gyur nas/ /sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed/ /dpung gi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i/ /mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par byed/ /tshogs kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ /byed pa med pa'i tshul
gyis ni/ /kun la thogs pa med par spyad/ /thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed/ /mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du byed/ /yon tan chen po 'phel bar byed/ /khro bo gtum po'ang zhi bar byed/ /thams cad kun la
spyad bde ba/ /chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas/ /dbyings su bsdus pa'i dkyil yin te/ /'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor gyis bskor/ /mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni/ /de lta ba yi tshul du gnas/ /'khor

gyi phra men tshim par byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu/ /rtag tu mnyam bzhag khro bo'i tshul/ /'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te/ /mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang / /sngags mchog dam pa

ma lus 'don/ /de nas phra men 'khor bsdus nas/ /so so'i las dang 'thun byas te/ /so so'i gnas su gzhag par bya/ /dbang du bsdu dang bsgom pa'i thabs/ /ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya/ /ma lus thams cad byos

shig par/ /lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la/ /'dod yon lnga yi sbyin pa btang / /de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas/ /dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brten nas/ /rigs lnga ye
shes lnga la sogs/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa/ /bdag la thams cad bsdu bar bya/ /de ltar bsgrub pa'i ngang 'chang ba/ /ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas/ /rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas/ /

theg dman spyod par yong mi 'gyur/ /mi khom gnas su skye mi 'gyur/ /skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob/ /sangs rgyas zhing yang sbyong bar byed/ /ngan song gnas rnams stong par byed/ /yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub/ /dbang

po yul du snang ba kun/ /yul rnams yod pa ma yin te/ /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid/ /dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste/ /snang ba'i dngos po rnam bshig na/ /so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas/ /gzhigs

na nam mkha'i ngang du zhi/ /nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na/ /mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim/ /thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas so/ /gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma/ /snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te/ /

rang bzhin med pa shes rab nyid/ /nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni/ /kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la/ /de dang bdag tu rnam par rtogs/ /bde sdug mtshan ma so sor 'dzin/ /kun gzhi dngos po med pa la/ /bag chags

sogs pa'i gnas med de/ /snang ba'i dngos po med pa la/ /nyon mongs blo yis blang du med/ /bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med/ /de ltar sgo byed dngos po med/ /med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa/ khams gsum brtson

rar rtag tu 'khor/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ /snang dang mi snang gnyis ga la/ /skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin/ /rtog pa nyid kyang ma grub na/ /yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub/ /yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni/ /snga ma

'das shing mi dmigs pa/ /phyi ma ma byung brtag tu med/ /de ltar rang bzhin dmigs su med/ /rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra/ /rgyud ni yongs su ma chad pa/ /'di ni kun tu 'byung ba yin/ /de ltar don rnams dngos po med/ /

chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba/ /de gsum gcig dang so so min/ /de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid/ /gcig pa ma yin so so min/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings/ /thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing / /

gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med/ /de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin/ /rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med/ /byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni/ /shin tu mi dmigs rtag dka' ba/ /yangs la rgya che gting zab pa/ /shes rab

zab pas rtogs 'gyur te/ /gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro/ /'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min/ /shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa/ /mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ngang nyid ni/ /dmigs med tshul du

de ltar snang / /dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang / /rang rig kho na tsam du zad/ /sems can ma lus thams cad kyis/ /de ltar khong du chud par byos/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang / /bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /

sems can ma lus thams cad la/ /snying rje'i theg pa ma chags par/ /nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing / /byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la/ /snying rje'i zhags pa cher brkyang nas/ /

nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed/ /snying rje chen po skye ma byed/ /de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la/ /las kyi sgrib pas mi gos shing / /thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par/ /dga' ba dag la 'gyod pa med/ /sems can

nga dang bdag med la/ /thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de/ /bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya/ /thams cad dri ma med par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa bas/ /de la dngos dang rtog pa med/ /nam mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la/ /
de la bcos shing bsgyur du med/ /chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med/ /snang ba thams cad dngos med pas/ /yod dang med pa thams cad kun/ /mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigs so/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
rten pa/ /chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang / /bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas/ /kun la smon cing chags su med/ /byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni/ /shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas/ /rtog ge'i

spyod yul de ma yin/ /ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med/ /sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu/ /byang chub de nyid sems yin no/ /sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas/ /sems can ma lus thams cad dang / /dus gsum chos rnams thams

cad yin/ /thams cad ma lus chos so cog /sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub/ /bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad/ /skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas/ /ci la 'ang thogs pa med par spyad/ /spyad pa nyid na chags pa med/ /dus mtha'

med par ma nyams gnas/ /'di ltar snang ba thams cad la/ /mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang / /snang ba nyid na dngos po med/ /de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs/ /gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces/ /med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de/ /

ri bong rwa dang mo sham bu/ /tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi/ /thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med/ /thams cad ma lus stong zhes te/ /dran med brdos pa ma yin pas/ /rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /'di ltar snang

ba thams cad kun/ /brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do/ /shes pa 'ba' shig kho na'o/ /thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na/ /de nyid don dam dbyings yin te/ /gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med/ /yod las btsal na sgro

btags 'gyur/ /med las btsal na skur btab ste/ /yod med gnyis las btsal byas na/ /de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur/ /rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste/ /de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med/ /rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu/ /

tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang / /don gyis cig char rdzogs par bsgom/ /de lta bu'i don rtogs kyang / /'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyad kyang / /theg chen sgom las nyams pa med/ /gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i/ /
blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas/ /ma rtogs le lo snyom las byas/ /don ma grub par ngan song 'gro/ /sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na/ /tshig gis mnyam pas sangs mi rgyas/ /de bas don tshig ldan
par byos/ /'on dang the tshom med par 'grub/ /rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis/ /dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom/ /yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam/ /spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig /rtag tu

bsod nams tshogs chen ldan/ /bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /des ni byang chub snying po len/ /zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i
le'u ste bdun bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang pa'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag

rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang / dam tshig ni gnas yin no/ /phyag rgya bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te/ /ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /gsang ba

de nyid kho na las/ /byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o/ /mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus ba'i/ /'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun/ /ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid/ /mnyam dang

mi mnyam bya ba min/ /de bzhin nyid kyi ngang du 'ub/ /'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i/ /brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun/ /chos nyid ngang las ma rtogs pa/ /log rtogs nyon mongs rdul tsam med/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od

'bar yang / /de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te/ /bdag nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir/ /mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi/ /rnam gsum tshul gyis bsgom byas shing / /phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba/ /bya byed

med pa'i tshul gyi su/ /las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed/ /de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog /bdag nyid phyag rgya kun gyi bdag /ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/ /byang chub skye 'khrung rgyu yang yin/ /

'bras bu yang dag nyid du'o/ /rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa/ /bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa/ /mthar phyin gang la 'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun/ /thams cad
shes rab ngang du gnas/ /rigs lnga bder gshegs yab yum du/ /ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas/ /thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol/ /bde min ma chags tshogs chen po/ /yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs/ /

lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /nang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste/ /mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang / /gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa/ /lag gi 'du 'phro bsam yas dang / /yan lag stabs chen bsgul bsig

kun/ /nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang / /rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas/ /'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa/ /rang byung chen po lha yi lha/ /thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed/ /dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags

par bya'o/ /las dang las kyis mi gos pa/ /gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing / /ma chags pa la chags pa dang / /shin tu rnam par dag pa yi/ /de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la/ /sku gsung thugs ldan
zad mi shes/ /yon tan mi zad gter du 'gyur/ /gzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o/ /sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o/ /rnam par rtogs med tshul gyis ni/ /thams cad kun la chags med rol/ /'dul ba'i don
lan bsam mi khyab/ /'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang / /thams cad dbang bsdus don 'grub pa/ /ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro/ /rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun/ /

mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus/ /rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste/ /lhun grub dkyil 'khor ngang nyid du/ /phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni/ /thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin/ /dper na rgyal pos

rgyas btab na/ /sems can kun gyi yong mi 'da'/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yin/ /kun la khyab cing thams cad snang / /sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab na/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun/ /mi mthun phyogs kyis

dbang byar med/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na/ /'di lta bu la rtag tu gnas/ /de lta bu'i blo med na/ /rdo rje'i rigs su yong mi bshad/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste bdun bcu

brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do/ /kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin 'di/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo
nyid/ /gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi/ /rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin/ /sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang / /gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam/ /ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyis/ /don du mi 'gyur

yong ma gsungs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ /phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di/ /rtogs nas smra bar byed pa gang / /de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/ /gsang ba 'di

las gzhan mi mnga'/ /sgro dang skur ba zhi ba yi/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na/ /de nyid nges pa'i dbyings las phyung / /de ni nges par lung bstan te/ /sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin/ /sa rab rig pa 'dzin las

gnas/ /zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho

na nyid nges pa las yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun bcu dgu pa'o// // 'phags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan ny-id dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi gsang ba/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu mchog /gsang ba chen po 'di yod par/ /me mar mur gyi dong 'bogs shing / /spu gri so ni

gtams las kyang / /'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos/ /khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du/ /lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdom mo/ /thams cad la yang me long bzhin/ /bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo / /ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis/ /

rdo rje tha mas sgrom phye nas/ /yid bzhin rin chen gter phyung ba/ /skal ldan mchog gis spyad du gsol/ /yi ge kun la mi snang zhing / /bla ma'i thugs la gnas pa ni/ /skal ldan mchog gi spyod yul te/ /kun dang thun mong de ma yin/ /

dper na seng ge'i 'o ma ni/ /gser gyi phyis bus 'dzin 'gyur gyi/ /snod gzhan dag tu blugs pa ni/ /snod kyang 'chag la 'o ma 'ang 'bo/ /yong gis gser gyi rang bzhin la/ /dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang / /gser las gyur pa rdul

tsam med/ /de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang / /mtshan ma sna tshogs cir snang yang / /nyid las gyur pa rdul tsam med/ /gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos nyid kun tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad bcu pa'o/ /
rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo'i phreng zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng gi don bsdus pa/ de nas bcom ldan

'das dpal kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas rig pa'i byin brlabs las byung ba'i mchod pa rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i gzhal yas khang dang / bla bre dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs

dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa nang gi mchod pa bzhi dang / bdug spos la sogs pa phyi'i mchod pa bzhis mchod de/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas so so ma yin pa'i rig pa'i 'dud pas phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod yul nyan thos dang thun mong ma lags pa thabs gang gis rtogs pa de tshe 'di nyid la thams

cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i don du bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / cang myi gsung bar 'dzum pa mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /don 'di dang phyi nang gi chos thams cad 'dra ste bden pa gnyis

su 'dus so/ /bden pa gnyis la yang tshul 'di ltar shes par bya'o/ /bden gnyis rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na/ /phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag /byed spyod thams cad tshogs gnyis 'gyur/ /pha rol phyin bcu

rdzogs pa ste/ /sa bcu rim gyis bsgrod pa la/ /mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis/ /sa rnams mnyam pa nyid du sbyor/ /rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes kyis/ /chos kun sgyu mar rig pa'i phyir/ /dngos dang dngos med bag chags bsregs/ yang na ye

shes me zhes bya/ /rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam smin ni/ /med min rgyu 'bras 'thun par 'grub/ /de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes kyis/ /rig pas tshogs su 'gyur bas so/ /lam gyi nang na nye lam bde rdzogs pa/ /thabs kyi nang na ma nor dam pa ste/ /
bsgrubs na tshe 'dis sangs rgyas che ba yang / /blang dor med pa'i sku gsum rdo rjes 'thob/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhag pa pad mo phreng las bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

sems dpa' chen po dam tshig 'di dag ni bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir ngas bshad do/ /gti mug zhe sdang nga rgyal dang / /'dod chags phrag dog chen po ni/ /bsrung ba med pa'i sdom pa can/ /de ni dam tshig rdo rje yin/ /
'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng ba las dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po dbang 'di dag ni/ /rang rig pa'i rtsal gyis 'thob bo/ /thabs dang shes

rab dbang chen te/ /rdo rje dril bu rig bas 'dzin/ /mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi/ /chos la 'dod bzhin dbang byed do/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi le'u ste/ gsum pa'o// //
sems dpa' chen po mchod pa'i mchog ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /bdag mchod kun mnyes thams cad 'drangs/ /kun la phan pa'i sman yin te/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid chen po yis/ /thams cad bza'
zhing brgyan par bya/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las mchod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // kun tu 'od kyis las 'das/ /pad ma'i spyan du gyur pa na/ /
rig pa'i byin brlabs chen po las/ /rang 'byung dkyil 'du 'phro yi tshul/ /yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen te/ /mtshan dang dpe byad kun las grol/ /rngam zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can dang / /mgyogs ma
mgyogs ma'i pho nyar ldan/ /de ni thig le rdo rje yin/ /'di zhes gang zag bdag med par/ /rtogs par bya phyir ngas bshad de/ /mkhas pas de la 'byor par gyis/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo
phreng ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de na sems dpa' chen po spyod yul thams cad ni 'di ltar rig par bya'o/ /chen po lnga yang de bzhin gshegs/ /gcig
la 'ang lnga lngar rig par gyis/ khams gsum bdag nyid yin pa ste/ /sku gsung thugs kyang de la bya/ /ye shes lnga dang 'gro ba lnga/ /mnyam pas so so dbyer med de/ /sngags dang phyag rgya dbang
bskur na/ /spyod yul kun du maN+Da la/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// //

sems dpa' chen po zhes rdo rje sems dpa' thos nas bshad do/ /rgyal ba'i rgyal ba rnams kyi sku/ /sna tshogs cir yang snang mod kyi/ /kun tu rin chen lta bu ste/ /don dang las yin bsgoms pas 'grub/ /dbu

mig rna ba sna lce la/ /oM zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/ /

sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la/ /trA~M zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i sor mo la/ /hrIHzhes bya ba

lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa'i sor mo la/ /AH zhes bya ba lnga bzhag ste/ /sems dpa' lnga dang sems ma lnga/ /sbyor ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya/ /

'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las lha'i mtshan nyid dang dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do/ /

rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/ /lnga zhing lnga dang 'byor pa yi/ /tshom bu lnga yi lha bsgoms na/ /thams cad bdag nyid chen por 'gyur/ /rin chen pad ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di/ /'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis/ /

dgyes pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas/ /byang chub sems sprin dbab par gsol/ /rdo rje gsor ba'i dga' mchog 'di/ /'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor/ /mi dmigs bde dang 'phro ba ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin mar ldan las byung / /

rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/ /na bza' dang ni zhal zas rnams/ /grub pa'i rdzas su dbang bskur nas/ /gsol na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/ /glu dang tshig gi sgra rnams yin/ /

gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te/ /bsgrags na dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin mar ldan pas/ /bro dang gar gyis bskyod byas te/ /'od kyi 'du 'phro byin gyis brlab/ /dngos grub mchog kyang 'thob par 'gyur/ /

'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dngos grub sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /oM badzra bai ro tsa na oM/ oM satwa badzra hU~M/ oM rat+na badzra trA~M/ oM d+harma badzra hrIH

oM karma badzra AH oM badzra ak+Sho b+h+yaHhU~M/ oM badzra satwa hU~M/ oM badzra rA dza hU~M/ oM badzra rA ga hU~M/ oM badzra sA d+hU hU~M/ oM badzra rat+na sa~M b+ha ba trA~M/ oM badzra rat+na trA~M/ oM badzra sUr+ya trA~M/ oM badzra d+h+wa dza trA~M/ oM badzra hA sa trA~M/ oM badzra a mi tA b+ha hrIH

oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na hrIH oM badzra tsakra hrIH oM badzra pA sha hrIH oM badzra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hA/ oM badzra karma hA/ oM badzra rak+Sha hA/ oM badzra yak+Sha hA/ oM badzra muSh+Ti hA/ hoHbadzre shwa ra d+hA tu oM/ /oM badzra bud+d+ha lo tsa na hU~M/ oM badzra mA ma kI trA~M/ oM badzra paN+Da

rA pa si ni hA/ oM badzra sa ma ya tA rA hA/ oM badzra lA s+yai hU~M/ oM badzra d+hu pe hU~M/ oM badzra a~M ku sha hU~M/ oM badzra de shwa re b+h+yaHde hU~M/ oM badzra mA le trA~M/ oM badzra puSh+pe traM/ oM badzra pA sha trA~M/ oM badzra rat+na ra ti trA~M/ oM badzra gI t+yai hrIH oM badzra

A lo keM hrIH oM badzra s+phoT hrIH oM badzra nr-i t+ye hA/ oM badzra gan+d+he hA/ oM badzra g+han+Da hA/ oM badzra ra ti hA/ oM badzra muSh+Ti hU~M/ oM badzra muSh+Ti trA~M/ oM badzra muSh+Ti hrI/ \u0f00 badzra muSh+Ti hA/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags

pa pad mo phreng las sngags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po nyon cig ces rdo rje sems dpa' la bos nas bshad do/ /lha dang lha mo'i ngang nyid du/ /yan lag lnga la 'byor bas na/ /bskyod pa

thams cad phyag rgya yin/ /de skad dpa' bos bka' stsal to/ /de la phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni/ /thabs dang shes rab dang nyid du/ /lag gi 'du byed bsgoms nas ni/ /thal mo dam sbyar rtse bsnol gshibs/ /rdo rje thal mor
bka' stsal to/ /sor mo nang du bsnol nas bkan/ /gung 'dzub mthe bo mthe chung rnams/ /so sor rtse sprad phyir bkyed de/ /srin lag gshibs bsgreng dam tshig rgya/ /rkang sor g.yas kyis g.yon pa mnan/ /

lag 'thil g.yas kyis g.yon ba mnan/ /mthe bo rtse sprad pang du blang / /rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yas kyi 'dzub mo g.yon gyis bzung / /tshogs pas gcig la

gcig bzung ba/ /'di ni sbyor ba'i rgya mchog go/ mthe bo gnyis dang mthe bo chung gnyis/ /so sor rtse sprad zlum po ste/ /lhag ma 'od 'phro rting phye ba/ /mi bskyod pa yi phyag rgya yin/ /rting sprad gung mo rtse sbyar te/ /'dzub

mo tshigs bcag gung la sbyar/ /srin mtheb rtse sprad mthe chung sba/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /gung 'dzub srin lag rtse sprad de/ /mthe chung ngos la sbyar bar bya/ /mthe bo rtse sprad zlum po ste/ /snang ba mtha' yas

phyag rgya yin/ /thal mo sbyar nas so sor bgrad/ /bskyod nas 'khor lo ltar byas te/ /glog gi phreng bas 'khor bar bya/ /don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /phyag rgya'i rgyal po 'di dag ni/ /thugs kar bcing zhing nyid du

mos/ /'du 'phro sgrol zhing mkha' la dgrol/ /las dang thun mong nyid du bshad/ /rdo rje dril bu bzung nas ni/ /thugs kar rang ni dkur brten nas/ /bcu thabs zur gyis lta ba ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya chen yin/ /

lag pa bsnol nas khu tshur bcang / /gung mo gnyis ni brgyang bar bya/ /'dzub mo lcags kyu ltar byas pa/ /rdo rje rgyal po'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yon gyi 'theb 'dzub rtse sprad de/ /g.yas

kyi gung mo brkyang nas gdeng / /rdo rje 'dod pa'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams/ /so so'i gung mo tshigs dang por/ /ngos bzhi nas ni rtse mo gzugs/ /rdo rje legs pa'i rgya chen yin/ /rting sbyar gung mo'i rtse

sprad de/ /theb 'dzub srin lag tshigs bcag ste/ /drug char rtse sprad mthe chung sbas/ /rdo rje rin chen rgya chen yin/ /mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad nas/ /lu gu rgyud du sbrel bar bya/ /lhag ma 'od ltar byas na ni/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i rgya chen

yin/ /lag ngar g.yon pa bsgreng nas ni/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /g.yas pa gru mor gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje rgyal mtshan rgya chen yin/ /g.yon gyi steng du g.yas bzhag nas/ /sor mo'i tshigs bcag

sprad byas te/ kha yi thad kar bzung bar bya/ /rdo rje bzhad pa'i rgya chen yin/ /g.yon gyi sor mo'i rtse rnams yin/ /ma phrad tsam du bsdus pa las/ /g.yas kyis 'byed pa ltar byas pa/ /rdo rje chos kyi rgya chen yin/ /

g.yas kyi lag ngar sgreng ba la/ /mthe bo mthe chung rtse sprad de/ /lhag ma gsum yang bsgreng bar bya/ /g.yon pa'i khu tshur dkur brten pa/ /rdo rje rnon po'i rgya chen yin/ /lag pa rgya gram rtse bsnol nas/ /mthe

bos gnyis kyi rtse sprad de/ /bskor ba lta bur byas pa ni/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i rgya chen yin/ /sor mo nang du bsnol ba las/ /gung mo rtse sprad 'dzub sbyar te/ /mthe bos gung mo mnan pa ni/ /rdo rje smra ba'i rgya chen yin/ /

lag pa'i 'khrig ma bsnol pa las/ /gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang por/ /ngos bzhir sa yi sor mo brten/ /rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo rnams/ /phan tshun thags su btags pa las/ /

mthe bo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /'dzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas kyang / kha 'gram gnyis su bzung bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin rgya chen yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur

bcangs pa las/ /bsnol te kha ni sbyar nas kyang / /thugs kar dam du bzung bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur rgya chen yin/ /rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom nas ni/ /lag gi 'du shes 'di dag gis/ /'du 'phro mos pa bskyed nas ni/ /

bcing zhing mkha' la dgrol bar bya/ /mthe bo mthe chung nang du sprad/ /gung mo rtse sbyar bzhi yang bsgreng / /rdo rje 'dzin ltar rting sprad pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /rting sbyar 'theb 'dzub rtse sbyar te/ /'dzub mo'i myig tu

mthe chung drang / /lhag ma rtse gsum ltar byas pa/ /rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag ngar g.yon pa bsgreng nas kyang / /sor mo ud pal ltar byas pa/ /g.yas kyi sor mo gzung bar bya/ /rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya yin/ /
rkang pa gnyis kyi pus mo dang / /lag pa gnyis kyi gru mo rnams/ /sprad nas lag pa gdangs pa ni/ /kun tu bzang mo'i phyag rgya yin/ /rdo rje khu tshur dkur brten nas/ /ldan pa g.yas su byo ba

las/ /chags pa'i mig gis lta ba ni/ /rdo rje sgeg mo'i phyag rgya yin/ /g.yon pa skong skong po byas te/ /g.yas pas gru mo bzung nas kyang / /bskor zhing sor mo 'phro ba ni/ /rdo rje bdug pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa gnyis

ni rgyab sbyar nas/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las/ /mthe chung sbrel nas 'dzub mo bsgreng / /rdo rje lcags kyu ma yi rgya/ /mthe chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel/ /sor mo rnams ni so sor bsgreng / /thal mo bkan te lta ba ni/ /rdo rje sgrol ma'i phyag rgya

yin/ /srin lag dang ni mthe bo gnyis/ /so sor rtse mo sprad pa las/ /'phral ba'i thad kar drangs pa yi/ /rdo rje phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas dkyil

'khor gyi lha dang lha mo rnams la phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad dang 'khor phal mo ches dbyangs 'thun par bstod pa/ oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byam na/ /rgyal ba gang bzhugs 'khor dang bcas/ /bla med

lha dang lha mo yi/ /grub pa'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab/ /sems dpa' bcu drug rigs kyi gtso/ /sems ma bcu drug rigs kyi yum/ /mthu chen khro bo khro mo dang / /pho nyar 'jig rten skyong bar ldan/ /oM sngon gyi thugs

dam chen po ni/ /'jig rten ma lus thams cad kun/ /rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na/ /phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig /oM dpa' bo chen po mthu ldan rnams/ /thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa'i

rnams/ /grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /oM khams gsum zhing du sbyor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dmyigs med chos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /cir yang sprul pa'i sku la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod nas nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ rol par khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khro bo'i rtog pa bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gcer bu pa dang kun tu rgyu la sogs pas so so'i rig sngags kyi las kyis ma hA de ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi lha dang / gnod sbyin mthu bo che dang / 'phra men ma thams cad

bskul nas sems can rnams kyi srog gi bar chad bgyid/ 'tshe bar bgyid/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar bgyid/ de la thabs gang gis bzlog par bgyi/ sbyor ba gcad par bgyi/ bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig /

'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos sngon chad bshad de/ lag na rdo rje khyod nyid kyis byas pa'i gsang sngags dang / srid pa zad par byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyang zlog par byed do/ /

gnon par byed do/ /sbyor ba gcod pa byed na kun tu rgyu la sogs pa gzhan lta ci smos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang sngags zlog cing

gnon pa dang / sbyor ba gcod pa zhes bya ba 'di gsungs so/ /oM badzra dz+wa la badzra hU~M/ man+t+ra su~M b+ha ni/ oM badzra dz+wa la hU~M/ oM brU~M hU~M brU~M trA~M brU~M hU~M brU~M hrIHbrUM A brU~M/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu nas mtshon cha'i char chen

po phab ste lag na rdo rje nyid kyang khas sbub tu 'gyel nas khrag skyug par gyur to/ /lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad kyang brgyal te lus dum bur chad par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi sbyor ba chad par

rig nas slar bslang ste/ oM badzra satwa rA dza dz+ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang 'di las 'da' bar ma byed cig /khyed kyi 'khor thams cad kyang 'di las 'da'

bar byed na thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du lag na rdo rje khyod kyis kyang lha dang gnod sbyin thams cad la bsgo shig /de nas lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di na srid pa thams cad 'dul bar

bgyid pa/ mthu bo che thams cad 'dul bar bgyi ba/ mthu bo che thams cad kyi nga rgyal gcog pa bdag lags te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas mthu stobs dang ldan pa'i slad du bdag gi ming yang lag na rdo rje zhes btags

na/ 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis sngags 'di smras pas bdag kyang khrag tu skyug cing 'gyel bar gyur na gzhan lta ci smos/ 'di ni 'da' bar dka'o/ /de bzhin du lha dang gnod sbyin rnams la yang

bsgo'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga bshad de/ ma~M las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /dpal chen khrag 'thung spyan drang ngo / /sku ni dud ka chen po la/ /dbu skra kham
nag rol pa can/ /dbu gsum pa la phyag drug ste/ /dmar dang dud ka gnag pa yin/ /g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni/ /sti ra'i dbyug pa chen po dang / /dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba la/ /rdo rjes dkrug

cing 'thung bar brtag /g.yon gyi gsum na thogs pa ni/ /sti ra'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang / /khyung gi khrag chen thogs pa dang / /sti ra phra mo'i gsus pa nas/ /glo snying nang grol 'dren cing za/ /gtsug tu rnam

par snang mdzad nyid/ /oM phrag g.yas la ak+Sha b+h+yaHhU~M/ /g.yon rad na sam+b+ha ba trA~M/ /rkang g.yas a mo g+ha sid+d+hi AH /g.yon na a mi tA b+ha ste/ /hrIHb+h+ru~M las rdo rje 'khor lo la/ /rdo rje rnams ni rigs sngags brtag /

kau ri dang ni tsau ri dang / /pra mo ha dang bait+ta li/ /gzhan yang byA g+h+r-i mu khA dang / /sid+ha la sogs mgyog ma rnams/ /sti ra la ni 'bru tshugs su/ /blta zhing rtod pa'i tshul bzhin gnas/ /ha ha de nas skad cig la/ /

rig sngags nyid dang sbod gtong bcas/ /dgug pa'i pho nyar brtag par bya/ /ras sam gro ga 'am rtsa rnams la/ /khro ba'i gzugs su bris pa 'am/ /yang na skud pa nag pos bcing / /ha ha gad mo chen po dang / /

rdo rje skul ba'i glu blangs te/ /pho nya rnams la mngag par bya/ /de nas rig sngags bzung nas kyang / /rtsa yi gzugs la gnas pa dang / /'khor lo la sogs mtshon cha yis/ /de dag phye mar brlags par bya/ /

badzra tsakra hU~M/ /phye mar de dag gtubs nas ni/ /thod pa gzhung dang bcas pa yis/ /hom khung gru gsum sgo can du/ /ra~M zhes bya ba'i me sbar te/ /drang srong 'khor bcas g.yab mos bod/ /de nas rig sngags

bsreg par bya/ /de ltar lha dang bdag sbyar na/ /rnam lnga'i chas dang ldan par bya/ /ma mo chen mo sha la spyon/ /'byung po'i sha ni zan bas zhim/ /'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim/ /ma mo chen mo khrag la spyon/ /glu dang gar

dang gad rgyangs kyis/ /so sor mchod de bsgrub par bya/ /zin pa'i sems can gang yang rung / /de dag skud pa nag pos bcing / /de yang dum bur bcad par bya'o/ /de nas myi de snga ma bzhin/ /tshi gnas bya phyir 'bru lnga yis/ /

gnas lnga dag tu rnam bkod de/ /zin pa'i sems can bsrung bar bya/ /tsha zhing rtsub pa'i shing dang ni/ /sha dang chang dang yo byad rnams/ /gnag cing tsha bar rnam sbyar te/ /lha chen rnams la mchod par bya/ /de nas las rnams

grub pa dang / /ha ha la sogs gad mo dang / /glu dang rdo rje dbyug pa yis/ /lha rnams bdag la thim par bya/ /'di ni bdag nyid srung ba dang / /las rnams thams cad grub par byed/ /shar phyogs na 'phra men ma kau ri

kha dog sngon mo phyag gnyis pa ste/ g.yon ban+d+ha tsan dan dmar gyis bkang ba thogs pa/ g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i dbyug ba thogs pa/ oM badzra gau ri dzaHdzaHhU~M zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na sangs rgyas kyang dgug nus na gzhan lta ci smos/

che ge mo zhig khug cig ces bcol nas gtor ma dang tsan dan dmar chen ar+g+ha la oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo zhes brjod cing ar+g+ha lan gsum du bsgreng ngo / /lho phyogs na tsau ri kha dog ser mo phyag mda' gzhu 'gengs pa/ oM badzra tsau ri hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa

brgyad bcol na phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang rdul tsam yang med par rku nus na gzhan lta ci smos/ nub phyogs na pra mo ha dmar mo phyag na chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa/ oM badzra pra mo ha hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na

rdo rje yang rang gi mthu bzhag nas dbang du 'ong na gzhan lta ci smos/ byang phyogs na bait+ta li kha dog nag mo phyag g.yon zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing za ba/ g.yas na rdo rje 'phyar ba/ oM badzra bait+ta li hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na/

'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub na 'jig rten gyi bsgrub pa phran tshegs lta ci smos/ shar lho'i mtshams na puk+ka si kha dog dmar ser phyag gnyis zhing chung ngu'i ba su ta 'dren cing

za ba/ oM badzra puk+ka si hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang 'ching zhing 'dren par nus na gzhan bcing zhing za ba lta ci smos lho nub kyi mtshams na g+hasma ri kha dog ljang khu phyag g.yon na ban da tsan dan dmar pos bkang

ba rdo rjes dkrug cing gsol pa/ oM badzra g+hasma ri hU~M dza zhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na phyag na rdo rje yang myos par nus na gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ nub byang gi mtshams na badzra karma kha dog ljang khu zhing chung ngu

lag pa gnyis kyis bzung ste snying ga nas za ba/ oM badzra karma hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na las gang bya ba thams cad 'grub bo/ /byang shar gyi mtshams na tsaN+Da li kha dog ser skya/ phyag g.yas na zhing chung ngu'i ban+d+ha 'dzin pa/

g.yon gyis zhing dbyug 'dzin pa/ oM badzra tsaN+Da li hU~M dzaHzhes stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te bcol na za ma dang ma ning yang rgyud 'phel bar byed na dbang po tshang zhing nyams pa med pa la rgyud 'phel zhing

tshe dang dbang thang 'phel bar bya ba lta ci smos te/ 'phra men ma 'di rnams 'phrin las skul ba'i tshe ar+g+ha dang gtor ma dbul ba ni gong du smos pa bzhin du bgyi'o/ /khros na thams cad phyag na tri shU la 'bar ba/ g.yon rde'u chung bsnams pa/

gdan me smug nag /sku'i kha dog nag mo la khrag dang zhag dang thal ba'i thig les tshom bur byas shing ba su tas rked pa bcings pa/ gser gyi lpags pa go zur bgos pa srod ta a dza nas lus brgyan te gcer bu'i tshogs smug gnag

'bar ba/ g.yon rde'u chung bsnams pa/ g.yas me smug kun ka kha dog nag mo la 'jig rten gyi khams bsregs shing / zad par byas nas slar dpal chen po'i sku la thim par bya'o/ /de ni phyi rim bshad par bya'o/ /shar

phyogs su sid+ha mu kha kha dog ser mo zhing kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba/ seng ge'i mgo can/ lho phyogs na bya g+h+ra mu kha kha dog dmar mo lag pa gnyis bsnol te mdun na zhing gnas pa la lta ba/ stag gi mgo can

nub phyogs su srin gla mu kha kha dog nag mo lag pa gnyis zhing chung ngu 'dzin cing lces lngag pa wa mgo can/ byang phyogs na shwa na mu kha kha dog mthing ka zhing lag pa gnyis kyis khong dral te lta ba khyi mgo can/ shar lho'i mtshams su

kr-i D+ha mu kha kha dog dmar gnag zhing chung ngu'i bA su ta kha na thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas ban da g.yon gri thogs pa bya rgod kyi mgo can/ lho nub mtshams na kang+ka mu kha kha dog dkar dmar phrag pa g.yon pa la zhing khel zhing rkang pa nas bzung ba/

g.yas pa mgo 'dzin pa/ bya kang+ka'i mgo can mchu ring thor to gug ze ba dmar mo/ /nub byang mtshams na kA ka mu kha kha dog nag mo/ bya rog gi mgo can mchus zhing thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pas pad ma ban+d+ha 'dzin pa/

byang shar mtshams su U lU ka mu kha kha dog sna tshogs lag pa g.yon pa dung chen khrag gis bkang pa la 'thung ba la g.yas pa rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa/ 'ug pa'i mgo can/ nang rim 'ug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya

rog gi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya kAng ka mchu rings gyi 'khor gyis bskor/ de'i phyi rim bya rgod kyi 'khor gyis bskor/ de dag thams cad kyang zhing mang po gsar rnying spungs pa'i steng na zhing la rtod pa'i phyir 'thab pa'i tshul ston pa

sha stag go/ de dag gi snying po 'di rnams so/ /hU~M ha he phaT hU~M/ 'di kun 'bru re re yang lan bzhi bzhi brjod do/ /hU~M gis gtso bo bskyed/ has nang gi lha mo bskyed/ hes phyi'i lha mo bskyed/ phaT kyis thams cad khros par bskul/

hU~M gis thams cad kyi ye shes kyi 'od zer 'bar bas phyogs bcur khyab par bgyi'o/ /lha mo blo ldan tshogs kyi bdag /he ru dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas byed dang / /rnal 'byor bar du gcod pa dang / /

dam tshig gnyan po dral pa dang / /rdo rje spun la 'khu byed rnams/ /khyed kyis rdul du brlags nas ni/ /gnod sems ma lus gtan nas phyung / /dpal chen po sta na dang 'ga' na'i gnas su tshogs chen po la gshegs pa'i

tshe sku gsung thugs kyi khro bo'i gzi byin gyis gdugs pa thams cad gtan nas 'byin cing longs spyod chen po 'gying zhing 'gying ba'i glu blangs te thams cad dgyes par mdzad pa'i dbyangs 'dis dgyes par mdzad do/ /rdo rje pad+mo'i

phyag rgya dpral bar bcings te/ phyar nas mchong zhing 'khor thams cad gcer bur byung nas skra gshig cing brgyugs te/ sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM e A ra li hoHhri~M hri~M hri~M hri~M/ de nas tshogs su gshegs nas

'khor thams cad la spyan bgrad pas gzigs shing mdzum pa'i brda ha ha sa~M sa~M sgra phyung ste/ 'khor thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu dbyangs 'dis gtso bo la bstod do/ /e ma'o chos kyi don byung ba/ /chos don dag pa bdag med pa/ /

nam mkha' dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod pas gtso bo mnyes nas 'khor thams cad la gzigs shing dam stsal ba'i dbyangs 'di gsungs so/ kha ga l+ya sha ta ba ka /a la la hoH/

ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ kha ra~M yo gi ni/ kha ra~M TA ki ni/ a la la hoH/ b+ha ga bAn kha kha kha/ lha mo rnams rnga rdung / dbyangs len/ rgyud gsum gyi tshig /te g+he~M te g+he~M/ te g+he~M/ te g+he~M/ ta g+he~M ta g+he~M/ g+he~M g+he~M g+he~M/ 'phags pa

thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rig sngags gcod pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // sems dpa' chen po nyon cig /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi/ /'od zer 'du 'phro'i klong dkyil na/ /khro bo chen po rnams

bzhugs pa/ /brkyang bskum tshul gyis gnas pa ste/ /dbus kyi khrag 'thung chen po ni/ /dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de/ /gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa gdeng / /zhabs kyang brgyad du rnam par bstan/ /de yi dkyil

'khor khro bo ni/ /dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can/ /zhabs drug rdo rje'i brag steng na/ /'jig rten skyong bas 'dud tshul lo/ /de yi pho nya bka' nyan ni/ /rdo rje phra men gtum bag can/ /'jigs pa'i gzugs

can mang po ste/ /de dag cir yang 'grub par byed/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje srin mo chen mo ni/ /'jigs byed chen mor snang

ba ste/ /phyag kyang srin po chen po ltar/ /'thun te zhabs kyang de dang 'dra/ /de lta bu yi dkyil 'khor du/ /rin chen me tog bor nas ni/ /lcags la bab pa'i lha de ni/ /gnyer na 'grub par the tshom med/ /dge dang

mi dge'i chos rnams la/ /lhag par bsten par mi bya ste/ /mnyam nyid rig pa'i klong zhugs nas/ /ci la thogs pa med par spyod/ /rdo rje dbyug ba blangs nas su/ /g.yab mo lnga yang g.yab par bya/ /de nas
dkyil 'khor bzhugs par brtag /mchod pa chen po dbul bar bya/ /se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis kyang / /mgyogs mas phyogs bcu gar yang phyin/ /de la zhon nas 'gro byed pa/ /bya rog mgo can la sogs kun/ /

sbed byed ma yis sbas pa ni/ /mthu chen lha srin gang gis kyang / /de la mthong bar mi nus na/ /gzhan gyis mthong bar ga la nus/ /skul byed las ni gzhan 'debs yin/ /mgyogs ma'i las ni phyin par 'gro/ /gsod ma'i

las ni grub pa yin/ /so sor ma bsgrubs nyid 'gro ma/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rdo rje srin mo'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha

sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bA na dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH ru lu ru lu ru lu hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha shrI he ru ka hU~M/ a a a hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M kA ra hU~M/ gardza gardza gardza hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ko d+ha bi dza ya hU~M/ ha na ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha

nI la daN+Da hU~M/ da ha da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ya mAn+ta ka hU~M/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha Ar+ya a tsa la hU~M/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hU~M/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a pa rA dzi ta hU~M

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hU~M/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ya hU~M/ b+hin+da b+hin+da b+hin+da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la hU~M/ s+phoT s+phoT s+phoT hU~M phaT/ 'phags pa

thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las khro bo bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags dang las kyi sngags ril 'dus pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // oM badzra kro d+he hU~M/ ha la ha la ha la ha la ha hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha hU~M/ ru lu ru lu ru lu

ru lu ru lu hU~M/ ma ma ma ma ma hU~M/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo hU~M/ dzaHdzaHdzaHhUM hU~M hU~M/ 'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rdo rje srin mo'i sngags kyi le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // mnyam pa nyid du rtogs byas nas/ /

bskul zhing gsigs pa thams cad kyang / /phyag rgya yin zhes rgyal pos bshad/ /mdo tsam du ni 'di ltar brtag /lag pa thal sbyar gyen du bsgreng / /rkang pa mthil sbyar mthur du gzugs/ /tshigs chen bzhi yang

gcag par bya/ /mgo dang mtshan yang snying por brtag /rdo rje rtse gcig rtse dgu dang / /bcu gcig tu yang rnam brtags te/ /'di ni khrag 'thung chen po yi/ /phyag rgya yin par dpa' bos bshad/ /lag pa thal sbyar gyen

du bsgreng / /rkang pa phral nas brkyang bskum zhing / /gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa/ /'di ni hU~M gi rgya chen yin/ /rkang pa phral mthil zur du gzugs/ /lag pa phral nas gar byed cing / /stabs su mchod par byed pa ni/ /

'di ni stobs chen phyag rgya yin/ /rkang pa g.yon gyis g.yas la 'khyud/ /lag pa gar thabs bskor nas kyang / /thal mo drag tu brdabs pa ni/ /rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon mthe bo yis/ /

mthe'u chung sen mo'i mthil du gnon/ /gdangs pa'i thabs su bsgreng ba ni/ /dbyug sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis/ /rdeg pa'i thabs su gdangs pa dang / /g.yon pa dku la brten pa ni/ /gshin

rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i thal mo yin/ /gdab pa'i thabs su gdengs pa dang / /g.yon gyis 'dzin pa ltar byas pa/ /mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya yin/ /lag pa thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /gung mo rgyab tu bsnol

bar bya/ /mthe bo gnyis kyang phral te bsgreng / /spyi bor bzhag pa gre ba'i rgya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa thur du gzugs/ /lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng / /g.yon pa'i rkang pa lag 'phyar ba'i/ /gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin/ /

lag pa g.yas g.yon dkur brten te/ /rkang pa gshibs te mchongs pa ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i phyag rgya zhes/ /dpa' bo chen pos yang du bshad/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon bsnol ba dang / /rkang pas brkyang bskum byas pa ni/ /

khams gsum rgyal ba'i phyag rgya zhes/ /mgon po dpa' bos yang du bshad/ /lag pa g.yas g.yon sprugs pa dang / /lus kyang drag du gsigs pa ni/ /rdo rje phra men ma rnams kyi/ /phyag rgya yin par 'dren pas bshad/ /

phyag rgya 'di dag bcings nas ni/ /stabs chen drag tu mchongs byas na/ khams gsum dag las mchongs par 'gyur/ /gzhan yang go 'phang thams cad kun/ /grub par gyur te the tshom med/ /rig pa'i skyes bu chen pos bshad/ /

'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las phyag rgya'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // 'khor lo chen po rtsibs brgyad pa'i/ /dkyil du khrag 'thung spyan drangs te/ /mdun du hU~M yang spyan drang ngo / /rgyab tu stobs chen

spyan drangs nas/ /'khor lo rtsibs kyi steng dag tu/ /bcu po rnams kyang go rims bzhin/ /so so'i gnas su spyan drangs te/ /dmar gyi ar+g+ha gsol nas ni/ /mchod yon gzhan yang dbul bar bya/ /rdo rje dbyangs kyis bstod

byas te/ /de nas las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /khros pas yud tsam rlag mdzad de/ /brlag par ma gyur gang yang med/ /'phags pa thabs kyi

zhags pa pad mo phreng las las kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // rdo rje phra men sbyor ba yis/ /yud tsam gyis ni de bkug nas/ /rtod pa'i tshul du rab bstabs na/ /lha yang rung ste brlag par 'gyur/ /'ug pa'i mgo can

la sogs pa'i/ /phra men ma rnams sbad byas te/ /mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /de yi sems 'phrogs bsgom nyams 'gyur/ /'phra men rnams ni sbad byas te/ /de yi sgrub pa'i bar gcod cing / /gsang ste 'khrug par

bsgom byas na/ /sgrub pa nyams shing 'bye bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po'i las kyi le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // hom khung zur gsum gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje mda' gzhu ldan

byas ste/ /thod pa dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /spyan drangs bsregs na lha yang 'chi/ /phra men mngags te bkug nas ni/ /thab kun bsregs na mod la 'chi/ /gsur dang bsres pa'i sha rnams kyis/ /lha rnams thams cad mchod

par bya/ /rdo rje glu ni blangs nas su/ /'byung po'i sha ni shin du zhim/ /'byung po'i khrag ni shin tu zhim/ /'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste/ /gsol te thams cad dgyes par mdzod/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng

las drag po hom gyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum/ /khro bo khro mo rnams bsgoms te/ /btab na lha yang brlag par 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi

zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po'i phur pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // lcags phye dug dang rdo phye dang / /khrag las sbrus te bsres pa dang / /mu dga'i tshan dang sbyor ba dag /sbyor bas gtor na de brlag 'gyur/ /'phags

pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po'i gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // khro mo'i dkyil 'khor gtun khung du/ /khro bo'i tho bas brdungs pa yi/ /rdo rje gtun phrugs bsgom byas na/ /lha yang rung ste brdungs

par 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las drag po'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // drag po'i las kyis bsgrubs pa'i rnams/ /'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo bcad nas/ /rnam shes hU~M gis

bsdus btums te/ /'og min bla med gnas mchog na/ /gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga/ /sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang / /khro bo dang ni khro mo rnams/ /sbyor ba'i lhums su phaT kyis 'phang / /'phags pa thabs

kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las gnas bstabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // zla gam dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad pa/ /khro bo khro mo spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod/ /de nas las rnams

brtsam par bya/ /chags pa'i rdo rje 'khor bcas pa/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /chags pas yud la dbang mdzad de/ /dbang du ma gyur gang yang med/ /rdo rje phra men mngags nas su/ /bkug nas khro bo chen
po yis/ /chags pa'i tshul gyis de lus las/ /dpa' dang gzi brjid bsdus nas 'grub/ /'phra men rnams ni mngags nas su/ /de yi mig rna sna dang lce/ /lus dang sems bsgyur rnams bsgoms na/ /kun la mdzes

shing dga' bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi las bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // hom khung zla gam gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje zhags pas brgyan par bya/ /de nas

lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /mi phan rnam rtog bsregs na 'grub/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi hom gyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o// // zangs sam kha dog dmar po'i shing / /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam/ /

mgo la khro bo'i 'khor bsgoms te/ /btab na nges par de dbang bsgyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi phur pa'i las bshad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o// // zangs phye dang ni bu ram dang / /dmar po'i

'bras can la sogs pa/ /sbyar bas gtor ma gtang bar bya/ /mthong bas nges par de dbang 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi gtor ma'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o// // khro mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor

du/ /khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms byas na/ /lha yang rung ste dbang du 'gyur/ /de ni bde ba chen po yin/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las dbang gi sbyor ba'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// //

gru bzhi dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par/ /lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ /mchod pa glu la sogs pas mchod/ /de nas las rnams brtsam par bya/ /nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab

'byam kun/ /dpal dang gzi brjid chen po rnams/ /yud tsam gyis ni rgyas par mdzod/ /khro bo khro mo 'khor bcas dang / /rdo rje phra men 'khor bcas pas/ /dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel bsgoms na/ /bdag nyid chen por

de 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i las kyi le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // hom khung gru bzhi gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje 'khor los brgyan par bya/ /de nas lha rnams spyan drangs te/ /

bsregs pas mchod cing dpal 'phel bsgom/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i hom gyi le'u ste sum bcu pa'o// // gser ram ser po'i shing rnams la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur bzhi/ /

lha rnams bsgoms te gdab par bya/ /'di ni rgyas pa'i las la shis/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum bcu gcig pa'o// // gser phye 'bras chan ser po rnams/ /

'o ma sbrang rtsi gtor ma ni/ /rgyas par 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste/ /mkhas pas rgyas par bsgom zhing sbyin/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum bcu gnyis pa'o/
lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgom/ /byang chub sems ni 'phro bsgoms na/ /'di ni rgyas pa'i las 'grub bo/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las
rgyas pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste sum bcu gsum pa'o// // zlum po'i dkyil 'khor rtsibs brgyad par/ /lha rnams 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/ /dkar po'i yon kyis mchod par bya/ /de nas las rnams brtsam
par bya/ /gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas pas/ /'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun/ /yud tsam nyid la zhi mdzad de/ /zhi bar grub la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha rnams 'khor bcas thams cad kyis/ /'khrug pa
thams cad zhi mdzad par/ /bsgoms na thams cad yud tsam gyis/ /zhi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i las kyi le'u ste sum bcu bzhi pa'o //

hom khung zlum po gdengs pa la/ /rdo rje pad mos brgyan par bya/ /phur pa dkar po drug btab ste/ /spyan drangs rdul phye sogs pas mchod/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i hom gyi le'u ste sum bcu lnga pa'o/ /

phur pa kha dog dkar po la/ /mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum por/ /lha rnams bsgoms la gdab par bya/ /'di ni zhi ba'i las la shis/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i phur pa'i le'u ste sum bcu drug pa'o// // dngul dang

'bras chen dkar po rnams/ /'o mar sbyar ba'i gtor ma ni/ /zhi bar 'gyur ba'i gtor ma ste/ /mkhas pas zhi bar bsgoms shing gtor/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i gtor ma'i le'u ste sum bcu bdun pa'o/ /

lha mo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /lha yi grub pa bsgom par bya/ /byin gyis thams cad zhi bsgoms na/ /lha rnams kun kyang zhi bar 'gyur/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las zhi ba'i spyod pa las kyi le'u ste sum bcu brgyad pa'o/ /

mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang / /de las dngos 'byung phyag rgya rnams/ /nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad/ /mkhas pas ci dag bsgyur na 'grub/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las las bsdus pa'i le'u ste sum bcu dgu pa'o//

drag pos thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur/ /dbang gis 'byor pa mchog kyang 'grub/ /rgyas pas gzi brjid rnam par 'phel/ /zhi bas bde ba'i mchog kyang 'grub/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng las las sgrub pa'i phan yon gyi

le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor 'di'i mtshan ni dbang chen bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor te/ de la dkyil 'khor gyi gzhi zlum por bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings spros pa med pa'i don no/ /'khor lo rtsibs zur can du bya ba gzhi zlum po'i nang na gnas pa ni chos kyi

dbyings spros pa med bzhin du byin gyi brlabs gyis lha dang / lha mo dang / khro bo dang / khro mo dang / pho nya la sogs pa dang nyid kyis 'phro ba'i don no/ /rnam pa gcig tu chos kyi dbyings rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ci yang mkhyen pa lhun

gyis grub pa'i don no/ /mtha' gru bzhi bya ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad la dbang bsgyur pas bde ba chen po rgyas pa'i don/ dkyil nas lha mo lnga phyir lta ba/ lha mo ni dbyings nyid nye ba'i byin brlabs te/ sems

dpas dbyings nyid dang nye ba mthong ba'i don no/ /sems dpa' lnga nang du lta ba ni dbyings nyid nye ba la lta ba'i don no/ /sems dpa' gzhan phyir lta ba ni/ dbyings nyid thams cad du sa rdo lta bu bems po ma yin gyi mkhyen pa'i ye

shes dang ldan zhing sems dpa' nyid dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go/ sems ma gzhan nang du lta ba ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dngos po la sogs pa thams cad du rnam par rtog pa ma yin gyi dbyings nyid dang ldan zhing dbyings nyid kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes

las mi gzhan pa'i tha tshig go/ rnam pa gcig tu sems dpa' phyir lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i don/ sems ma nang du lta ba ni snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/ sems dpa'

dang sems ma phyi nang du gcig la gcig gzigs pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i tha tshig go/ khro bo dang khro mo ril phyir lta ba ni phyi'i dngos po dang rgol ba la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba'i don/ de la dbyings ni dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

lta bu'o/ /mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni nyi ma'i 'od snang zhing gsal ba lta bu'o/ /de'i byin brlabs ni dro zhing 'jam pa lta bu'o/ /phyi'i dngos po la sogs pa 'joms shing 'dul ba ni rtsi shing bskams pa dang tshig pa lta bu ste/ lha mo dang

sems ma ni chos kyi dbyings rig pa'i don sems la snang ba'o/ /lha dang sems dpa' ni dbyings la snang ba'i don mthong ba'o/ /dbyings nyid la snang ba dang mthong ba'i byin brlabs kyi ngang gis dngos po dang rgol ba'i rang bzhin lhun gyis

'joms shing dbyings su sbyor bar 'dul ba ni/ /khro bo dang khro mo las rnam bzhi rang bzhin du mdzad cing thugs rjes 'jig rten skyong ba'i don no/ /'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa ni byin gyi brlabs las pho nya ltar gnas pa yin/ rnam pa gcig tu 'jig

rten gyi lha mthu bo che 'khor du 'dus par bstan pa'i don no/ /bkra shis brgyad ni thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing 'khor ba la spyod kyang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching par mi 'gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la spyod kyang nyan thos kyi zhi ba phyogs

gcig par mi 'gyur te/ gang gis kyang zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir bkra shis so/ /de la dpal be'u ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ /'khor lo ni thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
ba'i bkra shis so/ /rin po che ni zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ /pad mo ni 'khor bas ma zin pa'i bkra shis so/ /gdugs ni nyon mongs pas ma gdungs pa'i bkra shis so/ /bum pa ni

bdud rtsi mchog dang ldan pa'i bkra shis so/ /dung ni sgo thams cad spa dgong bar sgra sgrog pa'i bkra shis so/ /nya ni lam rgyud lnga'i sems can gyi don mdzad kyang nyam nga ba med pa'o/ /klong bzhi ni rigs

lnga'i byin brlabs yin pa 'am/ lam rgyud lnga'i sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yod par bstan pa 'am/ thugs rjes de dag gi don mdzad pa'i tha tshig go/ rnam pa gcig tu thams cad dbang du 'dus pa'i don/
de la gtso mo 'khor lnga lnga dang bcas pa ni ci yang mi mdzad do/ /sems dpa' sems ma nyi shu ni kun la bu gcig bzhin no/ /de ltar byas pa'i shugs kyi khro bo dang khro mo 'khor dang bcas pa ni

phyi nang thams cad kyi dngos po la rngon pas ri dgas mthong ba bzhin no/ /de ltar zhe sdang gi shugs kyis thams cad dbyings nyid la sbyar ro/ /'byor na 'khor ba'i chos la spyod kyang longs spyod chen po ste/ nyon mongs pa'i 'ching bar mi 'gyur

bas de ltar sgrub pa ni 'dod chags so/ /chos kyi dbyings ngang gis gsang ba phrag dog go/ chos nyid spros pa med pas gti mug go/ chos nyid de lta bu khams gsum las rgyal bas nga rgyal lo/ /de la gtso bo ni 'khor lnga'i

byin brlabs ni thams cad la khyab mod kyi nye bar ni dbu dang / mdun dang / thong ka yan chad/ rgyab mjug yan chad do/ /mi 'khrugs pa'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni phyag g.yas pa dang rtsib logs g.yas so/ /rin chen 'byung

ldan 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni phyag g.yon dang rtsib logs g.yon no/ /'od dpag med 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni/ zhabs g.yon nas rked pa g.yon man chad do/ /don yod grub pa 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni zhabs g.yas rked pa g.yon man

chad do/ /khro bo dang khro mo thams cad ni rigs so so'i byin brlabs bzhin no/ /de ltar 'khor lnga po gcig la yang lnga lngar 'gyur te/ sra ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rdo rje'i rigs so/ /dro ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni rin po che'i

rigs so/ /gsher ba'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni pad ma'i rigs so/ /bskyod pa'i bya ba byed pa thams cad ni las kyi rigs so/ /de rnams cha mnyam pa las spyir grub pa ni dngos su bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs

so/ /thams cad bdag nyid ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs ni dbus su gyur pa thams cad do/ /sra ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni yangs pa'i spyan 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so/ /dro ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni mA ma kI 'khor lnga'i byin

brlabs so/ /gsher ba'i rang bzhin med pa ni gos dkar mo 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so/ /bskyod pa'i rang bzhin med pa ni sgrol ma'i 'khor lnga'i byin brlabs so/ /don du bya ba byed nus pa sems dpa'o/ /de bzhin du rang bzhin med pa ni

sems ma'o/ /de ltar rig pa ni khro bo dang khro mo'o/ /de la bsdu zhing spro ba yang thams cad de ltar bya'o/ /phyi nang gi chos thams cad la yang de ltar blta'o/ /de skad ces dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis bka' stsal pa la

rdo rje gzhon nu sde 'bum phrag du ma yi rangs te 'di skad ces bstod do/ /hU~M bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba yi/ /'od zer 'du 'phro klong dkyil na/ /khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa/ /skur ni cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs/ /hU~M dbu skra

kham gnag ral pa can/ /gyen du 'khyil ba srid rtser 'bar/ /mi mnyam khro gnyer sdang mig ni/ /log par lta ba 'dul ba'i mtshan/ /hU~M mche ba zang yag gtsigs pas ni/ /skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshul/ /sku gsung thugs

kyi byin brlabs ni/ /phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang snang / /hU~M thugs rje'i byin brlabs sprin ltar 'khrigs/ /byams pa'i 'od zer glog bzhin 'gyu/ /rngam pa'i sgra skad 'brug ltar sgrogs/ /sprul pa'i thog thog char bzhin 'bebs/ /
hU~M/ sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni/ /klan ka chen po bdud la tshol/ /kyal ka chen po bgegs la mdzad/ /dam tshig can la dngos grub stsol/ /hU~M thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis/ /

bdag la byin gyis rlob mdzad cing / /bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams/ /grub par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /'khyil cing rgyan yang 'khyil ba la/ /sems kyi chos pas sku mi mnga'/ /sgra las 'das pa'i sbyor ba ste/ /

bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes lags/ /hU~M srid gsum 'joms pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mnyam nyid ngang gis khro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khros pas longs spyod mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'du 'phro khro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
ces bstod de nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /'phags pa thabs kyi zhags pa pad mo phreng rdzogs s+ho// //
